analyzed: ṣaḍaṅgena eva saṃpūjya amṛta tvam dhruveṇa tu

original: ātmānaṃ bhairavaṃ dhyātvā agniṃ dhyātvā tu bījavat /
analyzed: ātmānam bhairavam dhyātvā agnim dhyātvā tu bīja vat
dhruveṇa kuṇḍa bāhye tu tridhā bhrāmya avatārayet

thus
sapta vāra astra japtena darbeṇa eva astra kaṅkaṇam
badhnīyāt dakṣiṇe haste mantram astram anusmaran
rakṣā artham astra garbhasya iti
aparā asya tris āhutyā pūjanam hṛdayena tu

original: hṛdā trirāhutiṃ dattvā garbhādhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet /

original: puṃsaḥ kalpanamevaṃ hi na strī garbhe tu janyate /

original: grīvāmaṃsau kaṭiṃ caiva bāhū jaṅghe prakalpayet /

original: pratyaṅgāni ca saṃkalpya sīmantonnayanaṃ bhavet // SvaT_2.207 //

mukha hṛd pāda deśān tu homāt tat ca tri tattvakam
thus
yathā uktam śrīmat svatantre
pūrva madhya apare vahneḥ trīn bhāgān samprakalpayet
mukha hṛd pāda deśe tu tri tattva āhutibhiḥ kramāt
śirāṃsi pañca āhutyā eva ūrdhva āsyena tribhiḥ tribhiḥ
pañcavaktram tu saṃkalpya madhya prāc yāmya saumyakam
aparam ca api āhutibhiḥ pūrva āsyena tri saṃkhyayā
vaktrāṇām niṣkṛtim tadvat āhutīnām tri saṃkhyayā

original: netraṃ netreṇa saṃkalpya mukheṣvevaṃ trayaṃ trayam // SvaT_2.211 //
analyzed: netram netreṇa saṃkalpya mukheṣu evam trayam trayam

original: tataḥ kalāsamūhaṃ ca pañca cātha catuṣṭayam // SvaT_2.212 //

aṣṭāṅgāni tathā trīṇi daśa ca aṣṭau anukramāt
śeṣa āsyaiḥ saṃprakalpya evam kalā mūrtiḥ tatas bhavet
aṅgāni vinyaset paścāt hṛd ādyāni yathākramam
tris āhutim dakṣiṇena śirasā ca āhuti trayam
sīmantonnayanam hi evam jātakarma tu atha ucyate

original: astreṇa vījayedagnim astreṇaiva tu pūjayet // SvaT_2.215 //
analyzed: astreṇa vījayet agnim astreṇa eva tu pūjayet
tris āhutim tu pūrveṇa astreṇa eva āhuti trayam

original: evaṃ mantradvayenaiva jātakarma kṛtaṃ bhavet // SvaT_2.216 //
analyzed: evam mantra dvayena eva jātakarma kṛtam bhavet
thus
yat uktam tatra eva
astreṇa vījayet vahnim astreṇa eva tu pūjayet
tris āhuti prayogeṇa jātakarma kṛtam bhavet
astreṇa prokṣayet kuṇḍam sadyas sūtaka śuddhaye
vaktrāṇi uddhāṭayet paścāt vaktreṇa eva āhuti trayāt
vaktrāṇi śodhyāni asinā āhuti traya yogataḥ

original: vaktrābhighāro vaktraistu vaktre vaktre trayaṃ trayam /
analyzed: vaktra abhighāraḥ vaktraiḥ tu vaktre vaktre trayam trayam

original: ādau dhruvaṃ smareddevi namaścānte prakalpayet // SvaT_2.221 //

rakṣā artham jāta bālasya brahma ādyāḥ pūjitāḥ tu ye

kavacena upacāram tu gandha puṣpa ādi dhūpakaiḥ
ūrdhvāsyena āhutīḥ tisraḥ kavacena trayam punar
śiva nāma aṅkitam vahnim janayitvā surān tatas
visarjayet tu sva sthānam sāvitrīm praṇavena tu

original: darbhāṇāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pūjyau dakṣiṇe 'gneḥ sadā budhaiḥ // SvaT_2.231 //
analyzed: darbhāṇām pṛṣṭhatas pūjyau dakṣiṇe gneḥ sadā budhaiḥ

original: kuṇḍasya parito devi tridhā bhrāmya tu sthāpayet // SvaT_2.233 //

original: parāṅmukhaṃ tu trīnvārān saṃmukhaṃ trīṃstathaiva ca /

original: aparāsyena tadvaktra- saṃdhānaṃ tu samācaret // SvaT_2.240 //

original: evaṃ saumyasya vaktrasya saṃdhānaṃ tu kṛtaṃ bhavet /

kṛṣṇa ūrdhva keśāḥ malināḥ kṛṣṇa mālya ambara chadāḥ

original: raktākṣī strī ca yaṃ svapne puruṣaṃ tvavagūhayet // SvaT_4.22 //
analyzed: rakta akṣī strī ca yam svapne puruṣam tu avagūhayet

original: mriyate nātra saṃdeho yadi śāntiṃ na kārayet /
analyzed: mriyate na atra saṃdehaḥ yadi śāntim na kārayet
gṛha prasāda bhedam ca śayyā vastra āsaneṣu ca
ātmanaḥ bhibhavam saṃkhye ātma dravya apahāraṇam
khara uṣṭra śva sṛgāleṣu kaṅka gṛdhra bakeṣu ca
mahiṣa ulūka kākeṣu rohaṇam ca pravartanam
bhakṣaṇam pakva māṃsasya rakta mālya anulepanam
kṛṣṇa raktāni vastrāṇi vikṛta ātmā prapaśyati
hasanam valganam svapne mlāna sragdāma dhāraṇam
sva māṃsa utkartanam bandham kṛṣṇasarpeṇa bhakṣaṇam

original: udvāhaṃ ca tathā svapne dṛṣṭvā naiva prasidhyati // SvaT_4.27 //
analyzed: udvāham ca tathā svapne dṛṣṭvā nā eva prasidhyati
aśubhāḥ hi evam ākhyātāḥ vijñeyāḥ deśika uttamaiḥ
śubhāḥ tatra anumedyāḥ tu aśubheṣu tu homayet
aṣṭottaraśatam dhāmnā prāyaścittāt viśuddhi ati
pūrvavat sakalīkṛtya vighna uccāṭana rakṣaṇam
veṣṭanam pūrvavat kuryāt śivambhaḥ śivahastakam

original: lokapālāṃstu saṃpūjya śivakumbhaṃ ca sthaṇḍilam // SvaT_4.30 //
analyzed: lokapālān tu saṃpūjya śiva kumbham ca sthaṇḍilam
agni kāryam yathāpūrvam pūrṇāhuti prapātanam

original: prāyaścittaṃ tataḥ paścād dusvapnārthaṃ yaduktavān // SvaT_4.31 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam tatas paścāt dusvapna artham yat uktavān

original: nirmālyāpanayaṃ kṛtvā bhūmiṃ saṃśodhya pūrvavat // SvaT_4.32 //
analyzed: nirmālya apanayam kṛtvā bhūmim saṃśodhya pūrvavat
nityakarma tatas kuryāt pūjā homa japa ādikam
nitya āhnike samāpte tu naimittikam atha ācaret
upalipya śiva ambhobhiḥ bramhma sthānam prapūjayet
bhāvena gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ tatas maṇḍalam ālikhet
karaṇīm khaṭikām ca eva bhairaveṇa prapūjayet

original: dhāmnā tu rajasāṃ pātaḥ sitādyaśvāgamoditaḥ // SvaT_4.35 //
analyzed: dhāmnā tu rajasām pātaḥ sita ādi aśva āgama uditaḥ
niṣpanne maṇḍale snātvā nityakarma samācaret
nityakarma samāptau tu kuryāt naimittikam budhaḥ
snāna ādi pūrva mantraiḥ sakalīkaraṇa ādikam
ātma rakṣā astra prākāra dvārapāla ādi pūjanam
vighna uccāṭana digbandhau bhū pātāla kha vāsinām
astra prākāram āropya kavacena avaguṇṭhanam
udak mukham tu upaviṣṭaḥ kara śuddhi ādi pūrvavat
lokapālān tu saṃpūjya śiva kumbham prapūjayet

original: maṇḍalasyāgrato bhūtvā maṇḍalaṃ prokṣya cāsinā // SvaT_4.40 //
analyzed: maṇḍalasya agratas bhūtvā maṇḍalam prokṣya ca asinā
varmaṇā veṣṭayet paścāt praṇavena abhimantrayet
aṣṭottaraśatam dhāmnā rajaḥ doṣaiḥ viśuddhi ati
catur dikṣu astram saṃpūjya dvāre gandha ādibhiḥ kramāt

original: prākāraṃ bhāvayedastraṃ maṇḍalaṃ praviśet tataḥ // SvaT_4.42 //
analyzed: prākāram bhāvayet astram maṇḍalam praviśet tatas

original: gurūn saṃpūjya vighneśaṃ puṣpādyaiḥ praṇavena tu /
analyzed: gurūn saṃpūjya vighneśam puṣpa ādyaiḥ praṇavena tu

original: anantamāsanaṃ prāgvac chivāntaṃ praṇavena tu // SvaT_4.43 //

analyzed: mūrti ādi pūrvat nyasyet dhṛd ādi āvaraṇa anta gam

original: nirodhārgheṇa cārdhaṃ tu datvā caiva nirodhayet /
analyzed: nirodha argheṇa ca ardham tu da tvā ca eva nirodhayet

original: japadhyānādikaṃ kṛtvā agniṣṭhaṃ bhairavaṃ yajet // SvaT_4.45 //
analyzed: japa dhyāna ādikam kṛtvā agniṣṭham bhairavam yajet

original: ātmano niṣkaloccāraṃ kṛtvā kumbhe niveśayet // SvaT_4.46 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ niṣkala uccāram kṛtvā kumbhe niveśayet

original: agniṣṭhasya tu tattejo dakṣiṇena viśan smaret /
analyzed: agniṣṭhasya tu tat tejaḥ dakṣiṇena viśan smaret
evam sādhanakam kṛtvā tatas tarpaṇam ārabhet
daśa bhāga vibhāgena hutvā pūrṇāhutim kṣipet
prāyaścitta viśuddhi artham kuryāt aṣṭa uttaram śatam
vidheḥ pūrṇa atiriktasya dhāmnā pūrṇāhutim tatas
ācārya ūṭha ardha hastaḥ tu maṇḍalam praviśet tatas
saṃpūjya parameśānam puṣpa ādyaiḥ ardhapaścimam

original: mudrāṃ baddhvā praṇamyādau jānubhyāmavaniṃ gataḥ // SvaT_4.51 //
analyzed: mudrām baddhvā praṇamya ādau jānubhyām avanim gataḥ
vijñāpayeta paśu artham prārabdhyāḥ ayam makha uttamaḥ

original: snānādhivāsanādyaṃ yan maṇḍale 'gnau ca yatkṛtam // SvaT_4.52 //
analyzed: snāna adhivāsana ādyam yat maṇḍale gnau ca yat kṛtam
vidhānam puṣkalam samyak tvad prasādāt iha astu tat
idānīm śiṣya dehe tu sakalīkaraṇa ādikā
yojanī anta adhva śuddhiḥ tu tvad prasādāt
evam astu iti anujñātaḥ parameśena vīra rāj
labdha anujñaḥ prahṛṣṭa ātmā niṣkrāmet maṇḍalāt bahis
paśu arthāya kṛtam yat tu tat gṛhītvā ardha pātrakam
dhāmnaḥ tu dakṣiṇe bhāge kārayet maṇḍalam guruḥ

original: praṇavāsanaṃ kuśairnyasya śuciṃ śiṣyaṃ niveśayet // SvaT_4.56 //
analyzed: praṇava āsanam kuśaiḥ nyasya śucim śiṣyam niveśayet

original: śivāmbho 'streṇa saṃtāḍya bhasmanā ca kuśaiḥ kramāt /
analyzed: śiva ambhaḥ streṇa saṃtāḍya bhasmanā ca kuśaiḥ kramāt

original: maṇḍale kalpite śiṣyaṃ mūrtibhūtaṃ prakalpayet // SvaT_4.57 //
analyzed: maṇḍale kalpite śiṣyam mūrti bhūtam prakalpayet
upaviśya kara nyāsam nirdāha ādi astra pūrvakam
sa bāhya abhyantaram nyāsam mantra saṃdhānam eva ca
śiva hastaḥ pradātavyaḥ dhyātvā devam
mūrdhni saṃpātayet tejaḥ pāśa aṅkura vināśanam

original: utthāpya ca tato nītvā maṇḍalaṃ tu praveśayet /
analyzed: utthāpya ca tatas nītvā maṇḍalam tu praveśayet

original: netre baddhā tu netreṇa puṣpaṃ pāṇau pradāpayet // SvaT_4.61 //
analyzed: netre baddhā tu netreṇa puṣpam pāṇau pradāpayet

original: mukhamudghāṭya taṃ śiṣyaṃ śivāya praṇipātayet // SvaT_4.63 //
analyzed: mukham udghāṭya tam śiṣyam śivāya praṇipātayet

original: agnikuṇḍasamīpe tu ācāryaḥ paśunā saha // SvaT_4.64 //
analyzed: agnikuṇḍa samīpe tu ācāryaḥ paśunā saha
digbhāge maṇḍalam praṇavena tu
pūrvat nāḍi saṃdhānam tad artham ca āhuti trayam

original: pūrṇāhutiṃ tato dattvā prāyaścittāni homayet // SvaT_4.66 //

original: bījāhāre tathā deśa- bhāvaśuddhau dvijo bhavet /
analyzed: bīja āhāre tathā deśa bhāva śuddhau dvijaḥ bhavet

original: recakena tato gatvā śiṣyadehe viśeddhṛdi // SvaT_4.69 //
analyzed: recakena tatas gatvā śiṣya dehe viśet hṛdi

original: aṅkuśena samākṛṣya dvādaśānte tu kārayet // SvaT_4.71 //
analyzed: aṅkuśena samākṛṣya dvādaśānte tu kārayet

original: tatrasthaḥ pudgalo grāhyaḥ saṃpuṭyaiva dhruveṇa tu /
analyzed: tatrasthaḥ pudgalaḥ grāhyaḥ saṃpuṭyā eva dhruveṇa tu

original: tyajantaṃ devatāṣaṭkaṃ tataścāpi svakaṃ padam // SvaT_4.73 //

original: tatrasthaṃ pudgalaṃ gṛhya saṃpuṭya ca bhavena tu /

original: śatahomaṃ sahasraṃ vā hutvā pūrṇāhutiṃ tataḥ // SvaT_4.77 //

original: śravaṇe 'dhyayane home pūjanādau tathaiva ca // SvaT_4.78 //
analyzed: śravaṇe dhī ayane home pūjana ādau tathā eva ca

original: guruḥ saṃpṛcchate śiṣyaṃ dvividhaṃ phalakāṅkṣiṇam // SvaT_4.80 //
analyzed: guruḥ saṃpṛcchate śiṣyam dvividham phala kāṅkṣiṇam

original: vāsanābhedato bhinnaḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ ca gurostathā // SvaT_4.82 //
analyzed: vāsanā bhedataḥ bhinnaḥ śiṣyāṇām ca guroḥ tathā

karma kṛt phalam ākāṅkṣam śubha ekasthaḥ śubha ujjhitaḥ

gṛhasthaḥ vā yatiḥ vā asau āśrama ekatama sthitaḥ

bāla bāliśa vṛddha strī bhoga bhuj vyādhita ātmanām

original: vidvaddvandvasahānā tu sabījā kīrtitā priye // SvaT_4.88 //
analyzed: vidvas dvandva sahānā tu sa bījā kīrtitā priye

original: sabījā sā tuvijñeyā putrakācāryayoḥ sthitā // SvaT_4.90 //
analyzed: sa bījā sā tu vijñeyā putraka ācāryayoḥ sthitā

original: gṛhastho vāśramī vātha yatiḥ saṃkalpya dīkṣayet /
analyzed: gṛhasthaḥ vā āśramī vā atha yatiḥ saṃkalpya dīkṣayet
pāśa sūtrakam ādāya śiṣya dehe valambayet
adhvānam saṃdhayet agnau dhāmnā ca eva vicakṣaṇaḥ
kumbha maṇḍala vahni sthaḥ ca adhva ātma sthaḥ śiśoḥ ca yaḥ
sūtrasthaḥ ca api ca ekatra adhva saṃdhiḥ prakīrtitaḥ
ṣaḍvidhasya adhva mārgasya sādhāraṇa gatasya tu

original: kuṇḍe saṃkalpya saṃśodhya- madhvasaṃdhau tu homayet /
analyzed: kuṇḍe saṃkalpya saṃśodhya madhvasaṃdhau tu homayet
adhva avalokanam paścāt vyāpya vyāpaka bhedataḥ
bhuvana vyāpti tā tattveṣu ananta ādi śiva antake
vyāpakāni ca ṣaṭtriṃśat mantra varṇa pada ātmakāḥ

kalā antar bhāvinaḥ te vai nivṛtti ādyāḥ ca tāḥ smṛtāḥ
hṛd ādyāḥ vācakāḥ tāsām bījāmantrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
ekikasyāḥ kalāyāḥ ca pṛthak vyāptim vibhāvayet

original: pṛthivyādikalā jñeyā brahmādyāḥ kāraṇāśca te // SvaT_4.98 //
analyzed: pṛthivī ādi kalāḥ jñeyāḥ brahma ādyāḥ kāraṇāḥ ca te
evam vyāptim bhāvayitvā adhva upasthāpanam bhavet

original: agnau tu pūjite deve adhvanyāse kṛte sati /
analyzed: agnau tu pūjite deve adhva nyāse kṛte sati

original: dhāmādhiḥ praṇavādiśca nivṛttyai ca namaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: dhāma ādhiḥ praṇava ādiḥ ca nivṛttyai ca namaḥ punar

original: tasyāṃ ca bhuvanānāṃ ca śatamaṣṭottarāvadhi // SvaT_4.102 //
analyzed: tasyām ca bhuvanānām ca śatam aṣṭa uttara avadhi

original: mantrau dvāveva vijñeyau adhvaṣaṭkaṃ vibhāvayet // SvaT_4.103 //
analyzed: mantrau dvau eva vijñeyau adhva ṣaṭkam vibhāvayet

original: māyīyā bhuvanākārā malāḥ karma ca saṃsthitāḥ // SvaT_4.104 //
analyzed: māyīyāḥ bhuvana ākārāḥ malāḥ karma ca saṃsthitāḥ

original: bhogahetuśca karma syād abhilāṣo malo 'tra tu // SvaT_4.105 //
analyzed: bhoga hetuḥ ca karma syāt abhilāṣaḥ tu

original: tadviśuddhyai ca dīkṣā ca kriyate sā yathāvidhi // SvaT_4.106 //
analyzed: tad viśuddhyai ca dīkṣā ca kriyate sā yathāvidhi

original: hṛdā saṃkalpya vāgīśīṃ vyāpikāṃ sarvayoniṣu // SvaT_4.107 //
analyzed: hṛdā saṃkalpya vāgīśīm vyāpikām sarva yoniṣu
śata rudra ādi ananta antam yonayaḥ vividhāḥ sthitāḥ
sama kālam ṛtu tvena vāgīśīm saṃnidhāpayet
dhruveṇa pūjayet puṣpaiḥ gandha dhūpaiḥ anukramāt
oṃkāreṇa āhutiḥ tisraḥ vāgīśī saṃnidhāpane
śiṣyam saṃprokṣya ca astreṇa tāḍayet astram uccaran
recakena ātmanaḥ gatvā chindyāt tasya asinā hṛdaḥ

original: dhruveṇa tatsthaṃ saṃpuṭya caitanyaṃ mudrayātmani // SvaT_4.111 //
analyzed: dhruveṇa tad stham saṃpuṭya caitanyam mudrayā ātmani
pūrayet bhairaveṇa eva kumbhayet recayet tatas
dvādaśāntāt tu saṃgṛhya yojayet bhava mudrayā

original: saṃyojya tasyāṃ caitanyaṃ śarīrāṇyadhvani sṛjet // SvaT_4.113 //
analyzed: saṃyojya tasyām caitanyam śarīrāṇi adhvani sṛjet
prāk karma vāsanā śeṣa phala bhoga tva hetave
yugapad bhinna bhogāni deśa kāla śarīrataḥ
mantra śaktyā vipacyante pudgalāḥ ca tathāvidhāḥ
bhinā dehāḥ visṛjyante garbhe vāgīśi yoniṣu
dhāmnā ca yojayitvā ca juhuyāt āhuti trayam
yugapad sarva garbheṣu dehāḥ vividha rūpakāḥ
garbheṣu garbha niṣpatti bhairaveṇa āhuti trayam
hutvā tu jananam kāryam punar tena āhuti trayāt
sarva yoniṣu dehāḥ te yugapad vṛddhim āgatāḥ

original: tadabhāvānna bhogaḥ syāt tadarthaṃ mārjanaṃ smṛtam // SvaT_4.119 //
analyzed: tad abhāvāt na bhogaḥ syāt tad artham mārjanam smṛtam
arjite ārjite sati bhoktavyaḥ bhogaḥ duḥkha sukha ātmakaḥ
layaḥ paramayā prītyā sukha duḥkha ādike pi alam
tisṛbhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ homam dhāmnā eva triṣu kārayet

original: āhutīnāṃ śataṃ homyaṃ dhāmnā niṣkṛtaye punaḥ // SvaT_4.121 //
analyzed: āhutīnām śatam homyam dhāmnā niṣkṛtaye punar
yat karma bhogya rūpam tu jāti āyuḥ bhoga lakṣaṇam

original: viṣayeṣu ca sarveṣu indriyārtheṣu ca sthitaḥ /
analyzed: viṣayeṣu ca sarveṣu indriyārtheṣu ca sthitaḥ

original: yatra yatra nirūpyeta nāśivaṃ vidyate kvacit // SvaT_4.314 //
analyzed: yatra yatra nirūpyeta na aśivam vidyate kvacid

original: evāṃ samarasaṃ jñātvā nāsau muhyet kadācana /
analyzed: evam samarasam jñātvā na asau muhyet kadācana

original: yasyaivaṃ sarvato bhāvaḥ so 'pi sarvagato bhavet // SvaT_4.315 //
analyzed: yasya evam sarvatas bhāvaḥ saḥ u sarva gataḥ bhavet

original: evaṃ samarasaḥ prokto viṣuvattu nibodha me /
analyzed: evam samarasaḥ proktaḥ viṣuvat tu nibodha me

original: prathamaṃ prāṇaviṣuvan mātraṃ jñeyaṃ dvitīyakam // SvaT_4.316 //
analyzed: prathamam prāṇa viṣuvat mātram jñeyam dvitīyakam

original: pañcamaṃ śaktiviṣuvat ṣaṣṭhaṃ vai kāla ucyate // SvaT_4.317 //
analyzed: pañcamam śakti viṣuvat ṣaṣṭham vai kālaḥ ucyate

original: ātmānaṃ ca manaḥ prāṇe saṃyojya viṣuvadbhavet // SvaT_4.318 //
analyzed: ātmānam ca manaḥ prāṇe saṃyojya viṣuvant bhavet
prāṇe viṣuvat ākhyātam māntram viṣuvat ucyate
mantram uccārayet tāvat yāvat na anya manāḥ bhavet
para apara vibhāgena mantra ātmā tu tat ucyate

original: māntraṃ viṣuvadityuktaṃ nāḍisthaṃ tannibodha me // SvaT_4.320 //
analyzed: māntram viṣuvat iti uktam nāḍi stham tat nibodha me
sarvāsām eva nāḍīnām madhye yā saṃvyavasthitā

original: suṣumnā nāma sā jñeyā nābheḥ śaktyā śivaṃ gatā // SvaT_4.321 //
analyzed: suṣumnā nāma sā jñeyā nābheḥ śaktyā śivam gatā
tatra pravāhayet nādam nāḍīviṣuvat ucyate

original: praśāntaṃ viṣuvaccaivam adhunā kathayāmi te // SvaT_4.322 //
analyzed: praśāntam viṣuvat ca evam adhunā kathayāmi te
ayane ṣaṣ aṅgulaḥ cāraḥ kāraṇāni aṅgule ṅgule
tāni adhastāt parityajya kāraṇāni ṣaḍ eva tu
saptame tu praśāntam vai praśānta indriya gocaram

original: praśāntaḥ stimito jñeyaḥ stimito niścalaḥ smṛtaḥ // SvaT_4.324 //
analyzed: praśāntaḥ stimitaḥ jñeyaḥ stimitaḥ niścalaḥ smṛtaḥ
niścalaḥ nistaraṅgaḥ ca sthiraḥ pūrṇaḥ samantataḥ

original: evaṃbhāvaṃ samāsthāya dīkṣā kāryā tu daiśikaiḥ // SvaT_4.325 //
analyzed: evaṃbhāvam samāsthāya dīkṣā kāryā tu daiśikaiḥ
etat praśānta viṣuvat śakti upādhim nibodha me

original: śaktimadhyagato nādo nādordhvaṃ ca caredyadā // SvaT_4.326 //
analyzed: śakti madhya gataḥ nādaḥ nāda ūrdhvam ca caret yadā

original: tāvattu śaktiviṣuvat kālākhyaṃ tu nibodha me /
analyzed: tāvat tu śakti viṣuvat kāla ākhyam tu nibodha me

original: tuṭiḥ ṣoḍaśakā yā tu prāṇānte saṃvyavasthitā // SvaT_4.327 //
analyzed: tuṭiḥ ṣoḍaśakā yā tu prāṇānte saṃvyavasthitā
kālaḥ bhrū kṣepa mātraḥ tu tatra ante kīrtitaḥ mayā

original: taṃ parāparabhāgena punareva tridhā kuru // SvaT_4.328 //
analyzed: tam para apara bhāgena punar eva tridhā kuru

original: aparaḥ ṣoḍaśo yāvat kālaḥ saptadaśaḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: aparaḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ yāvat kālaḥ saptadaśaḥ paraḥ

original: parāparastu yaḥ kālaḥ sa priye 'ṣṭādaśaḥ prabhuḥ // SvaT_4.329 //
analyzed: parāparaḥ tu yaḥ kālaḥ sa priye ṣṭādaśaḥ prabhuḥ

original: prāṇa evaṃ tridhā kālaṃ kṛtvā caiva tyajetpunaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇaḥ evam tridhā kālam kṛtvā ca eva tyajet punar

original: aparaḥ śaktimūrdhastho vyāpinyāṃ ca dvitīyakaḥ // SvaT_4.330 //
analyzed: aparaḥ śakti mūrdha sthaḥ vyāpinyām ca dvitīyakaḥ
tṛtīyaḥ samanā sthāne tat kāla viṣuvat smṛtam
etat ṣaṣṭham samākhyātam saptamam tātvvam ucyate
unmanā paratas devi tatra ātmānam niyojayet
tasmin yuktaḥ tatas hi ātmā tanmayaḥ ca prajāyate
tattva ākhyam viṣuvat devi sarveṣām paratas sthitam

original: viṣuvadevaṃvidhaṃ jñātvā ko na mucyeta bandhanāt // SvaT_4.333 //
analyzed: viṣuvat evaṃvidham jñātvā kaḥ na mucyeta bandhanāt
viṣuvat te samākhyātam padārtha bhedanam śṛṇu

original: tyāgaṃ cānubhavaṃ caiva yojanaṃ ca pare pade // SvaT_4.334 //
analyzed: tyāgam ca anubhavam ca eva yojanam ca pare pade
bhedayet jñāna śūlena jñānam jñeyasya jñāpakam
jñāpakam bodham atulam dīpavat yotanam yatas

original: dīpahasto yathā kaścid dravyamālokya cāharet // SvaT_4.336 //
analyzed: dīpa hastaḥ yathā kaścid dravyam ālokya ca āharet

original: evaṃ jñānena ca jñeyaṃ tasmin kuryāttu saṃsthitam /
analyzed: evam jñānena ca jñeyam tasmin kuryāt tu saṃsthitam

original: jñānaṃ vai lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ jñeyatatvasya suvrate // SvaT_4.337 //
analyzed: jñānam vai lakṣaṇam proktam jñeya tatvasya suvrate

original: lakṣaṇaṃ guṇa ākhyātaḥ kalā tattvasya sarvadā /
analyzed: lakṣaṇam guṇaḥ ākhyātaḥ kalā tattvasya sarvadā

original: na guṇena vinā tattvaṃ na tattvena vinā guṇaḥ // SvaT_4.338 //
analyzed: na guṇena vinā tattvam na tattvena vinā guṇaḥ

original: guṇaṃ gṛhṇanti sarvatra na tattvaṃ gṛhyate kvacit /
analyzed: guṇam gṛhṇanti sarvatra na tattvam gṛhyate kvacid
gṛhyate hi anumānena pratyakā anubhavena ca
arthi pratyarthi bhāvena āgamena tu labhyate
āgamaḥ anantāḥ śāstra koṭayaḥ

original: śāstraṃ śabdātmakaṃ sarvaṃ śabdo haṃsaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: śāstram śabda ātmakam sarvam śabdaḥ haṃsaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
haṃsa yogaḥ purā ākhyātaḥ mātrā saṃkhyā tu atha ucyate
mātrā yogaḥ yathā ca asya pramāṇam hṛdaya ādisu
nābheḥ ūrdhvam vitasti ante kaṇṭha adhastāt ṣaṣ aṅgule
hṛdayam madhya deśe tu catur aṅgula saṃmitam
caturviṃśati tattvaiḥ tu brahmā tatra vyavasthitaḥ
kaṇṭham aṣṭa aṅgulam viddhi viṣṇuḥ tatra vyavasthitaḥ
tattva aṣṭakena saṃyuktaḥ tad ūrdhvam catur aṅgulam
māyā tattvam samāśritya rudraḥ tālu tale sthitaḥ
aṅgula dvaya mānam tu bhruvoḥ madhyam prakīrtitam
tatra īśvaraḥ sthitaḥ devi tattva dvaya samanvitaḥ

original: ekādaśāṅgule caiva mūrdhvaṃ devaḥ sadāśivaḥ // SvaT_4.346 //
analyzed: ekādaśa aṅgule ca eva mūrdhvam devaḥ sadāśivaḥ
tattva dvaya samāyuktaḥ yāvat brahmabilam gataḥ
tad ūrdhva eka aṅgulā śaktiḥ śivaḥ tatra vyavasthitaḥ

original: tvakcheṣe vyāpinī proktā samanā conmanā tataḥ /
analyzed: tvak śeṣe vyāpinī proktā samanā ca unmanā tatas

original: tatparaṃ tu paraṃ tattvaṃ pramāṇaparivarjitam // SvaT_4.348 //
analyzed: tat param tu param tattvam pramāṇa parivarjitam

original: mātrāsaṃkhyā ca yogaścā- dhunā haṃsasya kathyate /
analyzed: mātrā saṃkhyā ca dhunā haṃsasya kathyate
akāraḥ ca hakāraḥ ca dvau etau ekatas sthitau
vibhaktiḥ na anayoḥ asti māruta ambarayoḥ iva
eka mātraḥ sa vijñeyaḥ hṛdayāt saṃpravartate
ukāraḥ tu dvi mātraḥ vai kaṇṭha sthāne samuccaret
tri mātraḥ tu makāraḥ vai tālu madhya gataḥ caret
binduḥ ca eva ardha mātraḥ tu mātrārdham hi saḥ ucyate

original: bhruvormadhye sa uccāras tasya devi vidhīyate // SvaT_4.352 //
analyzed: bhruvoḥ madhye saḥ uccāraḥ tasya devi vidhīyate
tad śeṣāt ca ardhacandraḥ tu pāda mātraḥ tu asau bhavet
nirodhī ca ardha pādaḥ tu lalāṭa ante samuccaret
nādaḥ ṣoḍaśaka aṃśaḥ tu mūrdha antam yāvat uccaret
dvātriṃśat aṃśā śaktiḥ tu ṣaṭtriṃśa ante samuccaret
vyāpinī catuḥṣaṣṭi aṃśā śakteḥ tu paratas sthitā

original: samanā conmanā cordhvam amātraḥ paramo 'vyayaḥ // SvaT_4.355 //
analyzed: samanā ca unmanā ca ūrdhvam amātraḥ paramaḥ vyayaḥ
mātrā saṃkhyā ca yogaḥ ca pramāṇam parikīrtitam

original: evaṃ jñātvā varārohe padārthān bhedayettataḥ // SvaT_4.356 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā varārohe padārthān bhedayet tatas
bhedayet matra śūlena mudrā bhāva yutena ca

original: mantro vai jñānaśaktiśca mudrā caiva kriyātmikā // SvaT_4.357 //
analyzed: mantraḥ vai jñāna śaktiḥ ca mudrā ca eva kriyā ātmikā
bhāvaḥ ca manaḥ iti uktam tat manaḥ buddhi pūrvakam

original: paraśca manasā gamya icchāśaktyā tvadhiṣṭhitaḥ // SvaT_4.358 //
analyzed: paraḥ ca manasā gamyaḥ icchā śaktyā tu adhiṣṭhitaḥ

original: yatra yatra bhavedicchā jñānaṃ tatra pravartate /
analyzed: yatra yatra bhavet icchā jñānam tatra pravartate
kriyā karaṇa saṃbandhāt tattvasya uccāraṇam bhavet
kriyā karaṇa hīnasya na ca eva uccāraṇam bhavet

original: kriyā karaṇabhedena sā caiva trividhā smṛtā // SvaT_4.360 //
analyzed: kriyā karaṇa bhedena sā ca eva trividhā smṛtā
ekena uccārayet tattvam karaṇena vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: nāḍīścātha dvitīyena dvārāṇi ca nirodhayet // SvaT_4.361 //
analyzed: nāḍīḥ ca atha dvitīyena dvārāṇi ca nirodhayet

original: tṛtīyaṃ karaṇaṃ divyaṃ kṛtvā vai tattvamuccaret /
analyzed: tṛtīyam karaṇam divyam kṛtvā vai tattvam uccaret

original: pūrakaṃ kumbhakaṃ kṛtvā sarvadvārāṇi rodhayet // SvaT_4.362 //
analyzed: pūrakam kumbhakam kṛtvā sarva dvārāṇi rodhayet
guda dvāreṇa ruddhena ruddhāni atra bhavanti hi
dvāram ekam tatas ca ūrdhve pravahat tat vicintayet
nāḍayaḥ granthi padmāḥ ca ye dhomukha gatāḥ priye

original: te kumbhakena saṃruddhā vikasanti samantataḥ // SvaT_4.364 //
analyzed: te kumbhakena saṃruddhāḥ vikasanti samantataḥ

original: karaṇaṃ tu tataḥ kṛtvā lakṣaṇaṃ tasya vai śṛṇu /
analyzed: karaṇam tu tatas kṛtvā lakṣaṇam tasya vai śṛṇu

original: jihvā tu tāluke yojyā kiṃcidūrdhvaṃ na saṃspṛśet // SvaT_4.365 //
analyzed: jihvā tu tāluke yojyā kiṃcid ūrdhvam na saṃspṛśet

original: īṣatprasārya vaktraṃ tu kiṃcidoṣṭhau na saṃspṛśet /
analyzed: īṣat prasārya vaktram tu kiṃcid oṣṭhau na saṃspṛśet
danta paṅktī tathā evā iha dṛṣṭiḥ ca adhas ūrdhva varjitā
kāyam samunnatam kṛtvā karaṇam divyam ucyate

original: divyaṃ ca karaṇaṃ kṛtvā tattvasyoccāraṇaṃ kuru // SvaT_4.367 //
analyzed: divyam ca karaṇam kṛtvā tattvasya uccāraṇam kuru

original: kumbhitaścaiva yaḥ prāṇo recayettaṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
analyzed: kumbhitaḥ ca eva yaḥ prāṇaḥ recayet tam śanais śanais
nāḍayaḥ granthi padmāḥ ca dehe yāḥ saṃvyavasthitāḥ
recakena samākṣiptāḥ ūrdhvasrotaḥ bhavanti te

original: tato vai jñānaśūlena granthīnbhindan samuccaret // SvaT_4.369 //
analyzed: tatas vai jñāna śūlena granthīn bhindan samuccaret

original: bhitvā hṛtpadmagranthiṃ tu tataḥ śabdaḥ prajāyate /
analyzed: bhitvā hṛd padma granthim tu tatas śabdaḥ prajāyate
yat ākāśa samāyogāt ghoṣa śabda upamaḥ bhavet

original: bhindataḥ kaṇṭhadeśaṃ tu śabdo dhugadhugāyate // SvaT_4.371 //
analyzed: bhindataḥ kaṇṭha deśam tu śabdaḥ dhugadhugāyate
tālu madhya gataḥ prāṇaḥ yadā bhavati suvrate
bindataḥ tālu granthim tu śabdaḥ ghumaghumāyate

original: evaṃ te 'nubhavāḥ proktāḥ prāṇe carati suvrate /
analyzed: evam te nubhavāḥ proktāḥ prāṇe carati suvrate
trayaḥ te ṣṭa kalāḥ proktāḥ upari uparitas kramāt

original: tiṣṭhetsa yatra vai prāṇa ātmā tadgatimāpnuyāt /
analyzed: tiṣṭhet sa yatra vai prāṇaḥ ātmā tat gatim āpnuyāt
tat tat rūpam bhavet tasya sthāna bhāva anurūpataḥ
bhruvoḥ madhyam yadā gacchet sphoṭa śabdaḥ tu jāyate

original: binduṃ bhedayato devi śabdo dhumadhumāyate // SvaT_4.375 //
analyzed: bindum bhedayataḥ devi śabdaḥ dhumadhumāyate
kapiḥ vai nārikīlena ācāryaḥ saha bindunā

original: abhinnena kuto mokṣaṃ sabāhyābhyantaraṃ priye // SvaT_4.376 //
analyzed: abhinnena kutas mokṣam sa bāhya abhyantaram priye

original: bhitvā binduṃ tato devi ardhacandraṃ vibhedayet /
analyzed: bhitvā bindum tatas devi ardhacandram vibhedayet
bhidyataḥ ca ardhacandrasya lalāṭe jhimijhimāyate

original: ardhacandraṃ tu bhittvā vai bhedayettu nirodhinīm /
analyzed: ardhacandram tu bhittvā vai bhedayet tu nirodhinīm
tasyāḥ tu bhidyamānāyāḥ śabdaḥ simisimāyate
sthana trayam idam devi pañca pañca kalā anvitam

original: prāṇasya caratastatra yasminsthāne sa tiṣṭhati // SvaT_4.379 //
analyzed: prāṇasya carataḥ tatra yasmin sthāne sa tiṣṭhati

original: nirodhinīṃ bhedayitvā tato nādaṃ vrajedbudhaḥ // SvaT_4.380 //
analyzed: nirodhinīm bhedayitvā tatas nādam vrajet budhaḥ
vaṃśa śabda samaḥ śabdaḥ tatra sūkṣmaḥ prajāyate
bhedayet nāda saṃsthānam brahmarandhram su durbhidam
bhidyataḥ brahmarandhrasya śabdaḥ śumaśumāyate
śakti madhya gataḥ prāṇaḥ vaṃśa nāda anta saṃnibhaḥ

original: tāṃ vai tu bhedayecchaktiṃ durbhedyāṃ sarvayoginām /
analyzed: tām vai tu bhedayet śaktim durbhedyām sarva yoginām

original: bhidyate ca yadā śaktiḥ śāntaḥ śumaśumastataḥ // SvaT_4.383 //
analyzed: bhidyate ca yadā śaktiḥ śāntaḥ śumaśumaḥ tatas

original: śaktiṃ bhitvā tato devi yaccheṣaṃ vyāpinī bhavet /
analyzed: śaktim bhitvā tatas devi yat śeṣam vyāpinī bhavet
anubhāvaḥ bavet tatra sparśaḥ yadvat pipīlikā
sthāna trayam idam devi pañca pañca kalā anvitam
yatra yatra caret prāṇaḥ tad tad rūpam avāpnuyāt
yatra yatra avatiṣṭheta tām tām gatim avāpnuyāt

original: tasmādvai suprayatnena bhitvā yāti parāṃ gatim // SvaT_4.386 //
analyzed: tasmāt vai su prayatnena bhitvā yāti parām gatim

original: bhitvā vai vyāpinīṃ devi samanāyāṃ manastyajet /
analyzed: bhitvā vai vyāpinīm devi samanāyām manaḥ tyajet

original: manasā tu manastyaktvā jīvaḥ kevalatāṃ vrajet // SvaT_4.387 //
analyzed: manasā tu manaḥ tyaktvā jīvaḥ kevala tām vrajet
jīvaḥ vai kevalaḥ tatra ātma jñāna kriyā anvitaḥ
bandhana aśeṣa nirmuktaḥ sattā mātra svarūpakaḥ

original: gṛhāṇāti nāparaṃ bhāvaṃ na paraṃ ca śivātmakam // SvaT_4.389 //
analyzed: gṛhāṇāti na aparam bhāvam na param ca śiva ātmakam
para apara vinirmuktaḥ sva ātmani ātmā vyavasthitaḥ
ātma vyāptiḥ bhavet eṣā śiva vyāptiḥ atas param
bandhana aśeṣa bhāvena sarva adhva upādhi varjitā

original: aviditvā paraṃ tattvaṃ śivatvaṃ kalpitaṃ tu yaiḥ // SvaT_4.391 //
analyzed: a viditvā param tattvam śiva tvam kalpitam tu yaiḥ

original: ta ātmopāsakāḥ śaive na gacchanti paraṃ śivam /
analyzed: te ātma upāsakāḥ śaive na gacchanti param śivam
ātma tattva gatim yānti ātma tattva anurañjitāḥ
tasmāt ātmā parityājyaḥ yadi icchet śivam ātmanaḥ
ātma tattvam tatas tyājyam vidyā tatve niyojayet

original: unmanā sā tu vijñeyā manaḥ saṃkalpa ucyate /
analyzed: unmanā sā tu vijñeyā manaḥ saṃkalpaḥ ucyate

original: saṃkalpaḥ kramato jñānam unmānaṃ yugapatsthitam // SvaT_4.394 //
analyzed: saṃkalpaḥ kramatas jñānam unmānam yugapad sthitam

original: tasmāt sā tu parā vidyā yasmādanyā na vidyate /
analyzed: tasmāt sā tu parā vidyā yasmāt anyā na vidyate

original: vindate hyatra yugapat sārvajñyādiguṇān parān // SvaT_4.395 //
analyzed: vindate hi atra yugapad sārvajñya ādi guṇān parān
vedanā nādi dharmasya parama ātma tva bodhanā
varjanā parama ātma tve tasmāt vidyā iti sā ucyate
tatrasthaḥ vyañjayet tejaḥ param parama kāraṇam

original: parasmiṃstejasi vyakte tatrasthaḥ śivatāṃ vrajet // SvaT_4.397 //
analyzed: parasmin tejasi vyakte tatrasthaḥ śiva tām vrajet

original: supradīpte yathā vahnau śikhā dṛśyeta cāmbare /
analyzed: su pradīpte yathā vahnau śikhā dṛśyeta ca ambare
deha prāṇa sthitaḥ hi ātmā tadvat līyeta tad pade
tadvat eva abhimānaḥ tu kartavyaḥ daiśika uttamaiḥ

original: ahameva paro haṃsaḥ śivaḥ paramakāraṇam // SvaT_4.399 //
analyzed: aham eva paraḥ haṃsaḥ śivaḥ parama kāraṇam

original: matprāṇe sa tu paśvātmā līnaḥ samarasīgataḥ /
analyzed: mad prāṇe sa tu paśu ātmā līnaḥ samarasī gataḥ
mantra karaṇa kriyā yogāt yojayāmi pare śive
evam yaḥ vetti tattvena agni vat deha madhyatas
yadvat vahni śikhā atītā tadvat yojayate pare
tasmin yuktaḥ pare tattve sārvajñya ādi guṇa anvitaḥ

original: śiva eko bhaveddevi avibhāgena sarvataḥ // SvaT_4.402 //
analyzed: śivaḥ ekaḥ bhavet devi avibhāgena sarvatas
tattva trayam param khyātam aparam ca adhva madhya gam
bhedanam tu padārthānām tyāga anubhava yojanam

original: pūrvoktaṃ ca idaṃ sarvaṃ jñātvā tattve niyojayet /
analyzed: pūrva uktam ca idam sarvam jñātvā tattve niyojayet

original: saṃkṣepeṇa tu tattvasya vyāptiṃ śṛṇu sureśvari // SvaT_4.404 //
analyzed: saṃkṣepeṇa tu tattvasya vyāptim śṛṇu sureśvari
vidyā tattva āspadam baddhvā bindu tattva āsane sthitaḥ
nāda śakti tanuḥ ca eva vyāpinī karaṇa anvitaḥ
sarvajña tva avabodhena samanā antaścarā tu sā

original: tritatvaṃ yatparaṃ proktaṃ tena cāpūritā tanuḥ // SvaT_4.406 //
analyzed: trita tvam yat param proktam tena ca āpūritā tanuḥ
aparā sā tanuḥ sthūlā ṣaṭviṃśat tattva kalpitā
tattva trayam param yat ca sarva tattva adhva varjitam
tena ca āpūrita aśeṣam sā tattva adhva parā tanuḥ

original: evamācarate yastu ācāraṃ tu śivātmakam // SvaT_4.408 //
analyzed: evam ācarate yaḥ tu ācāram tu śiva ātmakam
śivena sahacāri tvāt ācāryaḥ tena ca ucyate

bhavati eva aiśvarī vyāptiḥ na bhavet tad adhas gatiḥ

original: tena saṃyojito jantuḥ brahmahāpi śivo bhavet // SvaT_4.410 //
analyzed: tena saṃyojitaḥ jantuḥ brahma hā api śivaḥ bhavet
tatas tena samaḥ nā asti jagati asmin carācare

original: ācāryasya ca mantrasya śivajñāne śivasya ca // SvaT_4.412 //
analyzed: ācāryasya ca mantrasya śiva jñāne śivasya ca

original: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā vai vīravandite // SvaT_4.413 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ vai vīra vandite

original: ācāryatve niyuktā ye te sarve tu śivāḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: ācārya tve niyuktāḥ ye te sarve tu śivāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: anyathā prāksvarūpeṇa ye paśyanti narādhamāḥ // SvaT_4.414 //
analyzed: anyathā prāc sva rūpeṇa ye paśyanti nara adhamāḥ

original: na tena saha saṃbhāṣā kartavyā tu śivārthinā // SvaT_4.415 //
analyzed: na tena saha saṃbhāṣā kartavyā tu śiva arthinā

original: kṛtvā saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ tena narakaṃ so 'pi gacchati /
analyzed: kṛtvā saṃbhāṣaṇam tena narakam saḥ pi gacchati

jñāna jñeya parijñānāt samastāḥ tārayiṣyati
evam ukta vidhāna jñaḥ bhāva jñaḥ ca api daiśikaḥ
pūrṇāhutyā ekayā eva asau paśūn yojayate pare
pūrṇāhuti prayogam tu kathayāmi adhunā tava
ūrdhva kāyaḥ ṛju grīvaḥ sama pādaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: nābhisthāne sruco mūlam uttānāgramukhaṃ samam // SvaT_4.420 //
analyzed: nābhi sthāne srucaḥ mūlam uttāna agra mukham samam

original: puṣpaṃ dattvā srugagre tu darbheṇa sahitau karau // SvaT_4.421 //

original: muṣṭinā caiva hastābhyāṃ gṛhītvā yatnato 'pi ca /

original: agrato dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ vāmaṃ vai pṛṣṭataḥ priye // SvaT_4.422 //

original: tato ghṛtena saṃplāvya abhimānaṃ tu kārayet // SvaT_4.423 //

original: prāṇadhāre samīkṛtya srucā dhārāṃ vinikṣipet // SvaT_4.426 //

original: yathā yathā tyajeddhārāṃ tathā prāṇaṃ samuccaret /
analyzed: yathā yathā tyajet dhārām tathā prāṇam samuccaret

analyzed: varṇa tām yāti ṣaḍvidha adhva mayaḥ tu saḥ

tasmāt māntre parāmarśe heya upādeyataḥ sthitāḥ

original: akāraśca ukāraśca makāro bindureva ca // SvaT_4.430 //
analyzed: akāraḥ ca ukāraḥ ca makāraḥ binduḥ eva ca

original: śaktiśca vyāpinī hyetāḥ samanā ca tataḥ param // SvaT_4.431 //
analyzed: śaktiḥ ca vyāpinī hi etāḥ samanā ca tatas param

atra pāśa upari hi ātmā vyoma vat bindu cit su nirmalaḥ

ātmavyāptiḥ bhavet eṣā śivavyāptiḥ tatas nyathā

original: ato dharmisvabhāvo hi śivaḥ śāntaśca paṭhyate /

original: sruco randhreṇa taddravyaṃ yāvadvahnau prayujyate // SvaT_4.438 //

anena eva tu kālena bahis kumbhaka vṛttinā

guṇān āpādayet paścāt ṣaṭ aṅga parimā āhutīn

original: sarvajño vai bhava svāhā paritṛptastathaiva ca /

original: tatrānantāsanaṃ nyasya mūrtibhūtaṃ śiśuṃ nyaset // SvaT_4.464 //

original: utthāpya hastau saṃgṛhya maṇḍale tu praveśayet /

original: jānubhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ gatvā saṃpūjya bhairavaṃ tataḥ // SvaT_4.473 //

uttavāraṇi mūlam tu puṣya ṛkṣeṇa tu grāhayet

śravaṇa akṣi malam lālā rudhira indriya saṃyutam
a pravāse pradātavyam mriyate viraheṇa sā
ṣaṣṭim kanaka bījāni ṣoḍaśa maṇi candrikāḥ
nara godanta saṃyuktāḥ pradadyāt yasya bhāminī
eṣa kāpālikaḥ yogaḥ gacchantam anugacchati
śveta arka mūlam mañjiṣṭhā caṭakasya śiraḥ tathā
gṛha udbhavasya kuṣṭham ca sva rakta indriya saṃyutam
bhakṣye pāne pradātavyam vaśīkaraṇam uttamam

original: mohanā caiva kāntārī mayūraśikhayā yutā // SvaT_6.65 //
analyzed: mohanā ca eva kāntārī mayūraśikhayā yutā
ātma lālā indriyaiḥ yuktam vaśīkaraṇam uttamam

original: lajjālukā ca gorambhā caṇḍālīkarmakaṃ tathā // SvaT_6.66 //
analyzed: ca
nāga indra pada miśram tat ātma bīja samanvitam

original: eṣa yogavaro divyo dīyate yasya suvrate // SvaT_6.67 //
analyzed: eṣa yoga varaḥ divyaḥ dīyate yasya suvrate
madhureṇa samāyuktaḥ yāvat āyuḥ vaśī sa tu
caṇakāḥ māṣa mudgāḥ ca apānena vinirgatāḥ

original: vāntaṃ ghṛtaṃ tathā retaḥ strīrajo hṛnmalaṃ tathā /
analyzed: vāntam ghṛtam tathā retaḥ strī rajaḥ hṛd malam tathā

original: mūtraṃ raktaṃ tathā keśo lālā caiva varānane // SvaT_6.69 //
analyzed: mūtram raktam tathā keśaḥ lālā ca eva varānane

original: mohanā viṣṇukrāntā ca dhātrī caivaikataḥ sthitā // SvaT_6.70 //
analyzed: mohanā viṣṇukrāntā ca dhātrī ca eva ekatas sthitā
puṣya ṛkṣeṇa niyuñjīta garvitānām varānane
bhakṣye pāne pradātavyaḥ yogaḥ tridaśa pūjitaḥ
uccāṭanam pravakṣyāmi śatrūṇām garvita ātmanām
kāka ulūkasya pakṣān ca khara uṣṭra mūtra mṛttikā
kṛtvā pratikṛtim prājñaḥ kāka raktena lepayet

original: kākolūkasya pakṣāṃśca gude tasya vinikṣipet // SvaT_6.73 //
analyzed: kāka ulūkasya pakṣān ca gude tasya vinikṣipet
tām catuṣpathe nikhanet śmaśāna agnim atha upari
prajvālya homayet tatra kākapakṣān ca suvrate
udbhrānta patra sahitān khara mūtreṇa bhāvitān
yasya nāma samuddiśya yakāra ādi antara udhitam
mantra avasāne vinyastam visarga antam pracāṭayet
bhramate kāka vat pṛthvīm śatruḥ vyādhi nipīḍitaḥ

original: piṇyākaṃ nimbapattrāṇi mṛtkiṇvaṃ tu tuṣāṇi ca /
analyzed: piṇyākam nimba pattrāṇi mṛtkiṇvam tu tuṣāṇi ca

original: śatroḥ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā akṣapuṣpaistu veṣṭitām // SvaT_6.77 //
analyzed: śatroḥ pratikṛtim kṛtvā akṣa puṣpaiḥ tu veṣṭitām

original: śmaśāne nikhanettāṃ tu vahniṃ prajvālya copari /
analyzed: śmaśāne nikhanet tām tu vahnim prajvālya ca upari

original: puṣpairvibhītatarujair yasya nāmnā tu homayet // SvaT_6.78 //
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ vibhīta taru jaiḥ yasya nāmnā tu homayet
vidviṣṭaḥ vai bhavet śatruḥ kāmadeva samaḥ pi yaḥ
hṛtvā tu aṣṭaśatam devi subhagaḥ samprajāyate
jāti kuṭmalakaiḥ miśraiḥ trimadhu aktaiḥ tilaiḥ hutaiḥ
subhaga tvam avāpnoti rūpa hīnaḥ u pi yaḥ naraḥ
tilaiḥ lavaṇa sammiśraiḥ trimadhu aktaiḥ hutaiḥ priyaiḥ
sapta ahāt vaśam āyāti yā strī rūpeṇa garvitā
rājikā lavaṇam ca eva madhu kṣīra ghṛta plutam
homayet nāma sammiśram yasya ākarṣet tu tam drutam

original: narasya rocanāṃ gṛhya dviradasya madena tu // SvaT_6.83 //
analyzed: narasya rocanām gṛhya dviradasya madena tu
bhāvayitvā abhimantrya etat mantreṇa aṣṭaśatam japet

original: snāne vilepane madye gandhe vā yasya dīyate // SvaT_6.84 //
analyzed: snāne vilepane madye gandhe vā yasya dīyate

original: sa vaśyo bhavati kṣipraṃ dhanadaḥ prāṇadastathā /
analyzed: sa vaśyaḥ bhavati kṣipram dhana daḥ prāṇa daḥ tathā
athavā mārayet kṣipram śatrum niścitam ātmanaḥ
apakāra śataiḥ yuktam kṛtaghnam duṣṭa cetasam
kapāla dvayam ādāya nāma śatroḥ samālikhet
kapāla sampuṭa stham tat viṣa aṅgāreṇa bhāvitam
rudhireṇa samāyuktam hum phaṭkāra vidarbhitam
mahāpretavanam gatvā svacchandam pūjayet tatas
kṛṣṇa mālya upahāraiḥ ca tatas karma samārabhet

original: vijñāpya bhairavaṃ devaṃ śatruṃ me vinipātaya /
analyzed: vijñāpya bhairavam devam śatrum me vinipātaya
anujñātaḥ tu devena gṛhittvā tad śiraḥ dvayam
tatra gatvā mahādevi kapāla āsana saṃsthitaḥ
tatrasthaḥ roṣa sampūrṇaḥ dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ

original: ātmano bhairavaṃ rūpaṃ jñātvā ghoraṃ subhīṣaṇam /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ bhairavam rūpam jñātvā ghoram su bhīṣaṇam
kruddhaḥ samuccaret mantrī dvātriṃśa akṣara sammitam
vilomena mahābhāge śatru nāma tatas ntagam
hum phaṭ dvayam samuccārya ka ādye ca āsphālayet bhṛśam
khaṇḍaśas cūrṇite yāvat tāvat śatuḥ vinaśyati
sapta rātreṇa deveśi prayogaḥ tu anivartakaḥ
evam śata sahasrāṇi anya kalpa utthitāni ca
prayogāṇām karoti eṣa mantrarāja īśvara īśvaraḥ
anuloma gatam devam vauṣatkāra anta saṃsthitam

original: kṣīraṃ tu homayeddevi śāntyarthe hitakārakam // SvaT_6.95 //
analyzed: kṣīram tu homayet devi śānti arthe hita kārakam
vaṣa da āpyāyane śastam svāhā antam vaśa karmaṇi

original: mantrāṇāṃ tarpaṇārthaṃ ca natyantaṃ cārcane smṛtam // SvaT_6.96 //
analyzed: mantrāṇām tarpaṇa artham ca nati antam ca arcane smṛtam
etat hi kathitam devi sādhakasya sumedhasaḥ
kriyā kāla aṃśa yuktasya akleśāt tu sukha āvaham
iti svacchandatantre pañca praṇava adhikāraḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ paṭalaḥ
saptamaḥ paṭalaḥ
kriyā jñātā mayā deva tvad prasādāt maheśvara

original: kālāṃśakaṃ ca deveśa kathayasva prasārataḥ // SvaT_7.1 //
analyzed: kāla aṃśakam ca deveśa kathayasva prasārataḥ
kālaḥ dvidhā atra vijñeyaḥ sauraḥ ca ādhyātmikaḥ priye

original: suvārakaraṇe lagne suyoge sudine priye // SvaT_7.2 //
analyzed: su vāra karaṇe lagne su yoge su dine priye
tu dakṣiṇāyanam uttaram
grahaṇam candra sūryābhyām kālaḥ ca ṛtavaḥ tathā

original: pakṣo māsaśca velā vi- ṣuvadrāśyantaraṃ tathā /
analyzed: pakṣaḥ māsaḥ ca velā vi ṣuvat rāśi antaram tathā

original: puṇyāpuṇyodayo devi saura eṣa prakīrtitaḥ // SvaT_7.4 //
analyzed: puṇya apuṇya udayaḥ devi sauraḥ eṣa prakīrtitaḥ
ādhyātmikam punar devi kathayāmi nibodha me
ṣāṭkośikaḥ tu yaḥ dehaḥ bhūta tanmātra saṃyutaḥ
sa manaḥ buddhi ahaṅkāra buddhi karma indriyaiḥ guṇaiḥ
sarva tattvaiḥ tathā devaiḥ samadhiṣṭhita vigrahaḥ
tatra ātmā prabhu śaktiḥ ca vāyuḥ vai nāḍibhiḥ caran

original: nābhyadhomeḍhrakande ca sthitā vai nābhimadhyataḥ // SvaT_7.7 //
analyzed: nābhi adhas meḍhra kande ca sthitāḥ vai nābhi madhyataḥ
tasmāt vinirgatāḥ nāḍyaḥ tiryak ūrdhvam adhas priye

original: cakravat saṃsthitāstatra pradhānā daśa nāḍayaḥ // SvaT_7.8 //
analyzed: cakra vat saṃsthitāḥ tatra pradhānāḥ daśa nāḍayaḥ
dvāsaptati sahasrāṇi nāḍyaḥ tābhyaḥ vinirgatāḥ
punar vinirgatāḥ ca anyāḥ ābhyaḥ pi anyāḥ punar punar
yāvatyaḥ roma koṭyaḥ tu tāvatyaḥ nāḍayaḥ smṛtāḥ

original: yathā parṇa palāśasya vyāptaṃ sarvatra tantubhiḥ // SvaT_7.10 //
analyzed: yathā parṇa palāśasya vyāptam sarvatra tantubhiḥ
śarīram sarva jantūnām tadvat vyāptam tu nāḍibhiḥ
māruta āpūritāḥ sarvāḥ ātma śakti carāḥ sadā
pṛthak vṛtti prabhedena bhinnāḥ cāra prabhedataḥ
cāra vṛtti prabhedena saṃjñā bhedaḥ varānane

original: nāḍināṃ caiva vāyūnāṃ bhedo jñeyaḥ sahasraśaḥ /
analyzed: nāḍinām ca eva vāyūnām bhedaḥ jñeyaḥ sahasraśas

original: pradhānā daśa yāḥ proktā nāḍayaśca varānane // SvaT_7.13 //
analyzed: pradhānāḥ daśa yāḥ proktāḥ nāḍayaḥ ca varānane

original: tāsāṃ madhye tu deveśi vāyavo ye vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: tāsām madhye tu deveśi vāyavaḥ ye vyavasthitāḥ

original: nāḍīnāṃ caiva vāyūnāṃ saṃjñāvṛttīrnibodha me // SvaT_7.14 //
analyzed: nāḍīnām ca eva vāyūnām saṃjñā vṛttīḥ nibodha me

original: iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumnā ca tṛtīyakā /
analyzed: iḍā ca piṅgalā ca eva suṣumnā ca tṛtīyakā

original: gāndhārī hastijihvā ca pūṣā caiva yaśasvinī // SvaT_7.15 //
analyzed: gāndhārī hastijihvā ca pūṣā ca eva yaśasvinī
alambusā kuhūḥ ca eva śaṃkhinī daśamī smṛtā

original: etāḥ prāṇavahāḥ proktāḥ pradhānā daśa nāḍayaḥ // SvaT_7.16 //
analyzed: etāḥ prāṇa vahāḥ proktāḥ pradhānāḥ daśa nāḍayaḥ

original: prāṇo 'pānaḥ samānaśca udāno vyāna eva ca /
analyzed: prāṇaḥ pānaḥ samānaḥ ca udānaḥ vyānaḥ eva ca

original: nāgaḥ kūrmo 'tha kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ // SvaT_7.17 //
analyzed: nāgaḥ kūrmaḥ tha kṛkaraḥ devadattaḥ dhanañjayaḥ
vāyavaḥ nāḍayaḥ ca eva cakra vat saṃsthitāḥ priye

original: tāsu saṃcarataḥ siddhiṃ yogaṃ caiva varānane // SvaT_7.18 //
analyzed: tāsu saṃcarataḥ siddhim yogam ca eva varānane
japataḥ ca varārohe japa siddhim avāpnuyāt

original: daśānāṃ tu paraṃ devi nāḍītrayamudāhṛtam // SvaT_7.19 //
analyzed: daśānām tu param devi nāḍī trayam udāhṛtam

original: bindunādātmake dve vai madhye śaktyātmikā smṛtā /
analyzed: bindu nāda ātmake dve vai madhye śakti ātmikā smṛtā

original: hṛccakre tu samākhyātāḥ sādhakānāṃ hitāvahāḥ // SvaT_7.20 //
analyzed: hṛccakre tu samākhyātāḥ sādhakānām hita āvahāḥ
prāṇaḥ vai carate tāsu ahar rātra vibhāgataḥ

original: tathā te kathayiṣyāmi pravibhajya yathāsphuṭam // SvaT_7.21 //
analyzed: tathā te kathayiṣyāmi pravibhajya yathāsphuṭam
prabhu śakti samākṛṣṭāḥ marut prāṇa ātma saṃsthitāḥ
trayaḥ ete vibhāgena saṃcarante samantataḥ
adhas ūrdhvam vahet yasmāt sarva nāḍīḥ pravāhayan
vṛtti saṃjñā prabhedena varṇa rūpāṇi anekadhā
dvāsaptati sahasrebhyaḥ jāyante daśa vai priye

original: koṭidhāto varārohe sa ekaḥ saṃvyavasthitaḥ // SvaT_7.24 //
analyzed: koṭi dhātar varārohe saḥ ekaḥ saṃvyavasthitaḥ
prāṇa apāna mayaḥ prāṇaḥ visarga āpūraṇam prati
nityam āpūrayan eva prāṇinām urasi sthitaḥ

original: prāṇanaṃ kurute yasmāt tasmāt prāṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇanam kurute yasmāt tasmāt prāṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: ahorātragatiṃ prāṇe adhunā kathayāmi te // SvaT_7.26 //
analyzed: ahorātra gatim prāṇe adhunā kathayāmi te

original: tuṭayaḥ ṣoḍaśa prāṇe pūrvaṃ hi kathitā mayā /
analyzed: tuṭayaḥ ṣoḍaśa prāṇe pūrvam hi kathitāḥ mayā

original: bāhye naiva tu kālena te lavāḥ parikīrtitāḥ // SvaT_7.27 //
analyzed: bāhye nā eva tu kālena te lavāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
tābhiḥ catasṛbhiḥ devi prāṇe yāmaḥ vidhīyate

original: taireva praharairdevi caturbhistu dinaṃ bhavet // SvaT_7.28 //
analyzed: taiḥ eva praharaiḥ devi caturbhiḥ tu dinam bhavet

original: śivo dharmeṇa haṃsastu sūryā haṃsaḥ prabhānvitaḥ // SvaT_7.29 //
analyzed: śivaḥ dharmeṇa haṃsaḥ tu sūryāḥ haṃsaḥ prabhā anvitaḥ

original: ātmā vai haṃsa ityuktaḥ prāṇo haṃsasamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā vai haṃsaḥ iti uktaḥ prāṇaḥ haṃsa samanvitaḥ
tasya udayāt kalet kālaḥ grahāṇām udayaḥ bhavet
ṛkṣāṇi rāśayaḥ ca eva tārāḥ tu aṃśāḥ tathā eva ca

original: prāṇe vai udayantyete ahorātreṇa suvrate // SvaT_7.31 //
analyzed: prāṇe vai udayanti ete ahorātreṇa suvrate
vibhāgam kathayāmi te

original: hṛdayordhve tu kaṇṭhādho yāvadvai pravahet priye // SvaT_7.32 //
analyzed: hṛdaya ūrdhve tu kaṇṭha adhas yāvat vai pravahet priye

original: aṅgulena vihīne tu prathamaḥ praharaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgulena vihīne tu prathamaḥ praharaḥ smṛtaḥ
dvitīyaḥ ūrdhve vijñeyaḥ madhyāhnaḥ tālu madhyataḥ

original: atra homo japo dhyānaṃ kṛtaṃ vai mokṣadaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: atra homaḥ japaḥ dhyānam kṛtam vai mokṣa dam bhavet
nāsā agrya tri aṅgula ūrdhve tu yāvat prāptaḥ tu suvrate
praharaḥ tu tṛtīyaḥ sau bhavet vai varavarṇini

original: śaktyante ca caturthastu praharo 'haḥ prakīrtitam // SvaT_7.35 //
analyzed: śakti ante ca caturthaḥ tu praharaḥ haḥ prakīrtitam

original: tato 'stamayasandhyātra tuṭyardhaṃ tu bhavet priye // SvaT_7.36 //
analyzed: tatas stamaya sandhyā atra tuṭi ardham tu bhavet priye
tad kālam tu vilambya evam punar ca adhas pravartate

original: sa ca candrodayo devi rajanī ca vidhīyate // SvaT_7.37 //
analyzed: sa ca candra udayaḥ devi rajanī ca vidhīyate
pūrva ukta krama yogena yāmeṣu evam carati asau
tāluke ca ardha rātraḥ tu punar evam vidhīyate
hṛd padmam tu yadā prāptaḥ prabhāta samayaḥ tadā

original: tuṭyardhaṃ tu varārohe pūrvasaṃdhyā bhavettataḥ // SvaT_7.39 //
analyzed: tuṭi ardham tu varārohe pūrvasaṃdhyā bhavet tatas
tasmāt samudayaḥ ca eva sūryasya sa bhavet punar

original: pūrvavat kramayogena sa careddhi sadā śubhe // SvaT_7.40 //
analyzed: pūrvavat krama yogena sa caret hi sadā śubhe
vāsare tu caret sūryaḥ dhārāyām saṃcaret śaśī

original: candrasūryodayo hyeṣa mayā te parikīrtitaḥ // SvaT_7.41 //
analyzed: candra sūrya udayaḥ hi eṣa mayā te parikīrtitaḥ
bhauma ādyāḥ ca grahāḥ hi evam caranti pravibhāgaśaḥ

original: prāṇe cāpyudayantyete prahare prahare priye // SvaT_7.42 //
analyzed: prāṇe ca api udayanti ete prahare prahare priye
velā vāraḥ bhavet yasya sa caret prahara dvayam
rāhuḥ carati somena ketuḥ carati bhāsvatā

original: ye grahāste ca vai nāgā lokapālāṣṭakaṃ ca te /
analyzed: ye grahāḥ te ca vai nāgāḥ lokapāla aṣṭakam ca te

original: mūrtayaścaiva te cāṣṭāv aṣṭau te ca gaṇeśvarāḥ // SvaT_7.44 //
analyzed: mūrtayaḥ ca eva te ca aṣṭau aṣṭau te ca gaṇeśvarāḥ

original: te ca pañcāṣṭakā rudrās tathā yogāṣṭakāḥ pare /
analyzed: te ca pañca aṣṭakāḥ rudrāḥ tathā yoga aṣṭakāḥ pare
ananta ādi śikhaṇḍi antāḥ te ca vidyeśvara aṣṭakāḥ
sakala ādyāni tattvāni sthitāni paratas tu iha

original: pūrvoktā bhairavāścāṣṭau sarve te ca vyavasthitāḥ // SvaT_7.46 //
analyzed: pūrva uktāḥ bhairavāḥ ca aṣṭau sarve te ca vyavasthitāḥ
graha ādīn samadhiṣṭhāya sarveṣu udaya kārakāḥ

original: rāśibhiḥ saha nakṣatrais ta udyanti aharniśam // SvaT_7.47 //
analyzed: rāśibhiḥ saha nakṣatraiḥ te udyanti aharniśam
madhyāhne ca ardharātre ca udayaḥ bhijitaḥ bhavet

original: abhīpsitaṃ phalaṃ tatra sādhakānāṃ bhavediha // SvaT_7.48 //
analyzed: abhīpsitam phalam tatra sādhakānām bhavet iha
ahorātra vibhāgaḥ yam evam te kathitaḥ mayā

original: adhunā pakṣamāsāṃśca varṣāṇi kathayāmi te // SvaT_7.49 //
analyzed: adhunā pakṣa māsān ca varṣāṇi kathayāmi te
ādhyātmika ahorātreṇa bāhye kāṣṭhā vidhīyate

original: māsenādhyātmikenaiva bāhye caiva kalā bhavet // SvaT_7.50 //
analyzed: māsena ādhyātmikena eva bāhye ca eva kalā bhavet
tatra triṃśat ahorātrāḥ māsaḥ tu varavarṇini
bāhye ghaṭikā bhavet
śatāni trīṇi ahar trātrāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ eva tathā adhikā

original: varṣametat samākhyātaṃ bāhye vai ghaṭikā ca sā // SvaT_7.52 //
analyzed: varṣam etat samākhyātam bāhye vai ghaṭikā ca sā

original: ghaṭikāḥ ṣaṣṭistvahorātre bāhye tu pravahanti vai /
analyzed: ghaṭikāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ tu ahorātre bāhye tu pravahanti vai

original: tā evāntaracāreṇa ṣaṣṭiḥ saṃvatsarāḥ smṛtāḥ // SvaT_7.53 //
analyzed: tāḥ eva antara cāreṇa ṣaṣṭiḥ saṃvatsarāḥ smṛtāḥ
prāṇa saṃkhyām punar teṣu kathayāmi adhunā tava
ṣaḍ śatāni varārohe sahasrāṇi ekaviṃśatiḥ
ahorātreṇa bāhyena adhyātmam tu saradhipe

original: prāṇasaṃkhyā samākhyātā jñātavyā sādhakena tu // SvaT_7.55 //
analyzed: prāṇa saṃkhyā samākhyātā jñātavyā sādhakena tu
sadā līnaḥ sādhakaḥ para tattva vid
tasya ayam japaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ siddhi mukti phala pradaḥ
adhas pravahaṇe siddhiḥ hṛd padmam yāvat āgataḥ

original: muktiścaiva bhavedūrdhve paratattve tu suvrate // SvaT_7.57 //
analyzed: muktiḥ ca eva bhavet ūrdhve para tattve tu suvrate
manaḥ pi anyatra nikṣiptam cakṣuḥ anyatra pātitam

original: yathā pravartate prāṇas tv ayatnādeva sarvadā // SvaT_7.58 //
analyzed: yathā pravartate prāṇaḥ tu ayatnāt eva sarvadā
na asya uccārayitā kaścid pratihantā na vidyate
svayam uccarate haṃsaḥ prāṇinām urasi sthitaḥ

original: māsavatsarasaṃkhyā tu eṣā te kathitā mayā /
analyzed: māsa vatsara saṃkhyā tu eṣā te kathitā mayā

original: candrasūryoparāgaṃ tu kathayāmi tataḥ param // SvaT_7.60 //
analyzed: candra sūrya uparāgam tu kathayāmi tatas param
ahorātraḥ tu yaḥ proktaḥ prāṇe smin surasundari

original: sa eva pakṣadvitayaṃ māsaṃ ca kathayāmi te // SvaT_7.61 //
analyzed: saḥ eva pakṣa dvitayam māsam ca kathayāmi te
tuṭi ardham ca api adhas ca ūrdhvam viśramaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: madhye pañcadaśoktā yās tithayastāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // SvaT_7.62 //
analyzed: madhye pañcadaśa uktāḥ yāḥ tithayaḥ tāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: prathamodaye tu hṛtpadmāt tuṭyardhaṃ tu dinaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: prathama udaye tu hṛd padmāt tuṭi ardham tu dinam bhavet

original: dvitīye caiva tuṭyardhe yadā carati śarvarī // SvaT_7.63 //
analyzed: dvitīye ca eva tuṭi ardhe yadā carati śarvarī
rāśayaḥ graha nakṣatrāṇi udayanti yathākramam
asmin evam ahorātre pūrvavat ca varānane

original: tuṭibhiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ pakṣaḥ sa tu vidhīyate /
analyzed: tuṭibhiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ pakṣaḥ sa tu vidhīyate

original: tithicchede ṛṇaṃ jñeyaṃ vṛddhau caiva dhanaṃ bhavet // SvaT_7.65 //
analyzed: tithi chede ṛṇam jñeyam vṛddhau ca eva dhanam bhavet

original: ṛṇaṃ caiva bhavetkāso niḥśvāso dhana ucyate /
analyzed: ṛṇam ca eva bhavet kāsaḥ niḥśvāsaḥ dhanaḥ ucyate
bhavet
krūra karmāṇi vai tatra kurvan siddhim avāpnuyāt

original: śubhakarmāṇi kṛṣṇe ca na ca siddhyanti suvrate // SvaT_7.67 //
analyzed: śubha karmāṇi kṛṣṇe ca na ca siddhyanti suvrate

original: śaktiṃ vai viśati prāṇe yā tuṭistu vidhīyate /
analyzed: śaktim vai viśati prāṇe yā tuṭiḥ tu vidhīyate

original: amāvasyā tu sā jñeyā kṛṣṇapakṣe varānane // SvaT_7.68 //
analyzed: amāvasyā tu sā jñeyā kṛṣṇa pakṣe varānane
śakteḥ madhya ūrdhva bhāge tu tuṭi ardham yat prakīrtitam
pakṣasaṃdhiḥ tu asau jñeyaḥ māvasya ardha pratipadā

original: tithicchedena vai tatra sūryasya grahaṇaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tithi chedena vai tatra sūryasya grahaṇam bhavet

original: ravibimbāntare devi candrabimbaṃ tadā bhavet // SvaT_7.70 //
analyzed: ravi bimba antare devi candra bimbam tadā bhavet
tad antare bhavet rāhuḥ amṛta arthī varānane

original: amṛtaṃ sravate candro rāhuśca grasate tu tam // SvaT_7.71 //
analyzed: amṛtam sravate candraḥ rāhuḥ ca grasate tu tam

original: pītvā tyajati tadlimbaṃ tadā muktaḥ sa ucyate /
analyzed: pītvā tyajati tad limbam tadā muktaḥ saḥ ucyate
āditya grahaṇam ca eva loke tat upadiśyate

original: rāhurādityacandrau ca traya ete grahā yadā /
analyzed: rāhuḥ āditya candrau ca trayaḥ ete grahāḥ yadā
dṛśyante samavāyena tat mahāgrahaṇam bhavet
sa kālaḥ sarva lokānām mahā puṇyatamaḥ bhavet

original: tatra snānaṃ tathā dānaṃ pūjāhomajapādikam // SvaT_7.74 //
analyzed: tatra snānam tathā dānam pūjā homa japa ādikam
yat kṛtam sādhakaiḥ devi tat ananta phalam bhavet

original: tāṃ caivārdhatuṭiṃ tyaktvā śuklapakṣodayo bhavet // SvaT_7.75 //
analyzed: tām ca eva ardha tuṭim tyaktvā śukla pakṣa udayaḥ bhavet
śakti garbhāt adhas sṛṣṭiḥ tasmāt vṛddhiḥ prajāyate

original: tadārabhya ca karmāṇi śubhānyabhyudayāni ca // SvaT_7.76 //
analyzed: tat ārabhya ca karmāṇi śubhāni abhyudayāni ca
dhyāna mantra ādi yuktasya siddhiḥ te na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: prāṇahaṃso yadā prāptas tv adhastāṃ prathamāṃ tuṭim // SvaT_7.77 //
analyzed: prāṇa haṃsaḥ yadā prāptaḥ tu adhastām prathamām tuṭim
pūrvam ardham tu ahar proktam tuṭi ardham aparam niśā

original: rāśayo graha ṛksāṇi yogāśca karaṇāni ca // SvaT_7.78 //
analyzed: rāśayaḥ grahaḥ ṛksāṇi yogāḥ ca karaṇāni ca
pūrvavat krama yogena tāni udyanti tu aharniśam

original: pratipatsā tu vijñeyā candraścaikakalo bhavet // SvaT_7.79 //
analyzed: pratipad sā tu vijñeyā candraḥ ca eka kalaḥ bhavet

original: dvitīyāyāṃ dvitīyā tu vṛddhimeti krameṇa tu /
analyzed: dvitīyāyām dvitīyā tu vṛddhim eti krameṇa tu
tithayaḥ ca evam ārabhya yāvat pañcadaśī tuṭi

original: paurṇamāsī tu vijñeyā tithirvai sādhakena tu /
analyzed: paurṇamāsī tu vijñeyā tithiḥ vai sādhakena tu

original: tatra pūjā japo dhyānaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ saphalaṃ bhavet // SvaT_7.81 //
analyzed: tatra pūjā japaḥ dhyānam saṃpūrṇam sa phalam bhavet
saṃpūrṇaḥ ca bhavet tasyām candraḥ vai cāru locane

original: tasyāścārdhatuṭiryā tu pakṣasaṃdhyā tu sā smṛtā // SvaT_7.82 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca ardha tuṭiḥ yā tu pakṣa saṃdhyā tu sā smṛtā
tasya ardham paurṇamāsī tu pratipad ardhena saṃsthitā

original: hṛtpadmasaṃdhimadhye tu somasya grahaṇaṃ bhavet // SvaT_7.83 //
analyzed: hṛd padma saṃdhi madhye tu somasya grahaṇam bhavet
ādityena vinā loke soma grahaṇam ucyate
tatra eva ca mahat puṇyam dhyāna homa japa ādibhiḥ
pakṣa dvaye pi deveśi grahaṇam candra sūryayoḥ
hi etat sādhakasya abhiyoginaḥ
mokṣaḥ ca eva punar bhadre pakṣa dvaya samujjhitaḥ
pakṣa dvayam parityajya pūva ukta karaṇena tu
unmanyante sthitaḥ nityam para vṛtti avalambakaḥ

original: parityajya tvadhaḥ sarvaṃ dhyānamāsthāya yojayet // SvaT_7.87 //
analyzed: parityajya tu adhas sarvam dhyānam āsthāya yojayet

original: tasya muktirna saṃdehas tv anyathā siddhibhāgbhavet /
analyzed: tasya muktiḥ na saṃdehaḥ tu anyathā siddhi bhāj bhavet
pakṣa dvaye grahaṇam bhavet vai sarva dehinām
evam etat samākhyātam yāvat āyuḥ varānane
atra eva adhyātma ahar rātre tu atha abda udayaḥ ucyate
hṛd padmāt ūrdhva paryantam rāśayaḥ ṣaṭ vyavasthitāḥ
aṅgulaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ekaikaḥ hṛd padma ādyāva śaktitaḥ

original: aṅgule aṅgule hyatra tithayaḥ pañca saṃsthitāḥ /
analyzed: aṅgule aṅgule hi atra tithayaḥ pañca saṃsthitāḥ

original: tasyāpyardhaṃ dinaṃ pūrvam aparārdhaṃ niśā bhavet // SvaT_7.91 //
analyzed: tasya api ardham dinam pūrvam apara ardham niśā bhavet
ṣaṣ pañcakāḥ tithīnām ye te ḥorātrāḥ tu māsikāḥ

original: triṃśatā tairahorātrair dvipakṣo māsa ucyate // SvaT_7.92 //
analyzed: triṃśatā taiḥ ahorātraiḥ dvi pakṣaḥ māsaḥ ucyate
māsi rāśi udaye hi eṣa adhas ūrdhva prāṇa saṃcare
hṛdayāt udaya sthānāt saṃkrāntiḥ makare sthitā
ṣaṣ aṅgulāni adhas tyaktvā kumbhe saṃkramate punar

original: kaṇṭhordhve dvyaṅgulaṃ tyaktvā mīne saṃkramate punaḥ // SvaT_7.94 //
analyzed: kaṇṭha ūrdhve dvi aṅgulam tyaktvā mīne saṃkramate punar
gala ūrdhva āt yāvat tālu antam tyaktvā meṣe saṃkramet

original: nāsāntaṃ yāvatsaṃkrāntir aṅgulāni ṣaḍeva hi // SvaT_7.95 //
analyzed: nāsā antam yāvat saṃkrāntiḥ aṅgulāni ṣaḍ eva hi
eṣā vai viṣu saṃkrāntiḥ uttare saṃvyavasthitā

original: nāsāgraṃ tu parityajya prāṇahaṃso vṛṣe caret /
analyzed: nāsā agram tu parityajya prāṇa haṃsaḥ vṛṣe caret
ṣaṣ aṅgulāni saṃtyajya saṃkramet mithune punar
śakti antam yāvat adhvānam saṃkrāntiḥ mithune smṛtā

original: makarācca samārabhya mithunāntaṃ ca suvrate // SvaT_7.98 //
analyzed: makarāt ca samārabhya mithuna antam ca suvrate
uttarayaṇam atra etat aihikī siddhi varjitam

original: snānaṃ dhyānaṃ tathā dānaṃ pūjāhomajapādikam // SvaT_7.99 //
analyzed: snānam dhyānam tathā dānam pūjā homa japa ādikam
sādhaka ādyaiḥ kṛtam yat ca sahastra anekadhā bhavet
iha janmani na āpnoti paratra eva upatiṣṭhate
dināni tatra vardhante makarāt mithuna antikam
tad kāle saṃharet vīryam jagati asmin carācare
haṃsaḥ raśmibhiḥ ākṛṣya garbha stham kārayet tu tam
garbha sthān ekadhā rūpam yat gṛhītam purātanam
karkaṭa ādeḥ samārabhya sarvam varṣati tat punar
tasmāt ārabhya makarāt dhyāna homa japa ādikam
para loka nimittāya tat ananta phalam bhavet
puraścaryā nimittāya mantra graha vratam ca yat
mīna ādau ārabhet sarvam mantra siddhi artham ātmanaḥ
bāhye taravaḥ loke ṛtu ṣaṭka samīritam
kusuma ānandam āyānti kusumāyudha dīpakam
mantrāḥ kāla anurūpeṇa vrata caryā ādinā īritāḥ
jñeya bodha pradīptāḥ ca siddhi mukti prasādhakāḥ
haṃsa bodha pradīptaḥ tu galake mīnam āśritaḥ

original: śabdasaṃvedanaṃ tasya sphuṭaṃ tatra bhavedyataḥ // SvaT_7.108 //
analyzed: śabda saṃvedanam tasya sphuṭam tatra bhavet yatas
tat ārabhya japāt tasya sarvam eva pravartate

original: mithunāntaṃ ca deveśi tataḥ siddhiḥ prajāyate // SvaT_7.109 //
analyzed: mithuna antam ca deveśi tatas siddhiḥ prajāyate
sa haṃsaḥ binduśakti sthaḥ siddhidvāraiḥ adhomukhaḥ

original: karkaṭādau sa varṣettu tulāntaṃ tālukāntare // SvaT_7.110 //
analyzed: karkaṭa ādau sa varṣet tu tulā antam tālukā antare
kaṇṭhāt adhas tatas dehī hṛd padmāt sarvatas vrajet
tasmāt iha ātma siddhi artham puṣṭi artham ca eva sādhayet
dakṣiṇāyana je kāle yasmāt sṛṣṭiḥ prajāyate

original: śaktyadho hṛdaye haṃsaḥ saṃkrametkarkaṭe priye // SvaT_7.112 //
analyzed: śakti adhas hṛdaye haṃsaḥ saṃkramet karkaṭe priye
ṣaṣ aṅgulāni saṃtyajya siṃhe vai saṃkramet punar

original: ṣaḍaṅgulaiḥ punastyaktaiḥ kanyāṃ saṃkramate punaḥ // SvaT_7.113 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ aṅgulaiḥ punar tyaktaiḥ kanyām saṃkramate punar
nāsikā agrāt tu tālu antam tyaktvā evam viṣuvant bhavet
tulā saṃkrāntiḥ eṣā uktā dakṣiṇam viṣuvat bhavet

original: sādhanaṃ yat kṛtaṃ tatra iha janmani kāmadam /
analyzed: sādhanam yat kṛtam tatra iha janmani kāma dam

original: mṛtyorjayaṃ tathā śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ tasmātsamārabhet // SvaT_7.115 //
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ jayam tathā śāntim puṣṭim tasmāt samārabhet
tasmāt sa ṣaṣ rasa āhāraḥ gala adhas prīṇayet tanum

original: ṣaḍaṅgulāni tyaktvā tu vṛścike kramate punaḥ // SvaT_7.116 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ aṅgulāni tyaktvā tu vṛścike kramate punar
kaṇṭha ūrdhvam dvi aṅgulam tyaktvā kaṇṭha adhas catur aṅgulam
vṛścikam tu parityajya dhanvi saṃkrāntiḥ ucyate
ṣaṣ aṅgulāt adhastāt tu dhanvi sthaḥ carate hṛdi

original: hṛtpadmāntaṃ tu vai haṃsaś caritvā ūrdhvagodayaḥ // SvaT_7.118 //
analyzed: hṛd padma antam tu vai haṃsaḥ caritvā ūrdhva ga udayaḥ
makara ādiṣu saṃkrāntau dvādaśa evam caret sadā
amunā ukta krameṇa eva āyuḥ vai sarva dehinām
aihika āmuṣmikī siddhiḥ adhamā madhyamā uttamā
ayana dvayam ākhyātam mokṣa siddhiḥ dvaya ujjhitā
ayana dvaya paryante unmanyante sadā sthitaḥ
tatrasthaḥ vai japa dhyānāt mokṣa siddhim avāpnuyāt

original: mokṣaṃ gatvā tu nāgacchet pratijñā bhairavasya tu /
analyzed: mokṣam gatvā tu na āgacchet pratijñā bhairavasya tu
asmin abda udaye bhūyas dvādaśa abda udayam śṛṇu
caitra saṃvatsare yasmāt māsānām udayaḥ bhavet
tad ādi sādhakaiḥ tasmāt kartavyam mantra sādhanam
dvādaśa abdaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ caitra māsāt varānane
lakṣaṇam tasya vakṣyāmi
tatra saṃvatsareṇa eva amunā uktena suvrate

original: ahorātrastu yaḥ prokto dvādaśāṃśaṃ bhajetpriye // SvaT_7.125 //
analyzed: ahorātraḥ tu yaḥ proktaḥ dvādaśa aṃśam bhajet priye

original: dvādaśa te ahorātrā dvādaśābde bhavanti vai /
analyzed: dvādaśa te ahorātrāḥ dvādaśa abde bhavanti vai
pañcabhiḥ tān tu saṃguṇya dvādaśa abdaḥ ṛtuḥ bhavet

original: tameva dviguṇaṃ kṛtvā kālastu sa vidhīyate /
analyzed: tam eva dviguṇam kṛtvā kālaḥ tu sa vidhīyate
triguṇena etat ayane vatsaraḥ ṣaṅguṇena tu
saṃkrāntayaḥ dvādaśa atra yadvat abde prakīrtitāḥ
dvādaśa abda udaye prāṇe vatsarāḥ te prakīrtitāḥ

original: dvādaśābde tvahorātrāḥ teṣāṃ saṅkhyāṃ nibodha me /
analyzed: dvādaśa abde tu ahorātrāḥ teṣām saṅkhyām nibodha me

original: sahasrāṇi tu catvāri triśatī viṃśatistathā // SvaT_7.129 //
analyzed: sahasrāṇi tu catvāri triśatī viṃśatiḥ tathā
dvādaśa abda udaye devi prāṇe smin kathitā mayā
ṣaṣṭi abda udayam atrā eva punar ca kathayāmi te
ānanda ādyāḥ tu te jñeyāḥ ṣaṣṭi abdāḥ tu varānane

original: te cādha ūrdhvage prāṇe ekasminsurasundari // SvaT_7.131 //
analyzed: te ca adhas ūrdhva ge prāṇe ekasmin surasundari
caranti pravibhāgena tathā te kathayāmi aham
ānanda prabhṛteḥ devi mantram ārādhayet tu yaḥ
tasya ānandaḥ tu deveśi mantreṇa saha jāyate

original: dvādaśābde tvahorātraṃ pañcadhā bhedayecca tam // SvaT_7.133 //
analyzed: dvādaśa abde tu ahorātram pañcadhā bhedayet ca tam
ṣaṣṭi abde te tu ahorātrāḥ pañca eva parikīrtitāḥ

original: te vai ṣaṅguṇitāstatra māsa ekaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // SvaT_7.134 //
analyzed: te vai ṣaṅ guṇitāḥ tatra māsaḥ ekaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
taiḥ ca dvādaśabhiḥ devi varṣam ekam vidhīyate
aṅgule tu sa pañca aṃśe mānam etat prakīrtitam
ṣaṣ aṅgulaiḥ tu pañca abdāḥ ṣaṣṭi abde udayanti te
hṛd padma ādi ā ava śakti ūrdhvam triṃśat abda udayaḥ bhavet
śakti adhas yāvat hṛd padmam triṃśat abda udayaḥ bhavet

original: ṣaṣṭyabde ye tvahorātrāḥ saṅkhyāṃ teṣu vadāmyaham // SvaT_7.137 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭi abde ye tu ahorātrāḥ saṅkhyām teṣu vadāmi aham
viṃśatiḥ tu sahasrāṇi sahasram ṣaṣ śata adhikam
ahorātrāḥ tu ṣaṣṭi abde saṅkhyātāḥ tu varānane

original: ṣaṣṭyabdodaya ākhyātaḥ prāṇa ekatra te mayā /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭi abda udayaḥ ākhyātaḥ prāṇaḥ ekatra te mayā
candra sūrya uparāge ca pakṣa māsa ayaneṣu ca
yuga ādiṣu yuga anteṣu yat ca saṃvatsare
varṣa dvādaśake ca eva ṣaṣṭi abde varānane
snāna dānena yajñaiḥ ca pūjā homa japena ca

original: jñānayogādibhiścaiva bāhye kāle tu yatkṛtam // SvaT_7.141 //
analyzed: jñāna yoga ādibhiḥ ca eva bāhye kāle tu yat kṛtam
amunā ukte varārohe tat phalam labhate mahat
prāṇa haṃsa gatim cāre jñātvā ekasmin tu tat bhajet
sva saṃvedyaḥ bhavet cāraḥ nāḍī cāra jayāt sphuṭam
athavā sa japāt evam atyartham upabṛṃhitaḥ

original: mantrī yogaṃ vijānāti jñātvā sarvajñatāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: mantrī yogam vijānāti jñātvā sarvajña tām vrajet
punar eva pravakṣyāmi nāḍi traya vibhāgataḥ
dakṣinā uttara saṃkrāntau viṣuvat cārataḥ tathā
yathā carati asau haṃsaḥ jagati asmin carācare
antar sthaḥ kāla rūpeṇa kalābhiḥ kalayan jagat
guṇatraya samāviṣṭaḥ tridhā avasthā vyavasthitaḥ
kāraṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ākrāntaḥ śakti tritaya saṃyutaḥ
icchā jñāna kriyā viddhaḥ soma sūrya agni madhya gaḥ

original: dakṣanāsāpuṭe caiva nāḍī vai piṅgalā smṛtā // SvaT_7.148 //
analyzed: dakṣa nāsā puṭe ca eva nāḍī vai piṅgalā smṛtā

original: iḍā caiva tu vāmena suṣumnā madhyataḥ sthitā /
analyzed: iḍā ca eva tu vāmena suṣumnā madhyatas sthitā
dakṣiṇe devamārgaḥ tu pitṛ mārgaḥ tathā uttare

original: madhyamaḥ śivamārgastu tatra gatvā na jāyate /
analyzed: madhyamaḥ śiva mārgaḥ tu tatra gatvā na jāyate

original: dakṣiṇe sattvajāgratsthaḥ svapnastho vāmato rajaḥ // SvaT_7.150 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe sattva jāgrat sthaḥ svapna sthaḥ vāmatas rajaḥ

original: madhye tamastu vijñeyaṃ suṣuptāvastha eva ca /
analyzed: madhye tamaḥ tu vijñeyam suṣupta avasthe eva ca

dharma adharma vinirmuktaḥ puṇya pāpa vivarjitaḥ

original: na cāsya bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ hi na peyāpeyameva ca // SvaT_7.248 //
analyzed: na ca asya bhakṣya abhakṣyam hi na peya apeyam eva ca

original: nāpavitraṃ hi tasyāsti na pavitraṃ hi suvrate /
analyzed: na apavitram hi tasya asti na pavitram hi suvrate
nirapekṣaḥ hi asau nityam sarva apekṣā vivarjitaḥ

original: nāsya kṣetraṃ nāsya tīrthaṃ niyamo yama eva ca /
analyzed: na asya kṣetram na asya tīrtham niyamaḥ yamaḥ eva ca

original: kṣetraṃ tasya parā śaktir yataḥ sarvaṃ prasūyate // SvaT_7.250 //
analyzed: kṣetram tasya parā śaktiḥ yatas sarvam prasūyate

original: sarvādhvāno yato devi tatrasthāḥ pracaranti vai /
analyzed: sarva adhvānaḥ yatas devi tatrasthāḥ pracaranti vai

original: tīrthaṃ caiva paraṃ śāntaṃ nityaṃ cānandaviśvagam // SvaT_7.251 //
analyzed: tīrtham ca eva param śāntam nityam ca ānanda viśva gam
yena vyāptam idam viśvam anantam viśva śaktibhiḥ

original: nityaṃ viraktiḥ saṃsārād yamo 'yam parikīrtitaḥ // SvaT_7.252 //
analyzed: nityam viraktiḥ saṃsārāt yamaḥ yam parikīrtitaḥ

original: nātmano bhāvayejjātiṃ na kulaṃ na ca bāndhavān // SvaT_7.253 //
analyzed: na ātmanaḥ bhāvayet jātim na kulam na ca bāndhavān
ācaret sarva varṇa tvam na ca varṇeṣu vartayet
para bhāvanayā nityam para dharmeṇa vartayet
sarvajñaḥ paritṛptaḥ ca paripūrṇaḥ svabhāvataḥ
svatantraḥ lupta sāmarthyaḥ tu an ādinidhana āśritaḥ
anādi bodhaḥ hi atulaḥ kāla velā vivarjitaḥ
cāra uccāra vinirmuktaḥ tu ahar rātra vivarjitaḥ

original: na divā jāgaraṃ kuryān na ca rātrau svapetkvacit /
analyzed: na divā jāgaram kuryāt na ca rātrau svapet kvacid
svabhāvena eva saṃtiṣṭhat dina rātri vivarjitaḥ

original: evaṃ vai vartate yogī pareṇa samatāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: evam vai vartate yogī pareṇa sama tām vrajet

original: na ca taṃ kalayetkālaḥ kalpakoṭiśatairapi // SvaT_7.258 //
analyzed: na ca tam kalayet kālaḥ kalpa koṭi śataiḥ api
jīvan eva vimuktaḥ sau yasya eṣā bhāvanā sadā

original: śivo hi bhāvito nityaṃ na kālaḥ kalayecchivam // SvaT_7.259 //
analyzed: śivaḥ hi bhāvitaḥ nityam na kālaḥ kalayet śivam
yogī svacchanda yogena svacchanda gati cāriṇā

original: sa svacchandapade yuktaḥ svacchandasamatāṃ vrajet // SvaT_7.260 //
analyzed: sa svacchanda pade yuktaḥ svacchanda sama tām vrajet
svacchandaḥ ca eva svacchandaḥ svacchandaḥ vicaret sadā

original: evaṃ vai mṛtyuliṅgāni riṣṭānyanyāni yāni ca // SvaT_7.261 //
analyzed: evam vai mṛtyu liṅgāni riṣṭāni anyāni yāni ca
yogāt jānāti yogi indraḥ nādaja antargatāni ca
nirjitya etāni yogena evam ukta vrameṇa tu

original: ayogī yāni jānāti ayukto vāpi suvrate /
analyzed: ayogī yāni jānāti ayuktaḥ vā api suvrate

original: bahirliṅgāni tānyatra aṅgāriṣṭāni me śṛṇu // SvaT_7.263 //
analyzed: bahis liṅgāni tāni atra aṅga ariṣṭāni me śṛṇu
śuṣka tālu oṣṭha kaṇṭhaḥ ced akasmāt dhūsara chaviḥ
skandhau ca bhaṅgam āyātaḥ ṣaṣ māsāt mṛtyum āpnuyāt

original: sunīlaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vyomni yaḥ paśyati dine dine /
analyzed: su nīlam maṇḍalam vyomni yaḥ paśyati dine dine

original: sitaṃ haritakṛṣṇaṃ ca vatsarārdhānmriyeta saḥ // SvaT_7.265 //
analyzed: sitam harita kṛṣṇam ca vatsara ardhāt mriyeta saḥ

original: viraśmiṃ paśyati raviṃ somaṃ vai lakṣmavarjitam /
analyzed: viraśmim paśyati ravim somam vai lakṣma varjitam

original: tārāṃ jyotsnāṃ ca kṛṣṇāṃ vai paśyetṣaṇmāsajīvitaḥ // SvaT_7.266 //
analyzed: tārām jyotsnām ca kṛṣṇām vai paśyet ṣaṣ māsa jīvitaḥ
hiraṇya varṇam puruṣam piṅgalam kṛṣṇam eva ca

original: svapne saṃpaśyate yo vai ṣaṇmāsānso 'pi jīvati // SvaT_7.267 //
analyzed: svapne saṃpaśyate yaḥ vai ṣaṣ māsān saḥ u pi jīvati
ātmanaḥ hi aśira chāyām paśyet ṣaṣ māsa jīvitaḥ
taila abhyaṅgam tathā pānam rakta sraj anulepanam

original: raktāmbarāṇi kṛṣṇāni svapne paśyati vai yadā /
analyzed: rakta ambarāṇi kṛṣṇāni svapne paśyati vai yadā
pretaiḥ rakṣobhiḥ śva gomāyuka sūkaraiḥ
vṛtam yātam gṛddhra kākaiḥ mahiṣaiḥ uṣṭra gardabhaiḥ
aṅga bhakṣaṇam udvāham nagnam ca atīva vihvalam

original: svapne ca paśyate yo vai varṣamekaṃ sa jīvati /
analyzed: svapne ca paśyate yaḥ vai varṣam ekam sa jīvati
śaṃkha āvarte bhujā madhye gulphayoḥ marma sandhiṣu
saḥ vaśyam vadham āyāti yasya etat spandanam na hi

original: somārkamaṇḍalaṃ dehe dhruvaṃ caiva tvarundhatīm // SvaT_7.272 //
analyzed: soma arka maṇḍalam dehe dhruvam ca eva tu arundhatīm

original: na paśyati mahāyānaṃ so 'vaśyaṃ mriyate naraḥ /
analyzed: na paśyati mahāyānam saḥ vaśyam mriyate naraḥ
tālu randhra gataḥ dhūmaḥ mahāyānam tat ucyate
jihvā tu arundhatī iti uktā nāsā agram dhruvaḥ ucyate
netra ante karaja ākrānte maṇḍalam soma sūryayoḥ
na paśyet gagane pi etat saḥ vaśyam mriyate naraḥ
kasmāt ca jāyeta akasmāt vai bhavet kṛśaḥ
ati kruddhaḥ ti bhītaḥ ca varṣam ekam sa jīvati
naram ca abhimukham svapne dṛṣṭvā māsa traya āyuṣam

original: hṛdayaṃ śuṣyate yasya snātamātrasya tatkṣaṇāt // SvaT_7.277 //
analyzed: hṛdayam śuṣyate yasya snāta mātrasya tad kṣaṇāt

original: gātraṃ caivāpyanuṣṇaṃ ca ṛtumekaṃ sa jīvati /
analyzed: gātram ca eva api anuṣṇam ca ṛtum ekam sa jīvati

original: dhanurniśi divā colkā vyabhre vidyutpradarśanam // SvaT_7.278 //
analyzed: dhanuḥ niśi divā ca ulkā vyabhre vidyut pradarśanam
māsam ekam sa jīvati

original: cakṣuṣī sravato yasya śabdaṃ na śṛṇuyāt sphuṭam // SvaT_7.279 //
analyzed: cakṣuṣī sravataḥ yasya śabdam na śṛṇuyāt sphuṭam
na āghrāti gandham vāc jāḍyam māsam ekam gata āyuṣaḥ

original: raktapadmopamaṃ vaktraṃ jihvā kṛṣṇā ca yasya vai // SvaT_7.280 //
analyzed: rakta padma upamam vaktram jihvā kṛṣṇā ca yasya vai
gātre varṇāni anekāni hṛdayam yasya roditi

original: tālukampo 'tha nābheśca ardhamāsaṃ sa jīvati // SvaT_7.281 //
analyzed: tālu kampaḥ nābheḥ ca ardha māsam sa jīvati
pratyakṣa kākanāsīraḥ dīpa dhūmam na jighrati

original: pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ na jānāti caturmāsaṃ sa jīvati // SvaT_7.282 //
analyzed: pūrva dṛṣṭam na jānāti catur māsam sa jīvati

original: binduṃ yastu na paśyettu nityaṃ vaktrānugaṃ hitam /
analyzed: bindum yaḥ tu na paśyet tu nityam vaktra anugam hitam

original: nityaṃ vahati hikkāṃ tu varṣamekaṃ sa jīvati // SvaT_7.283 //
analyzed: nityam vahati hikkām tu varṣam ekam sa jīvati
bahis liṅgāni ca etāni aṅga ariṣṭāni yāni ca
pūjayā japa homena dhyāna dhāraṇayā priye
kṛta rakṣā vidhānena jīyante na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: nāḍīnāṃ śodhanaṃ caiva vāyūnāṃ ca jayaḥ katham // SvaT_7.285 //
analyzed: nāḍīnām śodhanam ca eva vāyūnām ca jayaḥ katham

original: sthānaṃ rūpaṃ ca śabdaṃ ca karma brūhi mama prabho /
analyzed: sthānam rūpam ca śabdam ca karma brūhi mama prabho
paramaḥ yoga sadbhāvaḥ guhyāt guhyataraḥ priye

original: yo na kasyacidākhyātas taṃ yogaṃ śṛṇu tattvataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ na kasyacid ākhyātaḥ tam yogam śṛṇu tattvataḥ
su praśaste bhū pradeśe na agni toya samīpatas
vālukā śarkarā hīne śuṣka vṛkṣa vivarjite
niḥśabda kīṭa valmīke ītibhiḥ parivarjite
puṇye dharmiṣṭha saṃvāse tatra yogam samabhyaset
devadevam samabhyarcya bhairavam sa vināyakam
pūrva ācāryān namaskṛtya yuktaḥ dhyāna parāyaṇaḥ

original: āsanaṃ svastikaṃ baddhvā padmakaṃ bhadrameva vā // SvaT_7.290 //
analyzed: āsanam svastikam baddhvā padmakam bhadram eva vā
sa apāśrayam sa ardhacandram yogapaṭṭam yathāsukham
dahana utpūyane kṛtvā plāvayet amṛtena ca
sa bāhya abhyantareṇa eva sakalīkaraṇam tatas

original: antaryāgaṃ yathāpūrvam uccāryaṃ ca paraṃ tathā // SvaT_7.292 //
analyzed: antaryāgam yathāpūrvam uccāryam ca param tathā
daśadhā yoga mārgeṇa haṃsa svacchandam abhyaset
mantram bindum atītam tu nāda anta jyotiḥ ākṛtim
saṃkalpya kalpanā lakṣyam dhyāyet vai tena sarvagam
apasavyena pūryeta savyena eva virecayet
nāḍī saṃśodhanam ca etat mokṣa mārga pathasya ca
recanāt pūraṇāt rodhāt prāṇāyāma sridhā smṛtaḥ
sāmānyāḥ bahis ete tu punar ca abhyantare trayaḥ
ābhyantareṇa recyeta pūryeta abhyantareṇa tu
niṣkampam kumbhakam kṛtvā kāryāḥ ca abhyantarāḥ trayaḥ
nābhyām hṛdaya saṃcārāt manaḥ ca indriya gocarāt
prāṇāyāmaḥ caturthaḥ tu supraśāntaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: prāṇarodhe tu saṃpūrṇe nābhau nītvā samucchvasan // SvaT_7.298 //
analyzed: prāṇa rodhe tu saṃpūrṇe nābhau nītvā samucchvasan
śanais vimocayet vāyum vāma nāsā puṭena tu
vāyavī dhāraṇā aṅguṣṭhe āgneyī nābhi madhyataḥ
māheyī kaṇṭha deśe tu vāruṇī ghaṇṭikā āśrayā
ākāśa dhāraṇā mūrdhni sarva siddhi karī smṛtā
eka dvi tri catuṣpañca saṃkhyā uddhātaiḥ

original: saṃniruddhe tu vai prāṇe mūrdhni gatvā nivartate // SvaT_7.301 //
analyzed: saṃniruddhe tu vai prāṇe mūrdhni gatvā nivartate

original: sa udghāta iti prokto jñātavyo yogibhiḥ sadā /
analyzed: saḥ udghātaḥ iti proktaḥ jñātavyaḥ yogibhiḥ sadā
rāga dveṣau prahīyete prāṇāyāmaiḥ su dhāritaiḥ
dhāraṇābhiḥ dahet pāpam pratyāhāre kṣa saṃyamaḥ

original: hṛdgude nābhikaṇṭhe ca sarvasandhau tathaiva ca // SvaT_7.303 //
analyzed: hṛd gude nābhi kaṇṭhe ca sarva sandhau tathā eva ca

original: prāṇādyāḥ saṃsthitā hyete rūpaṃ śabdaṃ ca me śṛṇu /
analyzed: prāṇa ādyāḥ saṃsthitāḥ hi ete rūpam śabdam ca me śṛṇu
druta tāra nibhaḥ raktaḥ indragopaka saṃnibhaḥ
kṣīra ābhaḥ sphaṭika ābhaḥ ca pañcānām rūpa lakṣaṇam
ghaṇṭā kaṃsa abda madhuraḥ gaja nādaḥ mahā dhvaniḥ

original: prāṇādināṃ tu pañcānām ayaṃ śabda udāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa ādinām tu pañcānām ayam śabdaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: jalpitaṃ hasitaṃ gītaṃ nṛttaṃ yuddhagatiḥ kalāḥ // SvaT_7.306 //
analyzed: jalpitam hasitam gītam nṛttam yuddha gatiḥ kalāḥ
śilpam ca sarva karmāṇi prāṇasya eva viceṣṭitam
praveśayet anna pānam tad malam srāvayet adhas
andha tvam śrotra rogam ca apānaḥ tu kariṣyati

original: aśitaṃ līḍhapītaṃ ca samānaḥ samatāṃ nayet // SvaT_7.308 //
analyzed: aśitam līḍha pītam ca samānaḥ samatām nayet

original: kṣobho hikkā tathā chikkā udānasya viceṣṭitam /
analyzed: kṣobhaḥ hikkā tathā udānasya viceṣṭitam
svedaḥ ca romaharṣaḥ ca śūlam dāhaḥ ṅga bhañjanam

original: vyānasyaitāni karmāṇi sparśaṃ caiva sa vindati /
analyzed: vyānasya etāni karmāṇi sparśam ca eva sa vindati
aṅguṣṭha jānu hṛdaye locane mūrdhni saṃsthitāḥ

original: nāgādyāḥ bahurūpāśca karma tveṣāṃ nibodha me /
analyzed: nāga ādyāḥ bahu rūpāḥ ca karma tu eṣām nibodha me
āhlāda udvega janakaḥ śoṣaṇaḥ trāsanaḥ tathā
nāgaḥ kūrmaḥ ca kṛkaraḥ devadattaḥ ca pañcamaḥ
ati nidrā karaḥ ca anyaḥ yojakaḥ ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
śvāsa saṃkocana chedāḥ ghurghurā utkramaṇam tathā

original: nāgādīnāṃ tu pañcānāṃ mṛtyukāle viceṣṭitam // SvaT_7.313 //
analyzed: nāga ādīnām tu pañcānām mṛtyu kāle viceṣṭitam

original: na caiva yāti cotkrāntau tanuṃ tyaktvā dhanañjayaḥ /
analyzed: na ca eva yāti ca utkrāntau tanum tyaktvā dhanañjayaḥ

original: ākuñcayati vai kūrmaḥ śoṣayecca kalevaram // SvaT_7.314 //
analyzed: ākuñcayati vai kūrmaḥ śoṣayet ca kalevaram

original: prāṇameva jayetpūrvaṃ jite prāṇe jitaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇam eva jayet pūrvam jite prāṇe jitam manaḥ

original: jite manasi śāntasya paraṃ tattvaṃ prakāśate // SvaT_7.315 //
analyzed: jite manasi śāntasya param tattvam prakāśate
prāṇa apānam gude dhyāyet prāṇa samānam nābhitaḥ

original: prāṇodānaṃ tu kaṇṭhe tu prāṇavyānaṃ tu sarvagam // SvaT_7.316 //
analyzed: prāṇa udānam tu kaṇṭhe tu prāṇa vyānam tu sarvagam
nāga ādyāḥ prāṇa saṃyuktāḥ sva sthāneṣu nirodhayet

original: niruddhasya ca yaḥ kālas taṃ vakṣyāmi nibodha me // SvaT_7.317 //
analyzed: niruddhasya ca yaḥ kālaḥ tam vakṣyāmi nibodha me
tālāt prabhṛti tam dhyāyet yāvat pañcaśatam gatam
jitaḥ nilaḥ bhavati eva saṃkrānti utkrānti karmaṇi

original: divyā kāntiḥ śubho gandhaḥ prajñā cāsya vivardhate /
analyzed: divyā kāntiḥ śubhaḥ gandhaḥ prajñā ca asya vivardhate

original: divyā dṛṣṭiśca śravaṇaṃ divyā vākca prajāyate // SvaT_7.319 //
analyzed: divyā dṛṣṭiḥ ca śravaṇam divyā vāc ca prajāyate
vāyu vat vicaret lokān siddhān devān ca paśyati
manasā cintita avāptiḥ pravarteta guṇa aṣṭakam
saṃsāra bandha nirmuktaḥ śiva tulyaḥ ca jāyate
prāṇa apānau tu saṃyojya hrasva koṭi samanvitau

original: nābhyādhāre ca yogīndraḥ svedaḥ kampaśca jāyate // SvaT_7.322 //
analyzed: nābhyādhāre ca yogi indraḥ svedaḥ kampaḥ ca jāyate

original: punareva tu hṛtsthau hi prāṇāpānau nirodhayet /
analyzed: punar eva tu hṛd sthau hi prāṇa apānau nirodhayet
dīrgha koṭi samāyogāt tad kṣaṇāt ca patet bhuvi
kaṇṭha stham ca tathā evā iha prāṇam eva nirodhayet
pluta koṭi samāyogāt svapna vṛttiḥ tatas bhavet
bhrū madhye bindu yogena prāṇa rodham tu kārayet

original: suṣuptaṃ jāyate tatra kṣaṇāccaiva prabuddhyate // SvaT_7.325 //
analyzed: suṣuptam jāyate tatra kṣaṇāt ca eva prabuddhyate
mūrdha dvāram samāśritya niṣkalam dhyānam ārabhet
evam abhyasataḥ tasya pratyayaḥ tu tadā bhavet
pipīla kaṇṭaka vedhaḥ mūrdhva dvāram vibhindataḥ

original: bhittvā krameṇa sarvaṇi unmanyantāni yāni tu // SvaT_7.327 //
analyzed: bhittvā krameṇa sarvaṇi unmanī antāni yāni tu
pūrva ukta lakṣṇaiḥ devi tyaktvā svacchanda tām vrajet

original: jāyate unmanastvaṃ hi dehenānena sādhake // SvaT_7.328 //
analyzed: jāyate unmanaḥ tvam hi dehena anena sādhake
saṃkrāmet para deheṣu kṣudh tṛṣṇābhyām na bādhyate
atīta anāgatam ca eva trailokye yat pravartate
pratyakṣam tat bhavet tasya sarvajña tvam ca jāyate
prasaṅge dhyā ātma kālasya jñānam vijñānam eva ca
sarvam etat samākhyātam aṃśakān ca nibodha me
iti svacchandatantre saptamaḥ paṭalaḥ
aṣṭamaḥ paṭalaḥ
aṃśakam ṣaḍvidham devi kathayāmi anupūrvaśas

original: bhāvāṃśakaḥ svabhāvāṃśaḥ puṣpapātāṃśa eva ca // SvaT_8.1 //
analyzed: bhāva aṃśakaḥ svabhāva aṃśaḥ puṣpapāta aṃśaḥ eva ca
mantrāṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ ca anyaḥ tu aṃśaka āpādanam dvidhā

original: devānusmaraṇaṃ bhāvaḥ sahajaṃ taṃ vijānata // SvaT_8.2 //
analyzed: deva anusmaraṇam bhāvaḥ sahajam tam vijānata
svabhāvaḥ ca bhavet ceṣṭā kathayāmi anupūrvaśas

original: brahmāṃśo vedabhaktastu rudrāṃśaṃ ca nibodha me // SvaT_8.3 //
analyzed: brahma aṃśaḥ veda bhaktaḥ tu rudra aṃśam ca nibodha me
rudra bhaktaḥ su śīlaḥ ca śiva śāstra rataḥ sadā
viṣṇu aṃśaḥ viṣṇu bhaktaḥ ca candra aṃśaḥ priya darśanaḥ
lubdhaḥ garvita mṛṣṭa āśī vātāṃśaḥ capalaḥ smṛtaḥ
sarpa visrambha gāmī syāt nāgāṃśaḥ dīrgha śāyī atha
dīrgha roṣaḥ pūti vaktraḥ guru kṣīra ruciḥ sadā
gāndharvaḥ gāyanaḥ nityam śiva bhaktaḥ varānane

original: vidyādharāṃśakaḥ prāṇī daityāṃśo dveṣaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // SvaT_8.7 //

analyzed: kāmāṃśaḥ rūpavān ca eva subhagaḥ gaṇikā priyaḥ

original: rakṣoṃśaḥ krūranistriṃśo devadveṣī dvijeṣu ca // SvaT_8.8 //
