original: tribhiḥ śuddhaistu dvātriṃśac chuddhā eva bhavanti hi // SvaT_10.78 //
analyzed: tribhiḥ śuddhaiḥ tu dvātriṃśat śuddhāḥ eva bhavanti hi
teṣām nāmāni vakṣyāmi trayāṇām varavarṇini
avīciḥ ca eva vikhyātaḥ kumbhīpākaḥ ca dāruṇaḥ
mahāraurava rājaḥ ca sthānam teṣām nibodha me
adhas madhya ūrdhva bhāgeṣu saṃsthitāḥ te yathākramam
vyāptim teṣām pravakṣyāmi yathāvat anupūrvaśas
naraka ekādaśa gatam avīcim śodhayet priye
ātmanā dvādaśam devi kumbhīpākam viśodhayet

original: mahārauravasaṃjñaṃ cāpy evameva na saṃśayaḥ // SvaT_10.82 //
analyzed: mahāraurava saṃjñam ca api evam eva na saṃśayaḥ
pañcatriṃśat pravakṣyāmi samāsena varānane

original: avīciḥ kriminicayo nadī vaitaraṇī tathā // SvaT_10.83 //
analyzed: avīciḥ krimi nicayaḥ nadī vaitaraṇī tathā
lohaḥ ca śalmaliḥ ca eva api asiparvataḥ eva ca
sa ucchvāsaḥ ca nirucchvāsaḥ pūti māṃsaḥ paraḥ tathā
tapta trapuḥ kṣārakūpaḥ jatu lepaḥ tathā eva ca

original: antarbhūtā avīcau tu kumbhīpākasya śrūyatām // SvaT_10.85 //
analyzed: antarbhūtāḥ avīcau tu kumbhīpākasya śrūyatām
asthibhaṅgaḥ krakacachedaḥ kūpaḥ ca api kaṭaṅkaṭaḥ
vasā miśraḥ hi ayastuṇḍaḥ trapu lepaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
kumbhīpākaḥ ca vijñeyaḥ tīkṣṇa asiḥ ca tathā eva ca
tapralohaḥ ca vijñeyaḥ kṣura dhārapathaḥ tathā
aśaniḥ ca sutaptaḥ ca dvādaśā ete prakīrtitāḥ
ekādaśā antar vijñeyāḥ kumbhīpākasya dāruṇāḥ

original: mahārauravarāje ca ata ūrdhvaṃ nibodha me /
analyzed: mahārauravarāje ca atas ūrdhvam nibodha me
pāśaḥ mbareṣakaḥ ca eva ayaḥpaṭṭaḥ tathā eva ca
daṇḍayantraḥ tu amedhyaḥ ca ghorarūpaḥ tathā aparaḥ
mahārauravaḥ eteṣām upariṣṭāt vyavasthitaḥ
avīcau kṛmi narakān kumbhīpāke su dāruṇān
mahārauravake medhyān antarbhūtān vicintayet

original: dvātriṃśannarakāṇāṃ ca mānaṃ caiva nibodha me // SvaT_10.92 //
analyzed: dvātriṃśat narakāṇām ca mānam ca eva nibodha me
nava navatiḥ lakṣāṇi ekaikasya ucchrayaḥ smṛtaḥ
lakṣa mātra antarā jñeyā dvātriṃśat ca api anukramāt
eteṣām upariṣṭāt tu prabhu tvena varānane
yoga aiśvarya guṇa upetaḥ kūṣmāṇḍa adhipatiḥ sthitaḥ
nava navatiḥ lakṣāṇi puram tasya prakīrtitam
tasya upariṣṭāt pātālān kathayāmi samāsatas

original: ābhāsaṃ varatālaṃ ca śarkaraṃ ca gabhastimat /
analyzed: ābhāsam varatālam ca śarkaram ca gabhastimat

original: mahātalaṃ ca sutalaṃ rasātalamataḥ param // SvaT_10.96 //
analyzed: mahātalam ca sutalam rasātalam atas param
sauvarṇam aṣṭamam jñeyam sarva kāma samanvitam
ābhāsāt yāvat sauvarṇam pramāṇam kathayāmi te
sahasra navaka utsedham ekaikam tu pura uttamam
ekaikasya antaram jñeyam sahasra parisaṃkhyayā

original: chatrākārāṇi sarvāṇi teṣāṃ vai bhuvanāni tu /
analyzed: chatra ākārāṇi sarvāṇi teṣām vai bhuvanāni tu

original: sarvakāmaiḥ sametāni guṇaiḥ sarvairyutāni tu // SvaT_10.99 //
analyzed: sarva kāmaiḥ sametāni guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ yutāni tu
hema prākāra śikharaiḥ chatra dhvaja samākulaiḥ
kiṅkiṇī jāla mukharaiḥ toraṇa aṭṭāla maṇḍitaiḥ
nirgamaiḥ sa gavākṣaiḥ ca divya vastra vibhūṣitaiḥ
tantrī mura java ādyaiḥ ca geya tūrya rava ākulaiḥ
nānā bhuvana paṅkti oghaiḥ sarva ratna samujjvalaiḥ
prāsādaiḥ tuṅga śikharaiḥ candra ātapa sama prabhaiḥ
rathyā mārga vara ārāmaiḥ sadā puṣpa phala anvitaiḥ
kokila ārāva madhuraiḥ śikhi ṣaṭpada sevitaiḥ
haṃsa kāraṇḍava ākīrṇaiḥ cakravāka upaśobhitaiḥ
taḍāgaiḥ svaccha toya āḍhyaiḥ dīrghikābhiḥ yutāni tu
puruṣaiḥ ca mahā kāyaiḥ mahā bala parākramaiḥ
sarva aiśvarya sva rūpa āḍhyaiḥ sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutaiḥ
divya vastraiḥ su tāmbūlaiḥ divya gandha anulepanaiḥ
divya ābharaṇa saṃyuktaiḥ mukuṭaiḥ ratna maṇḍitaiḥ
śiva ārādhana saktāḥ ye tad prasādena sādhakāḥ
te viśanti mahādevi pātālam siddha sevitam

original: rasaṃ rasāyanaṃ divyaṃ siddhadravyaṃ labhanti te // SvaT_10.108 //
analyzed: rasam rasāyanam divyam siddha dravyam labhanti te

original: krīḍanti cānye satataṃ divyānāṃ yoṣitāṃ gaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: krīḍanti ca anye satatam divyānām yoṣitām gaṇaiḥ
kāminaḥ kāmarūpaiḥ tu matta mātaṅga gāmibhiḥ
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktaiḥ kāmaśāstra su peśalaiḥ
divya vastra parīdhānaiḥ stana bhāra samānataiḥ
madhya kṣāmaiḥ prasanna āsyaiḥ tarala āyata locanaiḥ
sa kiṅkiṇī nitambaiḥ ca hāra keyūra śobhitaiḥ
sugandhi gandha lipta aṅgaiḥ kāñcī mekhala maṇḍitaiḥ

original: evaṃ te kathitā devi pātālāntaravāsinaḥ // SvaT_10.112 //
analyzed: evam te kathitāḥ devi pātāla antara vāsinaḥ
surāḥ tathā nāgāḥ rākṣasāḥ ca vibhāgataḥ

original: ekaikatra ca pātāle kathitāste varānane // SvaT_10.113 //
analyzed: eka ekatra ca pātāle kathitāḥ te varānane
pātāla saptake jñeyāḥ tathā anye bhuvana adhipāḥ
balaḥ hi atibalaḥ ca eva balavān bala vikramaḥ
subalaḥ balabhadraḥ ca balādhyakṣaḥ ca kīrtitāḥ
etaiḥ śuddhaiḥ ime śuddhāḥ sapta pātāla vāsinaḥ
yad ūrdhve ca eva sauvarṇam pātālam parikīrtitam

original: tatra vasatyasau devo hāṭakaḥ parameśvaraḥ // SvaT_10.116 //
analyzed: tatra vasati asau devaḥ hāṭakaḥ parameśvaraḥ
pura koṭi sahasraiḥ tu samantāt parivāritaḥ
siddhaiḥ udra gaṇaiḥ divyaiḥ bhaginī mātṛbhiḥ vṛtaḥ
yoginī yoga kanyābhiḥ rudraiḥ ca eva sa kanyakaiḥ
siddha dravya samaiḥ mantraiḥ cintāmaṇi rasāyanaiḥ
siddha vidyā samṛddham vai hāṭakeśasya mandiram
haṭhat praveśayet lokān tad bhāva gata mānasān
tena asau hāṭakaḥ proktaḥ devadevaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: tasyordhve tu sahasrāṇi yojanānāṃ tu viṃśatiḥ // SvaT_10.120 //
analyzed: tasya ūrdhve tu sahasrāṇi yojanānām tu viṃśatiḥ
bhūkaṭāhaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ samantāt tu varānane
atas bhagavatī pṛthvī nānā janapada ākulā
tasyāḥ madhye mahā meruḥ sauvarṇaḥ ca varānane

original: tasyācalasya vistāram ūrdhvādhaḥ kathayāmi te // SvaT_10.122 //
analyzed: tasya acalasya vistāram ūrdhva adhas kathayāmi te
yojanānām sahasrāṇi caturaśītiḥ ucchritaḥ
ṣoḍaśa eva sahasrāṇi adhobhāge praropitaḥ
tāni eva mūla vistāraḥ dviguṇaḥ mūrdha vistaraḥ

original: tasyordhve tu sabhā divyā nāmnā caiva manovatī // SvaT_10.124 //
analyzed: tasya ūrdhve tu sabhā divyā nāmnā ca eva manovatī
caturdaśa sahasrāṇi yojanānām pramāṇataḥ
sarva ratna su śobhā āḍhyā strī sahasra samanvitā
sarva bhoga gaṇa upetā brahmaṇaḥ tu mahātmanaḥ
siddha vidyādhara ākīrṇā ṛṣibhiḥ parivāritā
tasyāḥ īśāna digbhāge jyotiṣkam śikharam smṛtam
sūrya koṭi pratīkāśam gaṇa prathama sevitam
sarva ṛtu kusuma upetam deva gandharva sevitam
strī sahasra samākīrṇam sarva aiśvarya samanvitam
tatra āste bhagavān devaḥ tryambakaḥ parameśvaraḥ
lokapālaiḥ vṛtaḥ sau hi brahma viṣṇu indra nāyakaḥ
mama aṃśam tam vijānīyāḥ sura siddha namaskṛtam
adhikāram prakurute para icchā saṃpracoditaḥ
sabhāyāḥ brahmaṇaḥ dhastāt sahasrāṇi caturdaśa
yojanānām parityajya cakravāṭaḥ samantataḥ
svarga aṣṭakam samuddiṣṭam tatra tiṣṭanti lokapāḥ
pūrveṇa indrasya vikhyātā purī nāmnā amarāvatī
tejovatī tathā āgneyyām citrabhānoḥ prakīrtitā

original: dakṣiṇe yamarājasya nāmnā saṃyamanī purī // SvaT_10.133 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe yama rājasya nāmnā saṃyamanī purī
kṛṣṇāṅgārā tu naiṛtyām rākṣaseśasya kīrtitā

original: paścimena jaleśasya nāmnā śuddhavatī smṛtā // SvaT_10.134 //
analyzed: paścimena jaleśasya nāmnā śuddhavatī smṛtā

original: vāyavyāṃ tu purī vāyor nāmnā gandhavahā priye /
analyzed: vāyavyām tu purī vāyoḥ nāmnā gandhavahā priye

original: uttareṇāpi somasya purī nāmnā mahodayā // SvaT_10.135 //
analyzed: uttareṇa api somasya purī nāmnā mahodayā
aiśānyām īśa rājasya purī nāmnā yaśovatī

original: etāsāmuttare devi śṛṇu ṣaḍviṃśatiṃ purīḥ // SvaT_10.136 //
analyzed: etāsām uttare devi śṛṇu ṣaḍviṃśatim purīḥ
dakṣiṇena amarāvatyāḥ kāmavatī apsaraḥ purī

original: sauvarṇī siddhasaṅghānāṃ tasyā vai dakṣiṇena tu // SvaT_10.137 //
analyzed: sauvarṇī siddha saṅghānām tasyāḥ vai dakṣiṇena tu
tasyāḥ vai dakṣiṇena anyā padmarāga upaśobhitā
ādityānām purī khyātā nāmnā acā aṃśumatī śubhā

original: sādhyānāṃ rājatī divyā khyātā vai kusumāvatī /
analyzed: sādhyānām rājatī divyā khyātā vai kusumāvatī

original: vahneḥ paścimadigbhāge viśveṣāṃ revatī purī // SvaT_10.139 //
analyzed: vahneḥ paścima digbhāge viśveṣām revatī purī

original: tasyāstu paścime devi divyā vai viśvakarmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu paścime devi divyā vai viśvakarmaṇaḥ

original: paścime dharmarājasya mātṛnandā purī smṛtā // SvaT_10.140 //
analyzed: paścime dharmarājasya mātṛnandā purī smṛtā
krīḍanti mātaraḥ tatra madhu pāna vighūrṇitāḥ

original: rudrāṇāṃ paścime tasyā rohitā nāma kāñcanī // SvaT_10.141 //
analyzed: rudrāṇām paścime tasyāḥ rohitā nāma kāñcanī
tatra śūla dharāḥ rudrāḥ yamasya paricārakāḥ

original: tasyāḥ paścimato jñeyā nāmnā guṇavatī purī // SvaT_10.142 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ paścimatas jñeyā nāmnā guṇavatī purī
ekādaśānām rudrāṇām vajra prākāra toraṇā

original: nirṛteḥ pūrvabhāge tu piṅgalā nāma vai purī // SvaT_10.143 //
analyzed: nirṛteḥ pūrva bhāge tu piṅgalā nāma vai purī
sva karma saṃjñāḥ deveśi piśācāḥ tatra saṃsthitāḥ
nairṛtya uttara sāmīpye purī kṛṣṇāvatī smṛtā

original: nistriṃśā nāma tatraiva vasanti rākṣasāḥ sadā /
analyzed: nistriṃśāḥ nāma tatra eva vasanti rākṣasāḥ sadā

original: tasyā apyuttare bhāge purī haimī sukhāvatī // SvaT_10.145 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ api uttare bhāge purī haimī sukhāvatī
mitraḥ vasati tatra eva bahu bhṛtya jana āvṛtaḥ

original: tasyā apyuttare haimī gāndharvī nāma viśṛtā // SvaT_10.146 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ api uttare haimī gāndharvī nāma viśṛtā
vasanti tatra gandharvāḥ divya kanyā samāvṛtāḥ
daśa koṭi sahasrāṇi teṣām saṃkhyā prakīrtitā

original: bhūtānāṃ siddhasenā tu varuṇasya tu dakṣiṇe /
analyzed: bhūtānām siddha senā tu varuṇasya tu dakṣiṇe

original: hemasaṃjñā vasūnāṃ tu varuṇasyāpi cottare // SvaT_10.148 //
analyzed: hema saṃjñāḥ vasūnām tu varuṇasya api ca uttare
tasyāḥ tu uttaratas devi nāmnā siddhavatī purī

original: sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ tu sā purī parikīrtitā // SvaT_10.149 //
analyzed: sarva vidyādharāṇām tu sā purī parikīrtitā

original: vāyordakṣiṇato devi siddhā nāmnā purī smṛtā /
analyzed: vāyoḥ dakṣiṇatas devi siddhā nāmnā purī smṛtā
vasanti kinnarāḥ tatra puraiḥ hema arka saprabhaiḥ

original: vāyoḥ pūrveṇa gāndharvī haimī citrarathasya tu /
analyzed: vāyoḥ pūrveṇa gāndharvī haimī citrarathasya tu
gandharvarāja mukhyasya divya gandharva nāditā
āste bhagavatī sākṣāt sa prasvara vibhūṣitā
grāma traya parīdhānā jāti mekhala maṇḍitā
lakṣaṇa vyañjana upetā madhyamena avaguṇṭhitā
gandharvaiḥ gīyamānā sā tatra devī sarasvatī
nārada ādyaiḥ ca ṛṣibhiḥ nāga kinnara sevitā
tasyāḥ pūrveṇa citrā vai tumburuḥ nāradasya ca

original: somasya paścātpramadā guhyakānāṃ purī smṛtā // SvaT_10.155 //
analyzed: somasya paścāt pramadā guhyakānām purī smṛtā

original: pūrveṇaiva tu somasya nāmnā citravatī purī /
analyzed: pūrveṇa eva tu somasya nāmnā citravatī purī
sarva dhātu mayī citrā kuberasya mahātmanaḥ
ṣaḍviṃśati sahasraiḥ tu koṭīnām parivāritaḥ
yakṣāṇām uttamaḥ śrīmān āste bhogaiḥ anuttamaiḥ

original: tasyā pūrve śubhā nāmnā jāmbūnadamayī purī /
analyzed: tasyāḥ pūrve śubhā nāmnā jāmbūnada mayī purī

original: tatra vai karmadevāstu devatvaṃ karmaṇā gatāḥ // SvaT_10.158 //
analyzed: tatra vai karma devāḥ tu deva tvam karmaṇā gatāḥ
paścimena īśa rājasya viṣṇoḥ vai śrīmatī purī
tatra āste śrīpatiḥ śrīmān atasī puṣpa sannibhaḥ
śaṅkha cakra gadā pāṇiḥ pīta vāsāḥ janārdanaḥ

original: īśasya dakṣiṇebhāge nāmnā padmavatī purī // SvaT_10.160 //
analyzed: īśasya dakṣiṇebhāge nāmnā padmavatī purī
mahāpadma upaviṣṭasya padma mālā dharasya tu
padma patra āyata akṣasya brahmaṇaḥ padmajanmanaḥ
tasyāḥ dakṣiṇatas devi nāmnā kāmasukhāvatī

original: aśvinau tatra deveśi tathā dhanvantariḥ sthitaḥ // SvaT_10.162 //
analyzed: aśvinau tatra deveśi tathā dhanvantariḥ sthitaḥ
uttarā itu amarāvatyāḥ mahāmeghā iti viśrutā

original: vināyakānāṃ sā divyā vasatistatra kalpitā // SvaT_10.163 //
analyzed: vināyakānām sā divyā vasatiḥ tatra kalpitā
daśa koṭi sahasrāṇi vīryavantaḥ śubhāḥ tathā
vināyakāḥ mahā dīptāḥ agni jvalita tejasaḥ
asurāṇām vadha arthāya aṅguṣṭhāt nirmitā mayā
evaṃvidhaiḥ adhas ca ūrdhvam meruḥ puravaraiḥ vṛtaḥ
puryaḥ ca yāḥ samākhyātāḥ meroḥ ca eva samantataḥ
pura koṭi sahasraiḥ tu sarvāḥ tāḥ saṃbhṛtāḥ priye
sarva aiśvarya su saṃpūrṇāḥ sarva ratna samujjvalāḥ
divya strībhiḥ samākīrṇāḥ divya puṃbhiḥ samākulāḥ

original: ānandaḥ satataṃ devi devānāṃ ca pure pure /
analyzed: ānandaḥ satatam devi devānām ca pure pure
vimāna nagara ārāmaiḥ catura udyāna maṇḍapaiḥ
chatra dhvaja patākābhiḥ gaja vāji samākulaiḥ
dvandva bhīnandi śabdaiḥ ca śaṅkha kāhala niḥsvanaiḥ
gīta nṛttaiḥ tathā ākīrṇam devānām mandiram sadā

original: iṣṭāpūrtaratā devi ye narā puṇyabhārate // SvaT_10.170 //
analyzed: iṣṭāpūrta ratāḥ devi ye narā puṇya bhārate

original: tryambakaṃ sakṛdarcanti meruṃ gacchanti te narāḥ /
analyzed: tryambakam sakṛt arcanti merum gacchanti te narāḥ
gaṅgā toya su saṃsiktāḥ krīḍanti sura sattamāḥ
katham gaṅgā samutpannā sura siddha namaskṛtā
kathayasva prasādena samāsāt sura sattama
gaṅgāyāḥ ca samutpattim kathayiṣyāmi suvrate

original: jaganmātā mahādevi mama patnī purā hi sā // SvaT_10.173 //
analyzed: jaganmātā mahādevi mama patnī purā hi sā
mama netra udakam ca eva karajaiḥ chādite mama

original: punarudghāṭite netre jaganmātaḥ purā tvayā // SvaT_10.174 //
analyzed: punar udghāṭite netre jaganmātar purā tvayā
mad netrebhyaḥ sravat toyam tvadīya aṅgulibhiḥ priye

original: daśadhā niḥsṛtā gaṅgā kapālāvaraṇe mama // SvaT_10.175 //
analyzed: daśadhā niḥsṛtā gaṅgā kapāla āvaraṇe mama
saptā eva saṃsthitāḥ tatra ekā viṣṇupure sthitā
dvitīyā brahmaloka ūrdhve tṛtīyā satyaloka gā

original: svarge caivapunaḥ sā vai saṃsthitā somamaṇḍale /
analyzed: svarge ca eva punar sā vai saṃsthitā soma maṇḍale

original: somāccaiva viniḥ sṛtya purakāśe vyavasthitā // SvaT_10.177 //
analyzed: somāt ca eva viniḥ sṛtya pura kāśe vyavasthitā
tatas ham saṃstutaḥ devi brahma viṣṇu puraḥsaraiḥ
gaṅgānadīm mahā puṇyām martyānām hita kāmyayā
avatārya mahādeva martya lokam visarjaya

original: tato mayā sureśāni proktā sā tvaparājitā // SvaT_10.179 //
analyzed: tatas mayā sureśāni proktā sā tu aparājitā
lokānām tu hita arthāya āgaccha surasundari

original: āgatya mama mūrdhānaṃ merumūrdhni punargatā // SvaT_10.180 //
analyzed: āgatya mama mūrdhānam meru mūrdhni punar gatā
tasmāt nirgatya deveśi catur dikṣu udadhim gatā

original: pūrve sītā samuddiṣṭā suvahā dakṣiṇena tu // SvaT_10.181 //
analyzed: pūrve sītā samuddiṣṭā suvahā dakṣiṇena tu
sunandā paścime bhāge bhadrasomā tathā uttare
mandaraḥ tu mahādevi gandhamādana saṃjñakaḥ
vipulaḥ ca supārśvaḥ ca pūrva ādyāḥ uttara antakāḥ

original: viṣkambhāśca samākhyātāḥ varṇāṃścaiva nibodha me // SvaT_10.183 //
analyzed: viṣkambhāḥ ca samākhyātāḥ varṇān ca eva nibodha me

original: prāgviṣkambhasamīpe tu nāmnā citrarathaṃ vanam // SvaT_10.184 //

original: vanaṃ pitṛvanaṃ nāma svapārśvasya samīpataḥ // SvaT_10.187 //

original: mandare 'tha kadambaṃ syān mastake tu vyavasthitam /

original: tena jambūnadī jātā priye vegavatī bhṛśam // SvaT_10.191 //
analyzed: tena jambūnadī jātā priye vegavatī bhṛśam

original: vipule 'pi tathāśvatthaḥ ketumāla iti śrutaḥ // SvaT_10.194 //

tena asau ketumāla iti khyātaḥ siddha niṣevitaḥ

original: parvatāntaritāstatra nava bhāgā bhavanti hi // SvaT_10.198 //

original: niṣadho hemakūṭaśca himavāniti te trayaḥ // SvaT_10.199 //

śvetaḥ ca hemakūṭaḥ ca sahasra navatiḥ smṛtau

lavaṇa udadhi paryantāḥ sahasra dvaya vistṛtāḥ
kailāsa yuktaḥ himavān triśṛṅgaḥ ca sa jārudhiḥ

pūrveṇa mālyavān meroḥ parvataḥ tu virājate

yāmya uttara āyataḥ bhāti sahasram tasya vistṛtiḥ

original: caturdikṣu gatau meror dvau dvau sīmāntaparvatau /

jārudhiḥ śṛṅgavān ca eva uttareṇa vyavasthitau

original: kṣāraḥ kṣīraṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ tathā ikṣuraso 'pi ca // SvaT_10.285 //
analyzed: kṣāraḥ kṣīram dadhi ghṛtam tathā ca
madirā udaḥ ca svādu udaḥ samudrāḥ sapta kīrtitāḥ

original: jambudvīpaṃ smṛtaṃ lakṣaṃ yojanānāṃ pramāṇataḥ // SvaT_10.286 //
analyzed: jambudvīpam smṛtam lakṣam yojanānām pramāṇataḥ
evam dviguṇa vṛddhyā atra samudrāḥ dvīpa saṃsthitāḥ
agnīdhraḥ ca samākhyātaḥ jambudvīpe varānane
śāke medhātithiḥ nāma vapuṣmān kuśa saṃjñake
rājā krauñce jyotiṣmān śālmalau dyutimān smṛtaḥ

original: gomede havyanāmā tu savanaḥ puṣkare tathā // SvaT_10.289 //
analyzed: gomede havyanāmā tu savanaḥ puṣkare tathā
tretā yuga samaḥ kālaḥ śāka gomeda vāsinām
tathā varṇa āśrama ācārāḥ jñeyāḥ tatra nivāsinām
medhātitheḥ sapta putrāḥ śākadvīpe bhiṣecitāḥ
śāntaḥ bhayaḥ tu aśiśiraḥ sukhadaḥ nandakaḥ śivaḥ
kṣemakaḥ ca dhruvaḥ ca iti varṣa nāmnā tu te ṅkitāḥ

original: varṣāṇi sapta khyātāni parvatāṃśca nibodha me // SvaT_10.292 //
analyzed: varṣāṇi sapta khyātāni parvatān ca nibodha me
gomedaḥ candrasaṃjñaḥ ca nāradaḥ dundubhiḥ tathā
somakaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ ca eva vaibhrājaḥ ca kula adrayaḥ

original: sukṛtā cānasūyā ca sumukhī ca tṛtīyakā /
analyzed: sukṛtā ca anasūyā ca sumukhī ca tṛtīyakā

original: vipāśā tridivā kumbhī tathā cāmṛtanālikā // SvaT_10.294 //
analyzed: vipāśā tridivā kumbhī tathā ca amṛtanālikā
etāḥ eva mahā nadyaḥ giriṣu eteṣu nirgatāḥ
pūrvāt ārabhya niṣkrāntāḥ praviṣṭāḥ kṣīrasāgaram

original: śākadvīpe tu ye lokāḥ kṣīrāhārāḥ phalāśinaḥ /
analyzed: śākadvīpe tu ye lokāḥ kṣīra āhārāḥ phala āśinaḥ
candrakānta samāḥ sarve surūpāḥ priya darśanāḥ
krīḍanti divya nārībhiḥ sarva aiśvarya samanvitāḥ

original: kuśe vapuṣmatā pūrvaṃ sapta putrā niveśitāḥ // SvaT_10.297 //
analyzed: kuśe vapuṣmatā pūrvam sapta putrāḥ niveśitāḥ
śveta lohita jīmūtāḥ haritaḥ vaidyutaḥ tathā
mānasaḥ suvrataḥ ca iti varṣa nāmnā eva ca aṅkitāḥ
kumudaḥ ca ūrvadaḥ ca eva vārāhaḥ droṇa kaṅkatau
mahiṣaḥ kusumaḥ ca eva sapta sīmantaparvatāḥ

original: śvetatoyā tathā kṛṣṇā candrā śuklā ca locanī /
analyzed: śvetatoyā tathā kṛṣṇā candrā śuklā ca locanī

original: vīvṛtā ca vivṛndā ca saptaitāstu saridvarāḥ // SvaT_10.300 //
analyzed: vīvṛtā ca vivṛndā ca saptā etāḥ tu sarit varāḥ
dadhi udakam praviṣṭāḥ tāḥ nimnagāḥ pāvana udakāḥ
janāḥ tu sukhinaḥ tatra dadhnā amṛta phala āśinaḥ
divya bhoga ratāḥ sarve krīḍanti ete sa yoṣitaḥ

original: jyotiṣmatā sapta putrāḥ krauñcadvīpe niveśitāḥ // SvaT_10.302 //
analyzed: jyotiṣmatā sapta putrāḥ krauñcadvīpe niveśitāḥ
udbhijjaḥ ca samākhyātaḥ veṇuḥ maṇḍalaḥ eva ca
rathakāraḥ ca lavaṇaḥ dhṛtimān su prabhākaraḥ
kapilaḥ ca iti rājānaḥ varṣa nāmnā ca te ṅkitāḥ
vaidrumaḥ hemanābhaḥ ca dyutimān puṣpadantakaḥ
kuśalaḥ harimardaḥ ca saptā ete tu kula adrayaḥ

original: mahī dhātā śivāpāpā pavitrā saṃtatadyutiḥ // SvaT_10.305 //
analyzed: mahī dhātā śivā apāpā pavitrā saṃtata dyutiḥ

original: dambhā ceti samākhyātāḥ saptaitāḥ saritaḥ srutāḥ /
analyzed: dambhā ca iti samākhyātāḥ saptā etāḥ saritaḥ srutāḥ

original: ghṛtodaṃ praviśantyetāḥ sarvāḥ pāpaharāḥ priye // SvaT_10.306 //
analyzed: ghṛta udam praviśanti etāḥ sarvāḥ pāpa harāḥ priye
janāḥ tad vāsinaḥ sarve surūpāḥ tejasā utkaṭāḥ
ghṛta amṛta phala āhārāḥ su tṛptāḥ smara pīḍitāḥ
krīḍanti vanitā yuktāḥ padma patra āyata īkṣaṇāḥ
sapta dyutimatā putrāḥ śālmalau abhiṣecitāḥ
manonugaḥ tathā uṣṇaḥ ca pāvanaḥ hi andhakārakaḥ

original: munirdundubhināmā ca kuśalaśceti te smṛtāḥ // SvaT_10.309 //
analyzed: muniḥ dundubhi nāmā ca kuśalaḥ ca iti te smṛtāḥ

original: varṣanāmāni teṣāṃ vai saptānāṃ sapta tu kramāt /
analyzed: varṣanāmāni teṣām vai saptānām sapta tu kramāt
krauñcaḥ vāmanaḥ ca eva api andhakāraḥ divākṛtiḥ
dvibinduḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ ca dundubhiḥ ca kula adrayaḥ

original: pauṇḍarī kauśikī gaurī siddhā caiva kumudvatī // SvaT_10.311 //
analyzed: pauṇḍarī kauśikī gaurī siddhā ca eva kumudvatī
sandhyā rātrī ca vikhyātā samāsāt parikīrtitāḥ
nadyaḥ tāḥ śaila niṣkrāntāḥ gacchanti ikṣu rasa arṇavam
pibanti ikṣu rasam tatra ye janāḥ tad nivāsinaḥ
divya kānti yutāḥ śāntāḥ surūpāḥ priya vādinaḥ
nānā nārī samākīrṇāḥ sarva kāma sukha udayāḥ
havyarājaḥ sutān sapta gomode ca abhyaṣecayat
jaladaḥ ca kumāraḥ ca sukumāraḥ marīcakaḥ
kumudaḥ ca unnataḥ ca eva mahābhadraḥ iti smṛtāḥ

original: teṣāṃ nāmnā ca varṣāṇi aṅkitāni svamānataḥ /
analyzed: teṣām nāmnā ca varṣāṇi aṅkitāni sva mānataḥ
udayaḥ kesaraḥ ca eva suraivataḥ
śyāmaḥ mbikeyaḥ meruḥ ca śailāḥ sīmanta gāḥ tu ime

original: gabhastī sukumārī ca kumārī nālinī tathā // SvaT_10.317 //
analyzed: gabhastī sukumārī ca kumārī nālinī tathā
veṇukā ca api atha ikṣū ca dhenukā iti sarit varāḥ
madirā udam vahanti etāḥ puṇyāḥ puṇya jala udvahāḥ
amṛta upamāni svādūni phalāni atra varānane

original: bhakṣayanti ca tallokāḥ pibanti madirāmṛtam // SvaT_10.319 //
analyzed: bhakṣayanti ca tat lokāḥ pibanti madirā amṛtam
sarva kāma samṛddhāḥ ca surūpāḥ vyādhi varjitāḥ
nānā yuvati vṛndaiḥ ca rūpa yauvana garvitaiḥ
mada alasaiḥ pāna mattaiḥ amante satatam priye

original: ataśca puṣkarākhye ca savanastatra nāyakaḥ // SvaT_10.321 //
analyzed: atas ca puṣkara ākhye ca savanaḥ tatra nāyakaḥ

original: dvau putrau tena vikhyātau puṣkarākhye niveśitau /
analyzed: dvau putrau tena vikhyātau puṣkara ākhye niveśitau
parvataḥ valaya ākāraḥ mānasottara saṃjñitaḥ
pañcāśat ucchrayaḥ tasya vistāraḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ
yojanānām varārohe sarva ratna samanvitaḥ
dhātakī madhyame rājā mahavītaḥ bahis nṛpaḥ
īrṣyayā rāga tṛṣṇābhiḥ ītibhiḥ ca vivarjitāḥ
sarve te sukhinaḥ tatra tasmin varṣa dvaye janāḥ
cakra ākāraḥ tu boddhavyaḥ mānasaḥ tu varānane
caturṇām lokapālānām purīḥ tu atra bravīmi te

original: sukhāhvā vāruṇī caiva somasya tu vibhāvarī /
analyzed: sukhāhvā vāruṇī ca eva somasya tu vibhāvarī
puṣkaradvīpa guṇitaḥ svādu udaḥ nte vyavasthitaḥ
pañcāśat tu sahasrāṇi tripañcāśat tathā eva ca

original: yojanānāṃ tu lakṣāṇi koṭidvitayameva ca // SvaT_10.328 //
analyzed: yojanānām tu lakṣāṇi koṭi dvitayam eva ca
meru ardhāt yāvat svādu udam pramāṇam parikīrtitam

original: tato hemamayī bhūmir daśakoṭyo varānane // SvaT_10.329 //
analyzed: tatas hema mayī bhūmiḥ daśa koṭyaḥ varānane
devānām krīḍana arthāya lokālokaḥ tu atas param
parvataḥ valaya ākāraḥ yojana ayuta vistṛtaḥ
lakṣa mātra samutsedhaḥ yojanānām varānane
sarva ratna samopetaḥ hema varṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
tasya antar bhāsayet bhānuḥ na bahis surasundari
lokapālāḥ sthitāḥ tatra rudrāḥ ca amogha śaktayaḥ
virujaḥ vasudhāmā ca śaṃkhapād kardamaḥ tathā
hiraṇyaromā parjanyaḥ ketumān bhājanaḥ tathā
jāmbūnada maye śubhre siddha amara niveśane
pūrvāt ārabhya kramaśas yāvat īśāna gocaraḥ

original: lokapālāḥ sthitāste vai pālayanta imāḥ prajāḥ /
analyzed: lokapālāḥ sthitāḥ te vai pālayantaḥ imāḥ prajāḥ

original: asya madhye varārohe yonayastu caturdaśa // SvaT_10.335 //
analyzed: asya madhye varārohe yonayaḥ tu caturdaśa
ceṣṭante vividha ākārāḥ sva karma parirañjitāḥ
lokāloka upariṣṭāt tu savituḥ dakṣiṇāyanam
tathā uttarāyaṇam tatra uttareṇa prakīrtitam
ardharātraḥ marāvatyām astam eti yamasya ca
madhyāhnaḥ ca eva vāruṇyām saumye sūrya udayaḥ smṛtaḥ
yadā eva ca amarāvatyām udayaḥ tasya dṛśyate
tadā astam eti vāruṇyām iti āditya gatāgatam

original: suvīthī uttare tasya ajavīthī ca dakṣiṇe // SvaT_10.339 //
analyzed: suvīthī uttare tasya ajavīthī ca dakṣiṇe
pitṛ deva pathaḥ hi eṣa kathitaḥ tu mayā tava

original: asya bāhye tamo ghoraṃ duḥprekṣyaṃ jīvavarjitam // SvaT_10.340 //
analyzed: asya bāhye tamaḥ ghoram duḥprekṣyam jīva varjitam
pañcatriṃśat smṛtāḥ koṭyaḥ
catvāriṃśat sahasrāṇi yojanānām varānane
sapta sāgara mānam tu garbhodaḥ tad samaḥ smṛtaḥ
brahmaṇaḥ ṇḍa kaṭāhena yuktāḥ vai meru madhyatas
pañcāśat koṭayaḥ jñeyāḥ daśa dikṣu samantataḥ

original: evametacchataṃ jñeyaṃ koṭīnāṃ pārthivaṃ mahat // SvaT_10.343 //
analyzed: evam etat śatam jñeyam koṭīnām pārthivam mahat
atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi pramāṇam varavarṇini

original: atha vātra mahādevi paripāṭyā samantataḥ // SvaT_10.344 //
analyzed: atha vā atra mahādevi paripāṭyā samantataḥ

original: dīkṣākāle tu saṃskārāḥ kramaṃ teṣāṃ nibodha me /
analyzed: dīkṣā kāle tu saṃskārāḥ kramam teṣām nibodha me

original: śaktiṃ tattvaṃ ca bhuvanaṃ yoniṃ caiva niveśayet // SvaT_10.345 //
analyzed: śaktim tattvam ca bhuvanam yonim ca eva niveśayet

original: teṣāṃ gandhopacāraṃ tu kṛtvā caiva yathākramam /
analyzed: teṣām gandha upacāram tu kṛtvā ca eva yathākramam

original: anantaṃ caiva kālāgniṃ narakāṃśca yathākramam // SvaT_10.346 //
analyzed: anantam ca eva kālāgnim narakān ca yathākramam
pātālāni tatas ca ūrdhve śodhayet anupūrvaśas

original: upasthānaṃ tataḥ kuryād bhuvarlokasya varānane // SvaT_10.347 //
analyzed: upasthānam tatas kuryāt bhuvarlokasya varānane
tatas vāgīśvarī devī saṃpūjya kusuma ādibhiḥ

original: tataḥ paśustu saṃprokṣya stāḍyo viśleṣya eva ca // SvaT_10.348 //
analyzed: tatas paśuḥ tu saṃprokṣya stāḍyaḥ viśleṣyaḥ eva ca

original: chedanaṃ ca tathākarṣo grahaṇaṃ yojanaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: chedanam ca tathā ākarṣaḥ grahaṇam yojanam tatas
garbha dhāri tva janane adhikāram tathā eva ca

original: yogaṃ bhogaṃ layaṃ caiva tato yoniviśodhanam /
analyzed: yogam bhogam layam ca eva tatas yoni viśodhanam
caturdaśa samāsena kathayāmi anupūrvaśas
paiśācam rākṣasam yākṣam gāndharvam tu aindram eva ca

original: saumyaṃ tathā ca prājeśaṃ brāhmaṃ caivāṣṭamaṃ viduḥ // SvaT_10.351 //
analyzed: saumyam tathā ca prājeśam brāhmam ca eva aṣṭamam viduḥ
saṃhāra krama yogena śodhanīyāḥ śiva adhvare
paśu pakṣi mṛgāḥ ca eva tathā anye ca sarīsṛpāḥ
sthāvaram pañcamam ca eva ṣaṣṭham mānuṣa yonikam
deva yoni samāyuktam proktam saṃsāra maṇḍalam
caturdaśavidham ca eva bhūrloke tu viśodhayet
ātmā saṃsarati hi atra māyā ādi avani gocare
saṃsāraḥ procyate tasmāt paryaṭet sa yatas tatas

original: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathā mohaṃ bhuṅkte caivādhvamadhyagaḥ // SvaT_10.355 //
analyzed: sukham duḥkham tathā moham bhuṅkte ca eva adhva madhya gaḥ
bandha traya samāyuktaḥ vāmaśaktyā tu adhiṣṭhitaḥ
īśvareṇa nimittena sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vartmani
punar punar ca adhva madhye yujyate sa śubha aśubhaiḥ

original: adhvamadhye tu ye pāśā jñeyāścānantakoṭayaḥ // SvaT_10.357 //
analyzed: adhva madhye tu ye pāśāḥ jñeyāḥ ca ananta koṭayaḥ
pradhāna guṇa bhedena yāvat ca anāśritam padam

original: tasmādevaṃ vijānīyāt adhvā bandhasya kāraṇam // SvaT_10.358 //
analyzed: tasmāt evam vijānīyāt adhvā bandhasya kāraṇam
caturdaśavidham yat ca proktam saṃsāra maṇḍalam
tasya bhedāḥ ahi anantāḥ ca bhidyante karma bhedataḥ
karma vallyaḥ hi anantāḥ ca karma īśāna ādi kārakāḥ
ātmanā badhyate ihi ātmā muñcet na ātmānam ātmanā
kośakāraḥ yathā kīṭaḥ ātmānam veṣṭayet dṛḍham

original: nacodveṣṭayituṃ śakta ātmānaṃ sa punaryathā // SvaT_10.361 //
analyzed: na ca udveṣṭayitum śaktaḥ ātmānam sa punar yathā

original: tathā saṃsāriṇaḥ sarve baddhāḥ svaireva bandhanaiḥ /
analyzed: tathā saṃsāriṇaḥ sarve baddhāḥ svaiḥ eva bandhanaiḥ

original: na ca mocayituṃ śaktāḥ paśavaḥ pāśabandhanāḥ // SvaT_10.362 //
analyzed: na ca mocayitum śaktāḥ paśavaḥ pāśa bandhanāḥ
svayam eva svam ātmānam yāvat vai na īkṣate śivaḥ
śiva śakti nipātāt tu mucyante pāśa bandhanāt
anyathā nā eva jānanti sva rūpam yat su nirmalam
yat tat sva abhijanam śuddham anaupamyam anāmayam
mohitāḥ mala mohena baddhāḥ karma kalā ādinā

original: nigūḍhāstatra tiṣṭhanti kāṣṭhe vahniryathā tathā // SvaT_10.365 //
analyzed: nigūḍhāḥ tatra tiṣṭhanti kāṣṭhe vahniḥ yathā tathā
uddhṛtaḥ tu yathā vahniḥ manthakasya vaśāt sphuṭam
sva svarūpam prapaśyeta bhāsvaram yat su nirmalam
anyeṣām api jantūnām timira ākrānta cakṣuṣām

original: prakāśayati vastūni hatvā vai raśmibhistamaḥ // SvaT_10.367 //
analyzed: prakāśayati vastūni hatvā vai raśmibhiḥ tamaḥ
tathā ātmā tu vijānāti yat svarūpam anādimat

original: manthakasya vaśāddevi nānyathā tu kathaṃcana // SvaT_10.368 //
analyzed: manthakasya vaśāt devi nā anyathā tu kathaṃcana
manthakaḥ tu iha deveśi svayam eva sadāśivaḥ
ācārya tanum āsthāya sadā ca anugrahe sthitaḥ
mantrāḥ manthana vat jñeyāḥ adhvā ca atra araṇiḥ yathā

original: vāgīśī yonisaṃsthānā dhūmo jñeyo malādivat // SvaT_10.370 //
ātmā vai vahnivajñeyo bodhakastu paraḥ śivaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā vai bodhakaḥ tu paraḥ śivaḥ

original: udbodhito yathā vahnir nirmalo 'tīva bhāsvaraḥ // SvaT_10.371 //
analyzed: udbodhitaḥ yathā vahniḥ tīva bhāsvaraḥ
na bhūyas praviśet kāṣṭham tathā ātmā adhvanaḥ uddhṛtaḥ
mala karma kalā ādyaiḥ tu nirmuktaḥ vigata klamaḥ
tatrasthaḥ pi na badhyeta yatas tīva su nirmalaḥ
rasa vahni samāyogāt tāmram kālikayā yathā
viśleṣitam tu tattva jñaiḥ hema tvam pratipadyate

original: na bhūyastāmratāṃ yāti tathātmā na kadācana // SvaT_10.374 //
analyzed: na bhūyas tāmra tām yāti tathā ātmā na kadācana
rasa vat mantra śaktiḥ tu kriyā jñeyā tu vahni vat
tad jñaḥ ca eva śivaḥ jñeyaḥ ācārya tanu vigrahaḥ

original: ātmā vai hemavajjñeyo malo jñeyastu kālikā /
analyzed: ātmā vai hema vat jñeyaḥ malaḥ jñeyaḥ tu kālikā
mantra dravya kriyā yogāt vahni ādhāre tathā priye

original: guruṇā tantraviduṣā hy ātmā vai nirmalīkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: guruṇā tantra viduṣā hi ātmā vai nirmalīkṛtaḥ

original: na bhūyo malatāṃ yāti śivatvaṃ yāti nirmalam // SvaT_10.377 //
analyzed: na bhūyas mala tām yāti śiva tvam yāti nirmalam

original: evaṃ jñātvā varārohe dīkṣā kāryā yathā purā /
analyzed: evam jñātvā varārohe dīkṣā kāryā yathā purā

original: śodhayenmukhyapāśāṃśca ye proktāste mayā purā // SvaT_10.378 //
analyzed: śodhayet mukhya pāśān ca ye proktāḥ te mayā purā

original: guṇabhūtāstu ye pāśās te 'pi śuddhyanti tadvaśāt /
analyzed: guṇa bhūtāḥ tu ye pāśāḥ te tad vaśāt

original: caturdaśavidhaṃ caiva yaduktaṃ tu mayā purā // SvaT_10.379 //
analyzed: caturdaśavidham ca eva yat uktam tu mayā purā
saṃsāra maṇḍalam devi tat avanī tale

original: tadvakṣyāmi kramātsarvaṃ yathā śodhyaṃ śivādhvare // SvaT_10.380 //
analyzed: tat vakṣyāmi kramāt sarvam yathā śodhyam śiva adhvare
brahma ādi stambha paryantam prādhānyena viśodhayet

original: brāhmaṃ caiva tu prājeśaṃ saumyamaindraṃ tathaiva ca // SvaT_10.381 //
analyzed: brāhmam ca eva tu prājeśam saumyam aindram tathā eva ca

original: gāndharvaṃ cāparaṃ yākṣaṃ rākṣasaṃ ca tathāparam /
analyzed: gāndharvam ca aparam yākṣam rākṣasam ca tathā aparam

original: paiśācaṃ kramataḥ śodhyaṃ sthāvaraṃ mānuṣaṃ tathā // SvaT_10.382 //
analyzed: paiśācam kramatas śodhyam sthāvaram mānuṣam tathā
saptacchadam sthāvarāṇām sarpāṇām vāsukim tathā

original: pakṣiṇāṃ garuḍaṃ caiva mṛgāṇāṃ siṃhameva ca // SvaT_10.383 //
analyzed: pakṣiṇām garuḍam ca eva mṛgāṇām siṃham eva ca
paśūnām ca eva go yonim manuṣyān ca viśodhayet
antyajān śūdra viś kṣatra brāhmaṇān ca viśodhayet
pañcabhiḥ brahmabhiḥ devid vadhikārān viśodhayet
daśa āhuti prayogeṇa antyajān brāhmaṇa avadhi
brāhmaṇasya adhikāra aṣṭau catvāriṃśatam eva ca

original: garbhaḥ puṃsavanaṃ caiva sīmanto jātakarma ca // SvaT_10.386 //
analyzed: garbhaḥ puṃsavanam ca eva sīmantaḥ jātakarma ca
nāma niṣkramaṇam ca eva annaprāśana cūḍakam
anena eva varārohe śodhyāḥ tu aṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
etaiḥ nivartitaiḥ devi sau jāyate dvijaḥ

original: navamo vratabandhastu sa cāṅgī parikīrtitaḥ // SvaT_10.388 //
analyzed: navamaḥ vratabandhaḥ tu sa ca aṅgī parikīrtitaḥ
aṅgāni saṃpravakṣyāmi yathāvat anupūrvaśas

original: mekhalā dantakāṣṭhaṃ ca ajinaṃ tryāyuṣaṃ tathā // SvaT_10.389 //
analyzed: mekhalā dantakāṣṭham ca ajinam tri āyuṣam tathā

original: saṃdhyāṃ vahnerupāsāṃ ca bhikṣāṃ vai saptamaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: saṃdhyām vahneḥ upāsām ca bhikṣām vai saptamam viduḥ

original: niyantṝṇi ca dṛṣṭāni dīkṣākāle varānane // SvaT_10.390 //
analyzed: niyantṝṇi ca dṛṣṭāni dīkṣā kāle varānane

original: bhauteśaṃ pāśupatyaṃ ca gāṇaṃ gāṇeśvaraṃ tathā /
analyzed: bhauteśam pāśupatyam ca gāṇam gāṇeśvaram tathā

original: unmattakāsidhāraṃ ca ghṛteśaṃ saptamaṃ viduḥ // SvaT_10.391 //
analyzed: unmattakāsidhāram ca ghṛteśam saptamam viduḥ
sapta etāni tu dṛṣṭāni vratāni brahmacāriṇām

original: caryāvratāni bodhyāni aṅgatve kīrtitāni tu // SvaT_10.392 //
analyzed: caryā vratāni bodhyāni aṅga tve kīrtitāni tu
ebhiḥ tu sahitam hi ekam navamam vrata bandhanam
tasya antarbhūtam eva etat kathitam vrata saptakam
caturdaśa vratāni evam hotavyāni varānane

original: vedavratāni catvāri hotavyāni na saṃśayaḥ // SvaT_10.394 //
analyzed: vedavratāni catvāri hotavyāni na saṃśayaḥ

original: aiṣṭikaṃ pārvikaṃ caiva bhautikaṃ saumikaṃ tathā /
analyzed: aiṣṭikam pārvikam ca eva bhautikam saumikam tathā
vrateśvarāḥ tu catvāraḥ brahmacāri niyāmakāḥ
trayodaśa vijānīyāt tatas vai veda bhājanam

original: tato bhavati godānaṃ taccaturdaśakaṃ priye // SvaT_10.396 //
analyzed: tatas bhavati godānam tat caturdaśakam priye
snātaḥ udvāhayet bhāryām jñānasiddhaḥ kumārikām

original: kṛtvā darbhamayīṃ patnīṃ tayā saha yajetkratūn // SvaT_10.397 //
analyzed: kṛtvā darbha mayīm patnīm tayā saha yajet kratūn
tat jñeyam pañcadaśamam tatas pākamakhāḥ kramāt
tān āhuḥ pravakṣyami anupūrvaśas
aṣṭakāḥ pārvaṇī śrāddham śrāvaṇī āgrāyaṇī tathā

original: caitrī cāśvayujī ceti sapta pākamakhāḥ kramāt // SvaT_10.399 //
analyzed: caitrī ca āśvayujī ca iti sapta pākamakhāḥ kramāt
etaiḥ saha vijānīyāt dvāviṃśat parisaṃkhyayā

original: āgneyaṃ cāgnihotraṃ ca darśaṃ caiva tataḥ param // SvaT_10.400 //
analyzed: āgneyam ca agnihotram ca darśam ca eva tatas param

original: paurṇamāsī tathā jñeyā cāturmāsyaṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: paurṇamāsī tathā jñeyā cāturmāsyam tathā eva ca
paśubandhaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ sautrāmaṇiḥ atas param
haviḥ yajñāḥ samākhyātāḥ saptā ete pāvanāḥ priye
ebhiḥ saha vijānīyāt saṃskāra ekonatriṃśakam
agniṣṭoma atyagniṣṭomau ukthaḥ ṣoḍaśikā tathā
vājapeyaḥ u tirātraḥ tu āptoryāmaḥ tu saptamaḥ
somasaṃsthāḥ samākhyātāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat parisaṃkhyayā
hiraṇya meḍhraḥ hiraṇya nābhiḥ hiraṇya garbhaḥ eva ca
hiraṇya śrotraḥ hiraṇya tvac hiraṇya akṣaḥ tathā eva ca
hiraṇya jihvaḥ tad śṛṅgaḥ daśa yajñāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: śatena tu ghṛtaṃ cātra ekaikaṃ tu vijāyate // SvaT_10.406 //
analyzed: śatena tu ghṛtam ca atra ekaikam tu vijāyate
ete sarve sahasreṇa śuddhi ante saptatriṃśakaḥ

original: aśvamedhaṃ tataḥ paścāj juhuyāttu yathākramam // SvaT_10.407 //
analyzed: aśvamedham tatas paścāt juhuyāt tu yathākramam

original: evaṃ kṛtaistu taiḥ sarvais tataścaiva gṛhī bhavet /
analyzed: evam kṛtaiḥ tu taiḥ sarvaiḥ tatas ca eva gṛhī bhavet

original: aṣṭātriṃśattamaṃ taṃ tu vānaprasthaṃ tato bhavet // SvaT_10.408 //
analyzed: aṣṭātriṃśattamam tam tu vānaprastham tatas bhavet
pārivrājyam tatas evam brāhmaṇyam āpnuyāt
atas ātma guṇān aṣṭau kathayāmi samāsatas
dayā sarveṣu bhūteṣu kṣāntiḥ ca api anasūya tā

original: śaucaṃ caivamanāyāso maṅgalaṃ cāpyataḥ param // SvaT_10.410 //
analyzed: śaucam ca evam anāyāsaḥ maṅgalam ca api atas param
akārpaṇyam ca aspṛhā ca iti aṣṭau ātma guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
catvāriṃśat atha aṣṭau tu saṃskārāḥ ca samāsatas

original: etaiḥ śuddhaistu śuddhyanti asaṃkhyā ye 'pi suvrate /
analyzed: etaiḥ śuddhaiḥ tu suvrate

original: ato 'nteṣṭiṃ tu hutvā vai guṇānāpādayecchiśoḥ // SvaT_10.412 //
analyzed: atas nta iṣṭim tu hutvā vai guṇān āpādayet śiśoḥ
pañca pañca āhutīḥ hutvā brahmabhiḥ ca api anukramāt

original: tilairghṛtena vātāṃśca ūrdhve tu viniyojayet // SvaT_10.413 //
analyzed: tilaiḥ ghṛtena vātān ca ūrdhve tu viniyojayet
ūrdhva śabdena ca aśuddham yat karma parikīrtitam

original: tasmin saṃyojanaṃ kāryaṃ nacānyatra vidhīyate // SvaT_10.414 //
analyzed: tasmin saṃyojanam kāryam na ca anyatra vidhīyate

original: tasmānnoddharaṇaṃ kāryaṃ na cāpi nayanaṃ kvacit /
analyzed: tasmāt nā uddharaṇam kāryam na ca api nayanam kvacid

original: yattatra paripāṭyā tu karma tatra niyojayet // SvaT_10.415 //
analyzed: yat tatra paripāṭyā tu karma tatra niyojayet
tatas ṇima ādiḥ āpādyaḥ brahmabhiḥ ca api anukramāt
pañca āhuti prayogeṇa bhoga artham ca evam ātmanaḥ
ūrdhva śabdena tat jñeyam yat bhūrlokam samāśritam
tasmin yuktasya kartavyam na ca anyasmin kadācana

original: anuddhṛte kathaṃ yogaḥ yāvat karma na bhujyate /
analyzed: an uddhṛte katham yogaḥ yāvat karma na bhujyate
tasmāt tu yoga śabdena tad tad karma eka cintanā
nivartyate mahādevi niṣkṛtim juhuyāt tatas
śivena aṣṭaśata āhutyā tatas tu bhuvana adhipān
bhuvana antar nivāsān ca bhuvanānām yathākramam

original: homenaiva tu saṃśodhya viśleṣaṃ chedanaṃ tathā // SvaT_10.420 //
analyzed: homena eva tu saṃśodhya viśleṣam chedanam tathā
pūrṇam ca eva samuddhāram tad stha tvam ca api anukramāt
prāyaścittam tatas hutvā nyūna adhika nimittataḥ
evamādi krameṇa eva dhāma antam ca viśodhayet

original: bhūrlokastu samākhyāto bhuvolokaṃ nibodha me // SvaT_10.422 //
analyzed: bhūrlokaḥ tu samākhyātaḥ bhuvolokam nibodha me
lakṣam ekam pramāṇataḥ

original: daśa vāyupathā madhye tv ayutāyutasaṃkhyayā // SvaT_10.423 //
analyzed: daśa vāyupathāḥ madhye tu ayuta ayuta saṃkhyayā
ādye vāyu pathe meghān kathayāmi yathāsthitān
pañcāśat yojanāt ūrdhvam ṛtarddhiḥ nāma mārutaḥ

original: yo vivardhayate puṣṭim oṣadhīnāṃ balaṃ tathā /
analyzed: yaḥ vivardhayate puṣṭim oṣadhīnām balam tathā

original: bṛṃhayecca mahīṃ sarvām āpyāyayati cāvyayaḥ // SvaT_10.425 //
analyzed: bṛṃhayet ca mahīm sarvām āpyāyayati ca avyayaḥ

original: divā haṃsaḥ sa vai vāyur manujānāṃ sukhāvahaḥ /
analyzed: divā haṃsaḥ sa vai vāyuḥ manujānām sukha āvahaḥ

original: yato gṛddhrāndhārayati tena gṛddhradharaḥ smṛtaḥ // SvaT_10.426 //
analyzed: yatas gṛddhrān dhārayati tena gṛddhradharaḥ smṛtaḥ
prācetasaḥ nāma vāyuḥ pracetobhi vinirmitaḥ

original: sa vai nāśayate vṛkṣān kadācitsaṃpravartayet // SvaT_10.427 //
analyzed: sa vai nāśayate vṛkṣān kadācid saṃpravartayet

original: agniḥ prācetaso nāma tenaiva saha tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: agniḥ prācetasaḥ nāma tena eva saha tiṣṭhati

original: yadā dahati veśmāni tadāsau samudāhṛtaḥ // SvaT_10.428 //
analyzed: yadā dahati veśmāni tadā asau samudāhṛtaḥ
sukhī samudre vasati sa jalāt na upaśāmyati
yojanānām śatāt ūrdhvam senā nīḥ vāyuḥ ucyate
vidyudvantaḥ mūka meghāḥ vasanti asmin ca mārute
te bhuvaḥ krośa mātreṇa upasṛjanti apaḥ
yojanānām śatāt ūrdhvam meghāḥ sattva vahāḥ smṛtāḥ
matsya maṇḍūka kūrmān ca varṣanti ete ca durdine
yojanānām śatāt ūrdhvam vāyuḥ oghaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: tasmiṃstu rogadā meghā varṣanti ca viṣodakam // SvaT_10.432 //
analyzed: tasmin tu roga dāḥ meghāḥ varṣanti ca viṣodakam
tena upasargāḥ jāyante mārakāḥ sarva dehinām

original: tasmādūrdhvaṃ tu tāvadbhyo devyamoghaḥ sthito marut // SvaT_10.433 //
analyzed: tasmāt ūrdhvam tu tāvadbhyaḥ devi amoghaḥ sthitaḥ marut
tasmin te mārakāḥ meghāḥ amoghe saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: vajrāṅgo nāma vai vāyuḥ pañcāśadyojanasthitaḥ // SvaT_10.434 //
analyzed: vajrāṅgaḥ nāma vai vāyuḥ pañcāśat yojana sthitaḥ
tasmin tūpalakāḥ nāma meghāḥ tūpala varṣiṇaḥ
tāvadbhiḥ yojanaiḥ eva tatas vai vaidyutaḥ nilaḥ
meghāḥ ca vaidyutāḥ tasmin nivasanti tu vaidyute
aśaniḥ vāyu saṃkṣobhāt teṣu asau jāyate mahān
tad ūrdhvam yojanānām ca pañcāśat raivataḥ smṛtaḥ

original: tasminpuṣṭivaho nāma puṣṭiṃ varṣati dehinām // SvaT_10.437 //
analyzed: tasmin puṣṭivahaḥ nāma puṣṭim varṣati dehinām
saṃvarte roga dāḥ meghāḥ te roga udaka varṣiṇaḥ

original: pañcāśadyojane te vai tasmiṃstiṣṭhanti toyadāḥ // SvaT_10.438 //
analyzed: pañcāśat yojane te vai tasmin tiṣṭhanti toya dāḥ
viṣāvartaḥ nāma vāyuḥ pañcāśat upari sthitaḥ

original: tasminkrodhodakā nāma meghā vai saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ // SvaT_10.439 //
analyzed: tasmin krodhodakāḥ nāma meghāḥ vai saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ
te krodha rāga bahulam saṃgrāma bahulam tathā

original: rājñāṃ kṣayakaraṃ caiva prajānāṃ kṣayadaṃ tathā // SvaT_10.440 //
analyzed: rājñām kṣaya karam ca eva prajānām kṣaya dam tathā

original: varṣaṃ caivātra kurvanti yadā varṣanti te ghanāḥ /
analyzed: varṣam ca eva atra kurvanti yadā varṣanti te ghanāḥ
aghaḥ upi ameghaḥ vajrāṅgaḥ vaidyutaḥ raivataḥ tathā
saṃvartaḥ ca viṣāvartaḥ vāyavaḥ ghora veginaḥ

original: agho vasanti vai divyāḥ piśācāḥ skandadehajāḥ // SvaT_10.442 //
analyzed: aghas vasanti vai divyāḥ piśācāḥ skanda deha jāḥ
triṃśat koṭi sahasrāṇi skandasya anucarāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: te vai divyaiśca kusumair arcayanti harātmajam // SvaT_10.443 //
analyzed: te vai divyaiḥ ca kusumaiḥ arcayanti hara ātmajam
amoghe vināyakāḥ ghorāḥ mahādeva samudbhavāḥ
triṃśat koṭi sahasrāṇi tasmin vāyau pratiṣṭhitāḥ
ye haranti kṛtam karma narāṇām akṛtātmanām

original: vajrāṅge 'pi tathā vāyau mātaṅgāḥ krūrakarmiṇaḥ // SvaT_10.445 //
analyzed: vajrāṅge tathā vāyau mātaṅgāḥ krūra karmiṇaḥ
bhinnāñjana nibhāḥ ghorāḥ tāpanāḥ nāma viśrutāḥ
vidyādharāṇām adhamāḥ manaḥ pavana gāminaḥ
ye vidyā pauruṣe ye ca vaitāla ādīn śmaśānataḥ

original: sādhayitvā tataḥ siddhās te 'smin vāyau pratiṣṭhitāḥ // SvaT_10.447 //
analyzed: sādhayitvā tatas siddhāḥ te smin vāyau pratiṣṭhitāḥ
vaidyute psarasaḥ tasmin vāsavena prayojitāḥ
tiṣṭhanti sarvadā tatra pṛthivīpura pālane
bhṛgoḥ vahnau jale vā api saṃgrāmeṣu anivartakāḥ

original: gograhe bandimokṣe vā mriyante puruṣottamāḥ // SvaT_10.449 //
analyzed: gograhe bandi mokṣe vā mriyante puruṣa uttamāḥ
te vrajanti tatas tu ūrdhvam vimānaiḥ maṇi cihnitaiḥ
patākā dīrghikā ākīrṇaiḥ divya ghaṇṭā nināditaiḥ
strī sahasra parīvāraiḥ vimānaiḥ tān nayanti tāḥ

original: raivate tu mahātmānaḥ siddhā vai saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ // SvaT_10.451 //
analyzed: raivate tu mahātmānaḥ siddhāḥ vai saṃpratiṣṭhitāḥ
gorocanā añjane bhasma pāduke ajina ādi ca
sādhayitvā mahātmānaḥ siddhāḥ te kāmarūpiṇaḥ
te vasanti mahātmānaḥ divyām siddhim avasthitāḥ
saṃvarte mahā vāyau vidyādhara gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
daśa triṃśat ca koṭyaḥ te divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitāḥ
divya gandha anuliptāḥ te divya sraj dhāma bhūṣitāḥ
āgneyāḥ dhūma jāḥ meghāḥ śīta durdina dāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: viṣāvartaṃ nāvamiva te vāyuṃ yānti miśritāḥ // SvaT_10.455 //
analyzed: viṣa āvartam nāvam iva te vāyum yānti miśritāḥ
tatra gandharva kuśalāḥ gandharva sahadharmiṇaḥ
vaṃśa vīṇā vidhi jñāḥ ca pakṣiṇaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
brahma jāḥ nāma vai meghāḥ brahma niḥśvāsa saṃbhavāḥ
upariṣṭāt yojana śatāt durjayasya upari sthitāḥ

original: tatra vai durjayā nāma indrasya parirakṣakāḥ /
analyzed: tatra vai durjayāḥ nāma indrasya parirakṣakāḥ

original: parāvahābhidhaṃ vāyuṃ te samāśritya saṃsthitāḥ // SvaT_10.458 //
analyzed: parāvaha abhidham vāyum te samāśritya saṃsthitāḥ
mahā vīrya bala upetāḥ daśa koṭyaḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: puṣkarāvartakā nāma meghā vai padmajodbhavāḥ // SvaT_10.459 //
analyzed: puṣkarāvartakāḥ nāma meghāḥ vai padmaja udbhavāḥ

original: śakreṇa pakṣā ye cchinnāḥ parvatānāṃ mahātmanām /
analyzed: śakreṇa pakṣāḥ ye chinnāḥ parvatānām mahātmanām
parāva hastān vahati manujān iva vāraṇaḥ
tasmin vāyugamāḥ nāma gandharvāḥ gagana ālayāḥ

original: ekādaśa tu vai koṭyas teṣāṃ tu samudāhṛtāḥ // SvaT_10.461 //
analyzed: ekādaśa tu vai koṭyaḥ teṣām tu samudāhṛtāḥ

original: jīmūtā nāma ye meghā devebhyo jīvasaṃbhavāḥ /
analyzed: jīmūtāḥ nāma ye meghāḥ devebhyaḥ jīva saṃbhavāḥ

original: dvitīyamāvahaṃ vāyuṃ meghāste ca samāśritāḥ // SvaT_10.462 //
analyzed: dvitīyam āvaham vāyum meghāḥ te ca samāśritāḥ
tasmin jīmūtakāḥ nāma vidyādhara gaṇāḥ daśa

original: āvahastu tato vāyur yatra droṇāḥ samāśritāḥ // SvaT_10.463 //
analyzed: āvahaḥ tu tatas vāyuḥ yatra droṇāḥ samāśritāḥ
tasmin droṇāḥ samākhyātāḥ meghānām parirakṣakāḥ

original: hitārthaṃ tu prajānāṃ vai nirmitāste mayā purā // SvaT_10.464 //
analyzed: hita artham tu prajānām vai nirmitāḥ te mayā purā
upariṣṭāt kapāla utthāḥ saṃvartāḥ nāma vai ghanāḥ
mahāparivahaḥ nāma vāyuḥ teṣām samāśrayaḥ

original: ādye vāyupathehyevaṃ meghā vai vāyubhiḥ saha /
analyzed: ādye vāyu pathehi evam meghāḥ vai vāyubhiḥ saha
siddhāḥ ca patayaḥ ca eva kathitāḥ megha cāriṇaḥ
dvitīye vāyupathe jñeyāḥ agni kanyāḥ ca mātaraḥ
tāḥ vasanti guṇa upetāḥ rudra śaktyā tu adhiṣṭhitāḥ
tṛtīye vāyupathe ca eva vasante siddha cāraṇāḥ
sva karma bhoga saṃsiddhāḥ sarva siddhaiḥ adhiṣṭhitāḥ
caturthe pathi ca eva atra vasanti āyudha devatāḥ
nārāca cakra cāpa ṛṣṭi śūla śakti iṣu mudgarāḥ
pañcame pathi deveśi vasanti airāvata ādayaḥ
airāvataḥ ñjanaḥ ca eva vāmanaḥ ca mahāgajaḥ
supratīkaḥ gaja indraḥ ca puṣpadantaḥ tathā eva ca
kumudaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ ca ca aṣṭamaḥ

original: diggajā iti vikhyātāḥ svasu dikṣu vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: diggajāḥ iti vikhyātāḥ svasu dikṣu vyavasthitāḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhe vāyupathe devi pakṣirājo mahābalaḥ // SvaT_10.472 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe vāyupathe devi pakṣirājaḥ mahā balaḥ
garutmān iti vikhyātaḥ tīva vīryavān
saptame vyomagaṅgā tu nānā jalacara anugā
divya amṛta jalā puṇyā tridhā sā parikīrtitā

original: sā bhrāntā nabhaso madhye samantātparimaṇḍalā // SvaT_10.474 //
analyzed: sā bhrāntā nabhasaḥ madhye samantāt parimaṇḍalā
ākāśagaṅgā prathitā devānām satata utsavā

original: puṣpamāleva sā bhāti nabhasaḥ śirasi sthitā // SvaT_10.475 //
analyzed: puṣpa mālā iva sā bhāti nabhasaḥ śirasi sthitā
tatra siddhaiḥ mahābhāgaiḥ vidyādhara gaṇaiḥ tathā
gandharvaiḥ apsarobhiḥ ca sādhyaiḥ viśvaiḥ marut gaṇaiḥ
rudraiḥ vasubhiḥ ādityaiḥ pitṛ deva mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
rakṣobhiḥ guhyakaiḥ ca eva divya stuti parāyaṇaiḥ
stuvadbhiḥ ca japadbhiḥ ca gāyadbhiḥ ca mahātmabhiḥ
nṛtyadbhiḥ valgamānaiḥ ca divya dundubhi niḥsvanaiḥ
bherī mṛdaṅga vādyaiḥ ca vallakīnām ca niḥsvanaiḥ
vaṃśa vāditra nādaiḥ ca manaḥ vāyu samīritaiḥ
vaidūrya nālaiḥ kamalaiḥ hema patraiḥ sugandhibhiḥ
kesaraiḥ padmarāgaiḥ ca mahā cakra pramāṇakaiḥ
nṛtyantī iva sarit śreṣṭhā vimāna śata maṇḍitā

original: maṇḍitā ca vanairdivyair dharmādhārā mahānadī // SvaT_10.481 //
analyzed: maṇḍitā ca vanaiḥ divyaiḥ dharma ādhārā mahā nadī

original: mama netrādviniṣkrāntā kriyāśaktiḥ parā hi sā /
analyzed: mama netrāt viniṣkrāntā kriyāśaktiḥ parā hi sā
mahā mandākinī devī tridaśaiḥ paryupāsitā
mahā vimāna koṭībhiḥ nirantaram avasthitaiḥ
śobhitā asau bhagavatī nityam āste nabhastale
tatra eṣā meru śirasi mama vai mastakāt cyutā
papāta dharaṇī pṛṣṭhe lokānām hita kāmyayā
akṣobhyā sā api asau gaṅgā tiṣṭhati anila dhāritā

original: yojanānāṃ śataṃ pūrṇaṃ vistāro 'syāḥ prakīrtitaḥ // SvaT_10.485 //
analyzed: yojanānām śatam pūrṇam vistāraḥ syāḥ prakīrtitaḥ
pariṇāhaḥ tatas koṭyaḥ mahā vegavatī śubhā
sā bhramantī iva saṃtiṣṭhet samantāt parimaṇḍalā
dhruvam āpūrya sā devī tu atyadbhutam avasthitā
divyā amṛta vahā puṇyā sarva pāpa praṇāśinī
aṣṭame vṛṣa rājaḥ tu sa patnīkaḥ sa nandanaḥ

original: vasati tvapratīghātaḥ pratyakṣo dharma eva saḥ // SvaT_10.488 //
analyzed: vasati tu apratīghātaḥ pratyakṣaḥ dharmaḥ eva saḥ

original: navame pathi cātrāste dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: navame pathi ca atra āste dakṣaḥ nāma prajāpatiḥ
brahmā eva sākṣāt vasati brahma śaktyā tu adhiṣṭhitaḥ
daśame vāyupathe devi vasu rudra divākarāḥ

original: atra cāṅgārakaḥ sarpir nairṛtaḥ sadasatpatiḥ // SvaT_10.490 //
analyzed: atra ca aṅgārakaḥ sarpiḥ nairṛtaḥ sadasat patiḥ
sadasaspatiḥ
budhaḥ ca dhūmaketuḥ ca vikhyātaḥ ca jvaraḥ tathā
ajaḥ ca bhuvaneśaḥ ca mṛtyuḥ kāpālikaḥ tathā
ekādaśa smṛtāḥ rudrāḥ sarva kāma phala udayāḥ
dhātā dhruvaḥ ca somaḥ ca varuṇaḥ ca anilaḥ nalaḥ
pratyūṣaḥ ca pradoṣaḥ ca vasavaḥ ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ

original: vasavaḥ kathitāhyete ādityāṃśca nibodha me // SvaT_10.493 //
analyzed: vasavaḥ kathitāḥ ahi ete ādityān ca nibodha me
aryamā indra varuṇau pūṣā viṣṇuḥ gabhastimān

original: mitraścaiva samākhyātas tv ajaghanyo jaghanyakaḥ // SvaT_10.494 //
analyzed: mitraḥ ca eva samākhyātaḥ tu ajaghanyaḥ jaghanyakaḥ

original: vivasvāṃścaiva parjanyo dhātā vai dvādaśaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vivasvān ca eva parjanyaḥ dhātā vai dvādaśaḥ smṛtaḥ
kāśyapeyān viduḥ tu etān teṣām tejaḥ nidheḥ atha
amṛta udbhavaḥ ṛthaḥ divyaḥ sarva deva samanvitaḥ

original: yajñaścakraṃ rathe tasmin sarvajñānamayī ca dhūḥ // SvaT_10.496 //
analyzed: yajñaḥ cakram rathe tasmin sarva jñāna mayī ca dhūḥ
sapta aśvāḥ ca svarāḥ sapta veda hūṃkāra niḥsvanāḥ

original: nāgā yoktrāṇi teṣāṃ vai aruṇaścaiva sārathiḥ // SvaT_10.497 //
analyzed: nāgāḥ yoktrāṇi teṣām vai aruṇaḥ ca eva sārathiḥ

original: satyaṃ ca mañcakaṃ tasya vāyurvego rathasya tu /
analyzed: satyam ca mañcakam tasya vāyuḥ vegaḥ rathasya tu
nava yojana sāhasraḥ vigrahaḥ bhāskarasya tu

original: triguṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tasya trailokye bhāti bhāsvaram /
analyzed: triguṇam maṇḍalam tasya trailokye bhāti bhāsvaram
jñāna śaktiḥ parā hi eṣā tapati āditya vigrahā
māsa vāra prayogeṇa saṃcaranti śiva icchayā
ahorātram bhramanti ete bhuvarlokam samantataḥ
tatas somaḥ tu lakṣeṇa āditya upari saṃsthitaḥ
āpyāyayan jagat sarvam sudhā dhārā pravarṣaṇaiḥ
candra rūpeṇa tapati kriyāśaktiḥ śivasya tu
indu ūrdhve lakṣa mātreṇa sthitam nakṣatra maṇḍalam
lakṣa dvayena tasya ūrdhvam saṃsthitaḥ bhūminandanaḥ
lakṣa dvayena tasya ūrdhve saṃsthitaḥ somanandanaḥ
sura ācāryaḥ pi tasya ūrdhve dvi lakṣeṇa eva saṃsthitaḥ
tasya ūrdhve dvi lakṣeṇa tiṣṭhate bhṛgu nandanaḥ
tasya upari dvi lakṣeṇa sauriḥ sarpati līlayā

original: lakṣamātreṇa tu ṛṣīn kathayāmi samāsataḥ // SvaT_10.505 //
analyzed: lakṣa mātreṇa tu ṛṣīn kathayāmi samāsatas
atriḥ ca eva vasiṣṭhaḥ ca pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
bhṛgu aṅgirāḥ marīciḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ
yama niyamataḥ hi ete śāpa anugraha kārakāḥ
bhītāḥ ca para pīḍāyāḥ śūrāḥ śāstra vicāraṇe
jñāna khaḍga udyatāḥ sarve tu ajñāna paṭala apahāḥ
mantra yoga kriyā ācāryā saṃnaddhāḥ duratikramāḥ
yoga aiśvarya guṇa upetāḥ śiva ārādhana tatparāḥ

original: tebhyo lakṣādhruvo devi tārakāḥ sa caturdaśa // SvaT_10.509 //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ lakṣādhruvaḥ devi tārakāḥ sa caturdaśa
śarīram ghaṭitam tābhiḥ dhruvasya varavarṇini
brahmā eva apara rūpeṇa brahma sthāne niyojitaḥ
tasya jyotiḥ gaṇaḥ devi nibaddhaḥ bhramate sadā

original: niścalaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ śivaśaktyātvadhiṣṭhitaḥ // SvaT_10.511 //
analyzed: niścalaḥ sa tu vijñeyaḥ śiva śaktyā tu adhiṣṭhitaḥ
daśa pañca ca lakṣāṇi dhruva antam bhūmi maṇḍalāt
vāyuskandhān sthitān tu atra kathayāmi samāsatas
ā meghāt bhāskarāt somāt nakṣatrāt graha maṇḍalāt
ṛṣi saptaka nirdeśāt ādhruva antam ca saptamaḥ
āditya ādi ghruva antaḥ ca svarlokaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: atra rājā mahendro vai tiṣṭhate surapūjitaḥ // SvaT_10.514 //
analyzed: atra rājā mahā indraḥ vai tiṣṭhate sura pūjitaḥ
ṛṣi devaiḥ sa gandharvaiḥ vṛtaḥ ca apsarasām gaṇaiḥ
agnihotram kratūn vā api kṛtvā jñāna vivarjitāḥ

original: svarlokaṃ tu narā yānti punarāyānti mānuṣam /
analyzed: svar lokam tu narāḥ yānti punar āyānti mānuṣam

original: svarlokasyoparisṭāttu dve koṭī yojanāni tu // SvaT_10.516 //
analyzed: svar lokasya upari sṭāt tu dve koṭī yojanāni tu
pañcāśītiḥ ca lakṣāṇi mahar lokaḥ varānane

original: ṛṣayaścaiva siddhāśca mārkaṇḍādyā vasanti vai // SvaT_10.517 //
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ca eva siddhāḥ ca mārkaṇḍa ādyāḥ vasanti vai
koṭi aṣṭakam mahādevi yojanānām varānane
mahar loka upariṣṭāt tu janalokaḥ vyavasthitaḥ
jahnuḥ ca kapilaḥ ca āsuriḥ tathā
bhautikaḥ vāḍvaliḥ ca eva janaloka nivāsinaḥ
dvādaśa eva tathā koṭyaḥ janaloka ūrdhvatas priye
tapolokaḥ samākhyātaḥ ṛṣi yoga īśvara ākulaḥ
sanakaḥ ca sanandaḥ ca sanatkumāraḥ sanandanaḥ
śaṅkuḥ ca eva triśaṅkuḥ ca tapoloka nivāsinaḥ
padmāḥ ṣaṭpañcapañcāśat koṭyaḥ lakṣāṇi viṃśatiḥ
bhūrloka antam samārabhya yāvat satyam varānane
iyam saṃkhyā samākhyātā bhuvanānām varānane
koṭyaḥ ṣoḍaśa mānena tapoloka ūrdhvatas priye

original: satyalokaḥ samākhyāto yatra brahmā svayaṃ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: satya lokaḥ samākhyātaḥ yatra brahmā svayam sthitaḥ
krīḍate bhagavān devaḥ vṛtaḥ ātma samaiḥ dvijaiḥ
karma jñānena saṃsiddhāḥ advaita pariniṣṭhitāḥ
ānanda pada saṃprāptāḥ ānanda padam āgatāḥ
ṛgvedaḥ mūrtimān tasmin indranīla sama dyutiḥ
divya gandha vilipta aṅgaḥ divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
saṃsthitaḥ pūrvatas tasya dīpyamānaḥ sva tejasā
uttareṇa yajurvedaḥ śuddha sphaṭika saṃnibhaḥ
divya kuṇḍala dhārī ca mahā kāyaḥ mahā bhujaḥ
sthitaḥ paścima digbhāge sāmavedaḥ sanātanaḥ
rakta ambara dharaḥ śrīmān padmarāga sama prabhaḥ
sraj dāma dhārakaḥ citram ālā bhūṣaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
atharva añjana vat śyāmaḥ sthitaḥ dakṣiṇatas tathā
piṅga akṣaḥ lohita grīvaḥ hari keśaḥ mahā tanuḥ
ṣaḍ aṅgāni itihāsāḥ ca purāṇāni akhilāni tu
veda upaniṣadaḥ ca eva mīmāṃsā āraṇyakam tathā
svāhākāra vaṣaṭkārau rahasyāni tathā eva ca

original: gāyatrī ca sthitā tatra yatra devaścaturmukhaḥ // SvaT_10.532 //
analyzed: gāyatrī ca sthitā tatra yatra devaḥ caturmukhaḥ

original: bhogasthānaṃ brahmaṇaḥ syāt paraṃ brahma tato vrajet /
analyzed: bhoga sthānam brahmaṇaḥ syāt param brahma tatas vrajet
koṭi yojana mānena satyaloka ūrdhvatas priye
brahmāsanam iti khyātam japā sindūra saprabham
rakta indīvara madhya sthaḥ padmarāga sama prabhaḥ
catur mukhaḥ catur vedaḥ catur yuga vaśa anugaḥ
brahma vidbhiḥ samākīrṇaḥ brahmā muni niṣevitaḥ

original: dharmādiphalasaṃbandha- pradātā ca yuge yuge // SvaT_10.536 //
analyzed: dharma ādi phala saṃbandha pradātā ca yuge yuge
tiryak nāraki sattvānām divyānām manujaiḥ saha
sraṣṭā ca sarva bhūtānām sa deva asura mānuṣe
koṭi dvayam tad ūrdhve tu yojanānām varānane
nīla indīvara saṃkāśā indranīla sama prabhā
brahma lokāt para tvena viṣṇoḥ ca eva purī smṛtā
sarva kāma samopetā sarva ratna samujjvalā
marakata stambha sopānā nīla dhvaja samākulā
ghaṇṭā vitāna vistīrṇā cāru cāmara śobhitā
nīlotpala dala prakhyaiḥ kanyā vṛndaiḥ samāvṛtā
kāma kārmuka nirghoṣa vitrasta mṛga locanaiḥ
nūpura ārāva mukharaiḥ skhaladbhiḥ mṛdu vibhramaiḥ
manobhava śara āyāsa nipāta śata jarjaraiḥ
su ghūrṇita mada āyāsa vilola dhavala īkṣaṇaiḥ

original: saṃsevyate sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kamalalocanaḥ // SvaT_10.543 //
analyzed: saṃsevyate sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kamala locanaḥ
catur bhujaḥ mahā kāyaḥ pīna vakṣāḥ gadā dharaḥ
saṃsevyate sa bhagavān nikāyaiḥ ātma vikramaiḥ
viṣṇu bhaktāḥ ca ye nityam dhyāna pūjā jape ratāḥ

original: te tu gacchanti tatsthānaṃ viṣṇoramitavikramāḥ // SvaT_10.546 //
analyzed: te tu gacchanti tat sthānam viṣṇoḥ amita vikramāḥ
sapta koṭyaḥ tad ūrdhvam vai rudra lokaḥ vyavasthitaḥ
śuddha sphaṭika saṃkāśaḥ catvara udyāna maṇḍitaḥ
sahasra bhūmikābhiḥ ca harmya mālābhiḥ ūrjitaḥ
vimānaiḥ puṣpakaiḥ yuktaḥ haṃsa kunda indu nirmalaiḥ
vana upavana ṣaṇḍaiḥ ca sarva ṛtu kusuma ujjvalaiḥ
mārutāḥ sukha saṃsparśāḥ varti karpūra gandhayaḥ
vareṇyā avaradā ca eva variṣṭhā varavarṇinī

original: vasiṣṭhā ca varāhā ca varārohā ca saptamī /
analyzed: vasiṣṭhā ca varāhā ca vara ārohā ca saptamī
gaṅgā hi etāḥ samākhyātāḥ rudra loka vahāḥ sadā
lakṣa patra dala āḍhyaiḥ ca sita padmaiḥ vibhūṣitāḥ
indranīla nibhaiḥ nālaiḥ yojana āyata gandhibhiḥ
strī sahasra kadamba āḍhyāḥ puṣpa prakara dhūsarāḥ
śarad indu nibhāḥ anāryaḥ navanīta su komalāḥ
su bhrū lalāṭa vadanāḥ kṛśa udaryaḥ mada alasāḥ
ali puñja nibhaiḥ keśaiḥ mṛga āmoda sugandhibhiḥ
pralamba śravaṇa ādhārāḥ padma patra āyata īkṣaṇāḥ
dāḍimī puṣpa saṃkāśaiḥ oṣṭhaiḥ utpala gandhibhiḥ
rambhā nibhābhiḥ jaṅghābhiḥ bāhubhiḥ bisa komalaiḥ
aśoka pallava ākāraiḥ pādaiḥ padma dala upamaiḥ
nakhaiḥ ca ketakī prakhyaiḥ daśanaiḥ mauktika ujjvalaiḥ
svabhāva su sugandha āḍhyaiḥ prasravadbhiḥ iva amṛtam
hāra keyūra kaṭakaiḥ sīmanta maṇi jālakaiḥ
su raktaiḥ ca kusumaiḥ bhūṣitāḥ sadā
tāra kumbha nibha ākāraiḥ unnataiḥ ca payodharaiḥ
su vṛttaiḥ pīna pārśvaiḥ ca pīna kaṇṭha samāśritaiḥ
guru śreṇī bhara ākrāntāḥ muktā āvali virājitāḥ
rājahaṃsa gati spardhi matta mātaṅga vibhramāḥ
nūpura ārāva mukhara praskhalat mṛdu vikramāḥ
hāsya lāsya vilāsāḍhya bhrū bhaṅga tarala īkṣaṇāḥ
hlādayanti iva gātrāṇi rudrāṇām tad nivāsinām
kāma graha graha āviṣṭāḥ ghūrṇantyaḥ mada vihvalāḥ
ghūrṇantyaḥ
pariṣvajana mātreṇa modayantyaḥ gaṇeśvarān
yadi api evaṃvidhā anāryaḥ nija bhartṛ bhaya āturāḥ
vitrasta mṛga netrāḥ tu bhartuḥ utsaṅgam āgatāḥ

original: avagūhya ca sarvāṅgair āpīya vadanairmukham // SvaT_10.564 //
analyzed: avagūhya ca sarva aṅgaiḥ āpīya vadanaiḥ mukham
rudrāḥ ca evaṃvidha ākārāḥ jñāna yoga bala utkaṭāḥ
mukuṭaiḥ kuṇḍalaiḥ citraiḥ mahā ratna samujjvalaiḥ
keyūra kaṭakaiḥ ḍoraiḥ puṣpa vastra vibhūṣaṇaiḥ
muktāphala āvalī hāraiḥ brahmasūtra uttarīyakaiḥ
mahā kāyāḥ mahā uraskāḥ tri netrāḥ śūla pāṇayaḥ
candra ayuta pratīkāśāḥ karpūra kṣoda dhūsarāḥ
sura siddha nutāḥ sarve su prasanna vara pradāḥ
hara labdha varāḥ tṛptāḥ daśa bāhu indu maulayaḥ

original: na tatra mṛtyurna jarā na śoko 'sti viyogajaḥ // SvaT_10.569 //
analyzed: na tatra mṛtyuḥ na jarā na śokaḥ asti viyoga jaḥ
krīḍanti sārdham kanyābhiḥ saṃsāra bhaya varjitāḥ
adhikāra kṣaye rudrāḥ rudra kanyā samāvṛtāḥ
śrīkaṇṭhasya icchayā sarve śivam yānti tanu kṣaye

original: gatvā bhūyo na jāyante kalpakoṭiśatairapi // SvaT_10.571 //
analyzed: gatvā bhūyas na jāyante kalpa koṭi śataiḥ api
evaṃvidhaiḥ asaṃkhyātaiḥ vimāna ratha gāmibhiḥ
mahāvṛṣa gaja ārūḍhaiḥ siṃha vāji suvāhanaiḥ
lakṣa ayuta sahasraiḥ tu rudra koṭibhiḥ āvṛtam
tad madhye sarvatobhadram siṃha dvāraiḥ su toraṇaiḥ
svaccha mauktika saṃkāśa prākāra śikhara āvṛtam
nandīśvara mahākāla dvārapāla gaṇaiḥ vṛtam
kiṃkiṇī jāla mukharaiḥ patākā dhvaja saṃkulaiḥ
vitāna chatra ṣaṇḍaiḥ ca muktā hāra pralambitaiḥ
ghaṇṭā cāmara śobhāḍyam darpaṇaiḥ ca upaśobhitam
kalaśaiḥ dvāra nyastaiḥ ca ratna pallava saṃyutaiḥ
racitaiḥ citra śāstra jñaiḥ atna cūrṇa samujjvalaiḥ
svastikaiḥ patra valī āḍhyaiḥ citritam bhuvana ajiram
śata siṃhāsana ākīrṇam vedikā ratna bhūṣitam
gopura aṭṭāla rathakaiḥ vīthībhiḥ ca bhrama antrakaiḥ
sarva ratna vicitra āḍhyaiḥ dvāra baddhaiḥ su śobhanam
nirgamaiḥ su gavākṣaiḥ ca viṭaṅkaiḥ sphaṭika prabhaiḥ
stambhaiḥ sopāna baddhaiḥ ca vajra vaiḍūrya saprabhaiḥ
pūrṇa candra nibha ākāraiḥ aṇḍaiḥ śikhara maṇḍitaiḥ
muktāphala prabhābhiḥ ca bhūmibhiḥ ca sahasraśas
nāṭya śālaiḥ su śobhā āḍhyaiḥ nṛtta gīta rava ākulaiḥ
maṇḍapaiḥ ratna citra āḍhyaiḥ sabhā maṇḍala nirbharaiḥ
āsīnaiḥ rudra vṛndaiḥ ca rudra kanyā kadambakaiḥ
matta vāraṇakaiḥ ramyaiḥ candraśālā su śobhanaiḥ
dhūpitam dhūpa vartībhiḥ kuṅkuma udaka secitam
citra paṭṭaiḥ tu saṃchannam puṣpa prakara saṃkulam
tūrya śabda jaya dhvāna kāhalā kūjitena ca
vaṃśa vīṇā mṛdaṅgaiḥ ca gomukhaiḥ mukha vādanaiḥ
paṇavaiḥ tāla vādyaiḥ ca śaṅkha bherī raveṇa ca
dundubhī nāda śabdena muraja sphālanena ca
kara sphoṭa mahā śabdaiḥ siṃhanāda praguñjitaiḥ
garjadbhiḥ gaṇa vṛndaiḥ ca megha stanita niḥsvanaiḥ
vandinām stotra śabdena sāmaveda raveṇa ca
huḍuṅkāra aṭṭahāsaiḥ ca geya jhaṃkāra yojitaiḥ
vṛṣa nandita śabdena gaja vāji raveṇa ca
kāñcī nūpura śabdena nadati iva mahat puram

original: sarvasaṃpatkaraṃ śrīmac- chaṅkarasya tu mandiram // SvaT_10.589 //
analyzed: sarva saṃpad karam śrīmat śaṅkarasya tu mandiram
atra asau bhagavān rudraḥ brahma viṣṇu indra pūjitaḥ
divya vastra ambara chadaḥ
pṛthivyā gandha lipta aṅgaḥ śriyā puṣpaiḥ supūjitaḥ
sapta svara pramukhyaiḥ ca sarasvatyā ca saṃstutaḥ
ca svayam eva vyavasthitaḥ
sarva ādityāḥ ca dīpakāḥ
puṣpadanta gaṇeśa ādyaiḥ āsanam tasya saṃvṛtam
kapilaḥ karkaṭaḥ ca eva vimardaḥ kaṅkaṭaḥ tathā
vikramaḥ ca dṛḍhaḥ ca eva niṣkampaḥ niṣkalaḥ tathā

original: aṣṭau te harayaḥproktās trinetrā bhūrivikramāḥ // SvaT_10.594 //
analyzed: aṣṭau te harayaḥ proktāḥ tri netrāḥ bhūri vikramāḥ
siṃha rūpāḥ su tejaskāḥ saṭā vikaṭa bhāsvarāḥ
śakti rūpa dharaiḥ mantraiḥ yoga aiśvarya samanvitaiḥ
āsanam vivṛtam taiḥ tu mahā utsāhaiḥ bala utkaṭaiḥ
tatra bhadrāsane rudraḥ sthitaḥ candra ardha śekharaḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpūrṇaḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
tryakṣaḥ daśa bhujaḥ devaḥ jaṭā mukuṭa maṇḍitaḥ
pīna vakṣaḥsthala ūruḥ ca pīna skandhaḥ mahā bhujaḥ
baddha padmāsana āsīnaḥ karpūra kṣoda dhūsaraḥ
vara da abhaya pāṇiḥ ca sarva āyudha dharaḥ tathā
śatapatra aṅkitaiḥ ca eva hasta pādaiḥ su komalaiḥ
candra bimba nakha ābhābhiḥ aṅgulībhiḥ alaṃkṛtaiḥ
su śliṣṭa jānu gulphaiḥ ca pādaiḥ ca eva samunnataiḥ
pūjitaiḥ gaṇa rudraiḥ ca brahma viṣṇu indra vanditaiḥ
cāmara vyajana ukṣepaiḥ rudra strībhiḥ samantataḥ
vījataḥ tu sadā śrīmān candra koṭi sama prabhaḥ
dhyātaḥ vai yogibhiḥ nityam prasanna vadana īkṣaṇaḥ
prahasan saḥ iva ābhāti nirmala jñāna raśmibhiḥ
ajñāna timiram hatvā darśayet paramam vapuḥ
sarva saukhya pradātā ca rudra mātṛ gaṇa āvṛtaḥ
tasya utsaṅga gatā devī tapta kāñcana su prabhā
pūjitā yoginī vṛndaiḥ sādhakaiḥ sura kinnaraiḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpūrṇā sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitā
devasya abhimukhī nityam umā tu lalita īkṣaṇā
śaktiḥ ca apara rūpeṇa śaktimān ca haraḥ tathā
brahmāṇḍe sṛṣṭi saṃhārau karoti ca śiva icchayā
dīkṣā jñāna vihīnāḥ ye liṅga ārādhana tatparāḥ
te prayānti hara sthānam sarva aiśvarya sukha āvaham
jarā maraṇa nirmuktāḥ vyādhi śoka vivarjitāḥ
na adhas yānti punar devi saṃsāre duḥkha sāgare
śivam yānti tatas ca ūrdhvam śrīkaṇṭhena samīkṣitāḥ
rudra lokaḥ samākhyātaḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam ume śṛṇu
uttara uttara vṛddhyā ca bhuvanam bhuvanaṃsthitam
brahmāṇḍasya api adhobhāge rudra lokasya ca ūrdhvatas
daṇḍapāṇeḥ puram jñā iyam nānā rudra gaṇa āvṛtam
daṇḍapāṇiḥ tu bhagavān yoga aiśvarya bala anvitaḥ
daṇḍaḥ pāṇi talena eva dhṛtaḥ yena śiva icchayā
vivṛṇoti ca brahmāṇḍe mokṣa mārgam su durbhidam
vidhinā ārādhitaḥ ca eva anudhyānāt śiva icchayā
sapta lokeṣu ye kathayāmi samāsatas

original: śarvorudrastathā bhīmo bhava ugrastathaiva ca // SvaT_10.615 //
analyzed: śarvaḥ urudraḥ tathā bhīmaḥ bhavaḥ ugraḥ tathā eva ca
mahādevaḥ tathā īśānaḥ rudra loka adhipaḥ tu amī
brahma loke sthitaḥ brahmā viṣṇuḥ vai vaiṣṇave pure
rudra loke sthitaḥ rudraḥ sarveṣām nāyakaḥ smṛtaḥ
kālāgneḥ daṇḍapāṇi antam aṣṭānavati koṭayaḥ
yojanānām varārohe tu adhvā ayam upavarṇitaḥ
kaṭāhaḥ tu adhas ca ūrdhvam brahmāṇḍasya varānane
koṭi yojana mānena ghana ākāreṇa saṃsthitaḥ
pañcāśat koṭayaḥ ca ūrdhvam bhū pṛṣṭhāt tu varānane
pañcāśat ca adhas jñeyā yojanānām samantataḥ

original: evaṃ koṭiśataṃ jñeyaṃ pārthivaṃ tattvamucyate // SvaT_10.620 //
analyzed: evam koṭi śatam jñeyam pārthivam tattvam ucyate
śata rudrau adhijñeyam sauvarṇam parivartulam
vajra sāra adhika sāram durbhedyam tridaśaiḥ api
huṃ phaṭkāra prayogeṇa bhedayet tu varānane
śata rudrān atas vakṣye samāsena kṛśa udari
daśa daśa krameṇa eva daśa dikṣu samantataḥ
pūrva ādi krama yogena kathayāmi anupūrvaśas
vajradehaḥ pramardanaḥ
vibhūtiḥ avyayaḥ śāstā pinākī tridaśādhipaḥ
indrasya balam ākramya prabhu śakti samanvitāḥ
vicaranti mahādevāḥ indreṇa ca su pūjitāḥ
agni rudraḥ hutāśī ca piṅgalaḥ khādakaḥ haraḥ
bhasmāntaka kṣayāntakau
agneḥ balam samākramya prabhu śakti samanvitāḥ
vicaranti mahādevāḥ agnirāja su pūjitāḥ

original: saṃyoktā ca viyoktā ca dharmo dharmapatistathā // SvaT_10.628 //
analyzed: saṃyoktā ca viyoktā ca dharmaḥ dharma patiḥ tathā
yamasya balam ākramya prabhu śakti samanvitāḥ
vicaranti mahādevāḥ yama rāja su pūjitāḥ
krūra dṛṣṭiḥ bhayānakaḥ
ūrdhva keśaḥ virūpa akṣaḥ dhūma lohita daṃṣṭrakau
nairṛtaṃbalam ākramya prabhu śakti samanvitāḥ
vicaranti mahā devāḥ nairṛta indra su pūjitāḥ
balaḥ hi atibalaḥ ca eva pāśa hastaḥ mahā balaḥ
jayabhadraḥ ca dīrghabāhuḥ jalāntakaḥ
meghanādī sunādī ca samāsāt parikīrtitāḥ
vāruṇam balam ākramya prabhu śakti samanvitāḥ
vicaranti mahā devāḥ varuṇa indra su pūjitāḥ
śīghraḥ laghuḥ vāyu vegaḥ sūkṣmaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ bhayānakaḥ
vāyoḥ tu balam ākramya prabhu śakti samanvitāḥ
vicaranti mahādevāḥ vāyurāja su pūjitāḥ
nidhi īśaḥ rūpavān dhanyaḥ sau
yadā īhaḥ jaṭā dharaḥ
saumyasya balam ākramya prabhu śakti samanvitāḥ
vicaranti mahā devāḥ somarāja su pūjitāḥ
sarvajñaḥ jñāna dṛś vedapāragaḥ
śarvaḥ sureśaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ ca bhūtapālaḥ baliḥpriyaḥ
īśāna anumatāḥ devāḥ ceṣṭante sura pūjitāḥ
vicaranti mahādevāḥ īśa śaktyā tu adhiṣṭhitāḥ
grasana uḍambara īśau ca phaṇīndraḥ vajradaṃṣṭrakaḥ
viṣṇoḥ tu balam ākramya prabhu śakti samanvitāḥ
vicaranti mahā devāḥ anantena su pūjitāḥ
śaṃbhuḥ vibhuḥ gaṇādhyakṣaḥ tryakṣaḥ ca tridaśeśvaraḥ
saṃvāhaḥ ca vivāhaḥ ca nala lipsuḥ trilocanaḥ
brahmaṇaḥ balam ākramya prabhu śakti samanvitāḥ
vicaranti mahādevāḥ brahmaṇā eva su pūjitāḥ
ekaikasya sahasram tu parivāraḥ abhidhīyate
śatarudrāḥ iti khyātāḥ brahmāṇḍam vyāpya saṃsthitāḥ

original: asaṃkhyātāḥ sahasrāṇi ye ca ūrdhvādidiggatāḥ // SvaT_10.645 //
analyzed: asaṃkhyātāḥ sahasrāṇi ye ca ūrdhva ādi diś gatāḥ
svacchanda viśva gāḥ devāḥ kalpa manvantareṣu api

original: pūrvādidaśadigrudrāḥ sthitā daśa daśaiva tu // SvaT_10.646 //
analyzed: pūrva ādi daśa diś rudrāḥ sthitāḥ daśa daśa eva tu
ekaikam adhipam ca eva kathayāmi varānane

original: sthito vai pūrvato 'ṇḍasya śveto vai nāma nāmataḥ // SvaT_10.647 //
analyzed: sthitaḥ vai pūrvatas ṇḍasya śvetaḥ vai nāma nāmataḥ
rudrāṇām tu śataiḥ yuktaḥ mahā vīrya parākramaḥ
dīptimadbhiḥ mahā tīvraiḥ mayūkhaiḥ iva bhāskaraḥ
āgneyyām agni saṃkāśaḥ vaidyutaḥ nāma viśrutaḥ
saḥ pi vidyutprabhaiḥ udra śataiḥ tu parivāritaḥ
yāmye ṇḍasya mahākālaḥ yugānta anala saṃnibhaḥ
śata rudraiḥ vṛtaḥ devi tiṣṭhati amita vikramaiḥ
nairṛtaḥ vikaṭaḥ nāma śatena parivāritaḥ

original: saṃtiṣṭhate mahātejā dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ // SvaT_10.651 //
analyzed: saṃtiṣṭhate mahā tejāḥ dvitīyaḥ iva bhāskaraḥ

original: paścime 'ṇḍasya yo rudro mahāvīrya iti śrutaḥ /
analyzed: paścime ṇḍasya yaḥ rudraḥ mahā vīryaḥ iti śrutaḥ
śata rudraiḥ vṛtaḥ saḥ tiṣṭhati amita vikramaḥ
vāyavya diśi ca aṇḍasya vāyu vegaḥ mahā balaḥ

original: śatena ca vṛtaḥ śrīmāṃs tiṣṭhatyatra mahābalaḥ // SvaT_10.653 //
analyzed: śatena ca vṛtaḥ śrīmān tiṣṭhati atra mahā balaḥ
subhadra nāma uttaratas śatena parivāritaḥ
mahā vīrya bala upetaḥ tiṣṭhati atra mahā balaḥ
pariviṣṭaḥ marīcībhiḥ tatratiṣṭhati vīryavān

original: vidyādharo nāma rudra aiśānyāṃ vai pratiṣṭhitaḥ // SvaT_10.655 //
analyzed: vidyādharaḥ nāma rudraḥ aiśānyām vai pratiṣṭhitaḥ
śata rudraiḥ vṛtaḥ saḥ pi pariviṣṭaḥ iva uḍurāj
mahā vīrya bala upetaḥ tiṣṭhate nanta vikramaḥ
adhas kālāgni rudraḥ nyaḥ sthitaḥ tu atra dvitīyakaḥ
samāvṛtaḥ rudra śataiḥ sthitaiḥ tu atra varānane
śataiḥ samāvṛtaḥ rudra mayūkhaiḥ iva bhāskaraḥ
vīrabhadraḥ upari aṇḍasya saṃsthitaḥ
ekādaśaḥ rudra krodha samudbhavaiḥ

original: evaṃte 'tramahātmāna ekaikaṃ tu śatena ca // SvaT_10.659 //
analyzed: evam te tri mahātmānaḥ ekaikam tu śatena ca
daśā ete veṣṭitāḥ devi śata rudraiḥ ca suvrate
eṣām aparisaṃkhyeyaḥ parivāraḥ mahātmanām
āvṛtya aṇḍam sthitāḥ ahi ete madhu yadvat madhu vratāḥ
kadamba kusumam yadvat kesaraiḥ parivāritam
parivāritam tathā hi aṇḍam rudraiḥ amita vikramaiḥ
gṛhaiḥ sa toraṇa aṭṭālaiḥ nānā ratna vicitritaiḥ
jāmbūnada mayaiḥ citraiḥ samantāt samalaṃkṛtam
divya nārībhiḥ ākīrṇam sarva kāma samanvitam
brahmāṇḍam etat ākhyātam pāśa jāla avatāritam
janma vyādhi jarā mṛtyu mahā udadhi pariplutam
guṇatraya mala channam nānā jāti samākulam
paśu jñāna parikrāntam gati traya samākulam
anityāḥ eva gatayaḥ sarveṣām eva vādinām
para apara vibhāgam tu na eva jānanti mohitāḥ
hema aṇḍam tu purā sṛṣṭam kṣaya ātma bhuvana ākṛti
īśa māyā samāviṣṭasi ātma vargasya bhūtaye
atha upariṣṭāt tattvāni udaka ādi śiva antakam
uttara uttara yogena daśadhā saṃsthitāni tu
ahaṃkāraḥ tad ūrdhvam tu buddhiḥ tu śatadhā āsthitā

original: ūrdhvaṃ sahasradhā jñeyaṃ pradhānaṃ varavarṇini // SvaT_10.669 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam sahasradhā jñeyam pradhānam varavarṇini
pauruṣam daśa sāhasram niyatiḥ lakṣadhā smṛtā

original: tadūrdhvaṃ daśalakṣāṇi kalā yāvattu suvrate // SvaT_10.670 //
analyzed: tad ūrdhvam daśa lakṣāṇi kalāḥ yāvat tu suvrate

original: māyā tu koṭidhāvyāpya sthitā sarvaṃ carācaram /
analyzed: māyā tu koṭidhā vyāpya sthitā sarvam carācaram
daśa koṭi guṇā vidyā māyām vyāpya vyavasthitā
śata koṭi guṇena eva vyāptā asau īśvareṇa tu
sādākhyam koṭi sāhasram bindu nādam tad ūrdhvatas

original: yojanānāṃ tu vṛndaṃ vai śaktirvyāpya vyavasthitā /
analyzed: yojanānām tu vṛndam vai śaktiḥ vyāpya vyavasthitā
vyāpinī sarvam adhvānam vyāpya devi vyavasthitā
aprameyam tatas jñeyam śivatattvam varānane
bhuvanāni pravakṣyāmi ap tattva ādau anukramāt
ākāram vibhavam ca eva bhuvana aneka vistaram
yat na dṛṣṭam paśu jñānaiḥ kupatha bhrānta dṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: yanna sāṃkhyairna yogairvā na caiva pāñcarātrikaiḥ /
analyzed: yat na sāṃkhyaiḥ na yogaiḥ vā na ca eva pāñcarātrikaiḥ
svabhāva vādibhiḥ na api na ca karma pravādibhiḥ
na api saṃśaya vādaiḥ ca nagna kṣapaṇaka ādibhiḥ
na bhūta vādibhiḥ ca eva nā api syāt lokikaiḥ api
na ca ātma cintakaiḥ vā api na ca tarka pravādibhiḥ
na ca vaiśeṣikaiḥ vā api ṣaṣ padārtha parāyaṇaiḥ
na ca api nyāya vādaiḥ ca hetu dṛṣṭānta vādibhiḥ
na api eka janma vādaiḥ ca na ca api ekatva vādibhiḥ
na dhūrta vādaiḥ lokaiḥ vā su parijñātam aiśvaram

original: ityevaṃvādināṃ teṣāṃ vādānāṃ tu śatatrayam // SvaT_10.680 //
analyzed: iti evaṃvādinām teṣām vādānām tu śata trayam
triṣaṣṭiḥ adhikāḥ ca anye vādinām bhrānta cetasām
saṃsāra paṅka magnānām nauḥ iva uttāraṇam param
mahā moha tamaḥ ndhānām tamonudam idam param
parameśa mukha udbhūtam yat mayā prāptam adbhutam
jñāna amṛtam idam divyam
śṛṇuṣva ekamanāḥ devi vicitra ākāram adbhutam
anantaḥ bhuvana vrātaḥ tu avyucchedāt vyavasthitaḥ
madhu kośa jālaka vat tathā bhūri caya āvṛtiḥ
mīna śaṃkha kulāya ābham dāṣimī bīja vat sthitam
kadamba kesara nibham purāṇām tu samūhakam
mahā senā vāsaka vat vane taru samūha vat
nirantaram anantāni bhuvanāni varānane
nānā ākārāṇi citrāṇi sarva ratna mayāni ca
parimaṇḍalāni dīrghāṇi ardhacandra ākṛtīni ca
puruṣa ākṛtīni ca anyāni nandyāvarta ākṛtīni ca
parvata ākṛti rūpāṇi gaja yutha ākṛtīni ca
śarāva ākṛtīni ca anyāni jvālā rūpa ākṛtīni ca
mahā vimāna rūpāṇi triśūla ākṛtimanti ca
muraja ākṛtīni ca anyāni tryaśra ākṛti purāṇi ca
mahāpuruṣa rūpāṇi śata śṛṅga ākṛtīni ca
sahasra śṛṅga āvartāni tathā anyāni varānane
koṭi śṛṅgāṇi ca anyāni asaṃkhya śikharāṇi ca
vṛttāni caturaśrāṇi tri koṇāni aparāṇi ca
divya citra patākāni divya ghaṇṭā dhvajāni ca
bheri nāda svara āḍhyāni divya gīta dhvanīni ca
divya dundubhi nādāni mahā veṇu svanāni ca
nānā vāditra ghoṣāṇi bhuvanāni ca sarvadā
śuklāni sphaṭika ābhāni padmarāga ākṛtīni ca
candrakānta savarṇāni muktā dāma nibhāni ca
lākṣā rasa savarṇāni kānicid varavarṇini
indragopaka varṇāni indranīla nibhāni ca
nīlotpala savarṇāni vidyut puñja nibhāni ca
bāla āditya savarṇāni padmagarbha nibhāni ca
candra prabhāni ca anyāni candra koṭi nibhāni ca
madhyāhna arka savarṇāni sūrya koṭi nibhāni ca
aśoka stavaka ābhāni haritāla nibhāni ca
śakra cāpa savarṇāni go kṣīra dhavalāni ca
sindūra kuṅkuma ābhāni gorocana nibhāni ca
tapta hema savarṇāni nirdhūma agni nibhāni ca
śaṅkha pāṇḍura varṇāni kānicid bhuvanāni ca
nānā varṇāni ca anyāni nānā rūpa ākṛtīni ca

original: eteṣāṃ parato devi vyāpakaṃ paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: eteṣām paratas devi vyāpakam paramam padam
aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam agamyam sarva vādinām
vinā prasādāt īśasya jñānam etat na labhyate

original: nacāpi bhāvo bhavati dīkṣāmaprāpya dehinām // SvaT_10.703 //
analyzed: na ca api bhāvaḥ bhavati dīkṣām a prāpya dehinām
yadā tu kāraṇāt śaktiḥ bhavet nirvāṇa kārikā

original: śivecchayā prapadyeta dīkṣāṃ jñānamayīṃ śubhām // SvaT_10.704 //
analyzed: śiva icchayā prapadyeta dīkṣām jñāna mayīm śubhām
mantra yoga ātmikā divyām tatas mokṣam vrajet paśuḥ
na anyathā mokṣam āyāti api jñāna śataiḥ api
yasya prakāśitam sarvam śivena ananta rūpiṇā

original: sa eva mokṣaṃ vrajati śivaḥ sarvamaheśvaraḥ // SvaT_10.706 //
analyzed: saḥ eva mokṣam vrajati śivaḥ sarva mahā īśvaraḥ

original: tenedaṃ jñānamukhyaṃ tu purā proktaṃ mayā tava /
analyzed: tena idam jñāna mukhyam tu purā proktam mayā tava
saṃsāra arṇava magnānām nauḥ iva uttāraṇam param
mahāmāyā añjana atītam ajñātam paśu gocare
anantam pāram akṣobhyam su bodham parameśvaram
parameśa mukha udgīrṇam yat mayā prāptam adbhutam
vakṣye jñāna amṛtam idam śṛṇuṣva ekamanāḥ priye
ūrdhvam vai brahmaṇaḥ ṇḍasya pura ekādaśakam sthitam
ekādaśānām rudrāṇām yuga anta agni sama tviṣām
atha ūrdhve bhuvanam devyāḥ kathayāmi varānane
indranīla mayam divyam samantāt parimaṇḍalam
tasmin bhagavatī devī bhadrakālī vyavasthitā
vasati indīvara śyāmā snigdha kaṅkuṣṭa saprabhā
sūrya maṇḍala rūpābhyām kuṇḍalābhyām alaṅkṛtā

original: paurṇamāsyāṃ yathā sandhyā candrarkābhyāṃ virājate // SvaT_10.713 //
analyzed: paurṇamāsyām yathā sandhyā candra arkābhyām virājate
rājate ca mahā āhāraḥ stanābhyām antare sthitaḥ
asitāñjana śailābhyām madhye srotaḥ vahā yathā
caturbhiḥ ca dhṛtam pīṭham siṃhaiḥ amita vikramaiḥ
sarva vajra maye divye divya ratna vibhūṣite
āsane su prabhe devī jāti añjana sama prabhā

original: śukle himavataḥ śṛṅge nīlamegha iva sthitā // SvaT_10.716 //
analyzed: śukle himavataḥ śṛṅge nīla meghe iva sthitā
sarva ratna mayī divyā raśanā āsyā virājate
pīta mālya aṃśukavatī śarvarī vāruṇa udaye
tṛtīyam nayanam tasyāḥ lalāṭa stham virājate
udaya sthaḥ iva ādityaḥ raśmi jāla vibhūṣitaḥ
ucchritena ātapatreṇa sā śvetena virājate
kṛṣṇa megha upari sthena candreṇa iva vibhāvarī
koṭi koṭi sahasreṇa strīṇām tu parivāritā
āvṛtā candra lekhā iva nakṣatraiḥ tu nabhastale
kumuda utpala varṇāḥ ca hema śyāmāḥ ca yoṣitaḥ
priyaṅgu kalikā śyāmāḥ candra gauryaḥ sayauvanāḥ
padma avadāta rūpiṇyaḥ pīna śroṇi payodharāḥ
hāva bhāva vidhi jñāḥ tu nṛtta gīta viśāradāḥ
vīṇā veṇu mṛdaṅga ādyaiḥ vaṃśa vāditra niḥsvanaiḥ

original: upāsīnāstu tāṃ devīṃ ramante tatra yoṣitaḥ // SvaT_10.723 //
analyzed: upāsīnāḥ tu tām devīm ramante tatra yoṣitaḥ

original: evaṃ viddhi jayaṃ nāma bhuvanaṃ tu varānane /
analyzed: evam viddhi jayam nāma bhuvanam tu varānane

original: yā durgeti smṛtā loke brahmāṇḍodaravartinī // SvaT_10.724 //
analyzed: yā durgā iti smṛtā loke brahmāṇḍa udara vartinī
viṣṇunā tapasā pūrvam ārādhya parameśvaram
avatāritāḥ vadha ārtāya mahiṣasya mahātmanaḥ

original: yena caikena śṛṅgeṇa bhagavān himavān giriḥ /
analyzed: yena ca ekena śṛṅgeṇa bhagavān himavān giriḥ
śuṣka parṇam iva kṣiptaḥ bhagavatyā vināśitaḥ

original: sā taṃ vināśāyeddevī tamaḥ sūrya ivotthitaḥ /
analyzed: sā tam vināśāya it devī tamaḥ sūryaḥ iva utthitaḥ

original: sā devī sarvadevīnāṃ nāmarūpaiśca tiṣṭhati // SvaT_10.727 //
analyzed: sā devī sarva devīnām nāma rūpaiḥ ca tiṣṭhati
yoga māyā praticchannā kumārī loka bhāvinī

original: acintyā cāprameyā ca anyatra paripaṭhyate // SvaT_10.728 //
analyzed: acintyā ca aprameyā ca anyatra paripaṭhyate

original: viṣṇunā sahitā devī kalpe kalpe punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇunā sahitā devī kalpe kalpe punar punar

original: manvantare manvantare tathā caiva yuge yuge /
analyzed: manvantare manvantare tathā ca eva yuge yuge

original: rakṣaṇārthaṃ hi lokānāṃ māteva hitakāriṇī // SvaT_10.730 //
analyzed: rakṣaṇa artham hi lokānām mātā iva hita kāriṇī

original: ityākhyātaṃ tu bhuvanaṃ jayaṃ nāma varānane /
analyzed: iti ākhyātam tu bhuvanam jayam nāma varānane
tad bhaktāḥ tatra gacchanti tasyāḥ maṇḍala dīkṣitāḥ
na ca etat tapasā prāpyam na yajñaiḥ bhūri dakṣiṇaiḥ

original: na dānairvividhaiścāpi śakyaṃ prāptuṃ varānane // SvaT_10.732 //
analyzed: na dānaiḥ vividhaiḥ ca api śakyam prāptum varānane
prasādāt devadevasya śaśāṅka aṅkita maulinaḥ

original: dīkṣāṃ prāpya prāpnuvanti maṇḍalaṃ cakravartinām // SvaT_10.733 //
analyzed: dīkṣām prāpya prāpnuvanti maṇḍalam cakravartinām
nirbīja dīkṣayā mokṣam dadāti khalu dehinām
sā mukti dīkṣā paramā vidhivat parikīrtitā
vidyeśa āvaraṇe dīkṣā yavatī kriyate nṛṇām
tāvatīm gatim āpnoti bhuvane varānane
bhuvanāni tad īśān ca saṃsthānāni yathākramam

original: kathayiṣyāmi te sarvaṃ śṛṇuṣvaikamanāḥ priye // SvaT_10.736 //
analyzed: kathayiṣyāmi te sarvam śṛṇuṣva ekamanāḥ priye
bhadrakālyām paraḥ devaḥ rudra krodha samudbhavaḥ
koṭi mātreṇa deveśi yuga anta agni sama prabhaḥ
śata bāhuḥ mahā tejāḥ divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
śirasi indu dharaḥ śyāmaḥ nīlāñjana sama dyutiḥ
śikhi kaṇṭha nibhaḥ kiñcid kiñcid āpāṇḍu lohitaḥ
cāṣa jīmūta varṇaḥ ca atasī puṣpa saṃnibhaḥ
indranīla nibhaḥ kiñcid kiñcid bhṛṅga nibha ākṛtiḥ
jāti añjana nibha ākāraḥ rudra ekādaśika anvitaḥ

original: yutaṃ koṭisahasreṇa rudrāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām // SvaT_10.741 //
analyzed: yutam koṭi sahasreṇa rudrāṇām ca mahātmanām

original: bhuvanaṃ tasya devasya vijayaṃ nāma viśrutam /
analyzed: bhuvanam tasya devasya vijayam nāma viśrutam
indranīla nibham divyam sarva vajra nibham mahat
daśa koṭi sahasrāṇi rudrāṇām varavarṇini
antar bhuvana saṃghātaiḥ anyaiḥ ca parivāritam
nīlotpala dala śyāmaiḥ śikhi kaṇṭha nibhaiḥ tathā
rudraiḥ divyaiḥ mahā vīryaiḥ samantāt parivāritam
stutibhiḥ maṅgalaiḥ gītaiḥ
paṇavaiḥ veṇu vīṇābhiḥ bherī jhallari gomukhaiḥ
paṭahaiḥ kāhalaiḥ ca eva śaṅkha dundubhi pīlukaiḥ
mṛd dalaiḥ taṭṭarībhiḥ ca tālakaiḥ murajaiḥ tathā
maundaka ahala ṭaṅkaiḥ ca tamila draghaṭa ādibhiḥ
vāditraiḥ valgitaiḥ tālaiḥ roṭanaiḥ mukha mṛd dalaiḥ
bhūtaiḥ bhūta gaṇaiḥ rudraiḥ jalpitaiḥ paṭhitaiḥ tathā
dhyāyādbhiḥ ca japadbhiḥ ca dhāvadbhiḥ ceṣṭitaiḥ tathā
mayūra kokila ārāvān muñcadbhiḥ ca tathā aparaiḥ
nānā ruta vilāsaiḥ ca vikurvadbhiḥ mahātmabhiḥ
āvṛtaḥ taiḥ mahā tejāḥ mayūkhaiḥ iva bhāskaraḥ
gaja vaktraiḥ siṃha vaktraiḥ aśva vaktraiḥ śubha ānanaiḥ
gokarṇaiḥ gomukhaiḥ ca anyaiḥ dvīpi ṛkṣa mukhaiḥ tathā
vyāghra vānara vakaiḥ ca bhagavān paryupāsyate
vīrabhadraḥ mahā tejāḥ yuga anta agni sama prabhaḥ

original: āsanaṃ tasya devasya sarvavajramayaṃ mahat // SvaT_10.752 //
analyzed: āsanam tasya devasya sarva vajra mayam mahat
daśa yojana vistīrṇam catur asra anala prabham
rājate tra aṣṭabhiḥ siṃhaiḥ vṛtam bhīma parākramaiḥ

original: atra te puṇyakarmāṇaḥ ye smaranti maheśvaram /
analyzed: atra te puṇya karmāṇaḥ ye smaranti maheśvaram

original: jale marutsvathāgnau vā śiraśchedena vā mṛtāḥ // SvaT_10.754 //
analyzed: jale marutsu atha agnau vā śiraḥ chedena vā mṛtāḥ

original: te yānti caiśvaraṃ bodhaṃ vīrabhadraṃ mahādyutim /
analyzed: te yānti ca aiśvaram bodham vīrabhadram mahā dyutim

original: bhuvanasyāsya deveśi hy uparyāvaraṇaṃ mahat // SvaT_10.755 //
analyzed: bhuvanasya asya deveśi hi upari āvaraṇam mahat

original: ammayaṃ tu ghanaṃ cāpi śakracāpamiva sthitam /
analyzed: ammayam tu ghanam ca api śakra cāpam iva sthitam
vitānam iva tat bhadram antare samavasthitam
tatra ca āste mahātmā asau aṅguṣṭha agra pramāṇakaḥ
tatra yojana koṭiḥ vai viṣkambhāt ūrdhvam ucyate
tiryak triguṇa vistāram āpyam āvaraṇam priye
āvṛtam tena tat sarvam mahā ambhodhi visāriṇā

original: rudrāṇḍa iti vikhyātaṃ rudrāloka iti priye /
analyzed: rudrāṇḍaḥ iti vikhyātam rudrālokaḥ iti priye
vīrabhadra niketaḥ ca bhadrakālī ālayaḥ tathā
trayodaśabhiḥ anyaiḥ ca bhuvānaiḥ upaśobhitam
nānā rudra gaṇaiḥ divyaiḥ nirantaram alaṃkṛtam
aṇḍam vai vīrabhadrasya brahmāṇḍa sadṛśam priye

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dharitryā bhuvanaṃ mahat // SvaT_10.761 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi dharitryāḥ bhuvanam mahat

original: hairaṇyamatulaṃ prāptā ādhāraṃ yatra saṃsthitā // SvaT_10.762 //
analyzed: hairaṇyam atulam prāptāḥ ādhāram yatra saṃsthitā
cakravarti vimānaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ parivāritam
āvṛtam bhūta saṃghātaiḥ ācāryaiḥ tad parāyaṇaiḥ
divya gīta nināda āḍhyaiḥ vāditra śata niḥsvanaiḥ
antar bhuvana saṃghātaiḥ rudrāṇām parivāritam
bhuvanasya asya madhye tu udaya āditya saṃnibhaḥ
rakta utpala nibhaḥ aśoka stabaka chaviḥ
padmarāga mayaḥ divyaḥ prāsādaḥ bahu bhūmikaḥ

original: tasya madhye bhagavatī dharitrī lokadhāriṇī // SvaT_10.766 //
analyzed: tasya madhye bhagavatī dharitrī loka dhāriṇī
mālayā rakta puṣpasya lambayā nitya bhūṣitā
candra arka maṇḍala ākāra kapola tala bhūṣitā

śata yojana vistīrṇe kūrma pṛṣṭhe vyavasthitā
catur vaktrā ca aṣṭa bhujā divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitā
rūpa yauvana saṃpannāḥ nṛtta gīta viśāradāḥ

original: parivāryopāsate tāṃ divyā vai mānasāḥ striyaḥ /
analyzed: parivārya upāsate tām divyāḥ vai mānasāḥ striyaḥ

utpāditāḥ tu śarveṇa tad artham hitam icchatā
tapta jāmbūnada nibhāḥ divya ābharaṇa śobhitāḥ

puras sthitaḥ mahā tejāḥ sau meruḥ mahā giriḥ

original: upāsīnastu tāṃ devīṃ tatrāste sa nagādhipaḥ /

ati kāntena rūpeṇa kaiṭabhāriḥ iva aparaḥ

śvetātapatrī tejasvī śvetaḥ nāma mahā giriḥ
tasya uttareṇa sūrya ābhaḥ mukuṭa ādi vibhūṣitaḥ
pīta ambara dharaḥ śrīmān śṛṅgavān iti viśrutaḥ
ati kāntena rūpeṇa kusuma astraḥ iva aparaḥ
dakṣiṇena api vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva avahitā priye
candra avadāta dīpta ojāḥ divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
śukla ambara dharaḥ śrīmān niṣadhaḥ nāma viśrutaḥ
tapta hema pratīkāśaḥ divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
ati śubhreṇa dehena pitāmahaḥ iva aparaḥ
pīta ambara dharaḥ śrīmān pīta mālya anulepanaḥ
hemakūṭaḥ mahā tejāḥ tejasām iva saṅgrahaḥ

original: rājate bhagavān śailaḥ sandhyāvṛta ivāṃśumān // SvaT_10.781 //
analyzed: rājate bhagavān śailaḥ sandhyā vṛtaḥ iva aṃśumān
pāṇḍura abhra pratīkāśaḥ śaṅkha go kṣīra saṃnibhaḥ

original: himavāniti vikhyāto dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ // SvaT_10.783 //

original: kirīṭī kuṇḍalī śrīmān mālyavānnāma parvataḥ // SvaT_10.785 //
analyzed: kirīṭī kuṇḍalī śrīmān mālyavān nāma parvataḥ

original: dhāraṇāṃ gandhatanmātre prāṇāṃstyaktvā tu yoginaḥ // SvaT_10.787 //

original: ataḥ parataraṃ devi sāmudraṃ bhuvanaṃ mahat // SvaT_10.788 //

original: tasya madhye tu puruṣo rukmavarṇo mahādyutiḥ /

original: upāsate sadā bhaktyā vāruṇīṃ paramāṃ tanum // SvaT_10.797 //

original: rasatanmātra atraiva kṛtvā samyaktu dhāraṇām // SvaT_10.798 //

original: apāṃ yoniṃ parāṃ prāptāḥ vāruṇī sā parā tanuḥ /

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi bhuvanaṃ varavarṇini // SvaT_10.799 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi bhuvanam varavarṇini

original: śrīniketa iti khyātaṃ padmagarbha iti śrutam /
analyzed: śrīniketaḥ iti khyātam padmagarbhaḥ iti śrutam
vimāna śata saṃghātaiḥ nirantaram avasthitaiḥ
śobhitam bhuvaneśaiḥ ca rudraiḥ rudra gaṇaiḥ tathā

ratha cakra pramāṇaiḥ ca maṇi kāñcana maṇḍitaiḥ
vaidūrya nālaiḥ kamalaiḥ divya gandha sugandhibhiḥ

udyānaiḥ vividhaiḥ ca api nānā vihaga kūjitaiḥ

original: tasya madhye bhagavatī śrī svayaṃ lokabhāvinī /
analyzed: tasya madhye bhagavatī śrī svayam loka bhāvinī
candra koṭi sahasrāṇām yā kāntim ativartate

original: upaviṣṭātra sā nityaṃ vibhūtyā parayā yutā // SvaT_10.813 //

original: ardhena sā bhagavatī viṣṇoraṅge pratiṣṭhātā // SvaT_10.819 //
analyzed: ardhena sā bhagavatī viṣṇoḥ aṅge pratiṣṭhātā

original: tadardhena manuṣyeṣu yā sthitā vyāpya mūrtibhiḥ /

original: svarūpā kāmarūpā ca dvidhā sā parikīrtitā // SvaT_10.821 //
analyzed: svarūpā kāmarūpā ca dvidhā sā parikīrtitā

original: acalā sā tanuḥ sūkṣmā akṣobhyā tatra tiṣṭhati /

original: satsvanyeṣvapi bhāgeṣu tv iyaṃ sā gaditā gatiḥ // SvaT_10.823 //
