tasmāt ete pravartante yajñāḥ yajña phalāni ca
tapaḥ dāna ādibhiḥ sārdham vāma śaktyā niyantritāḥ
iti eṣṭau tanavaḥ tu etāḥ parāḥ vai saṃprakīrtitāḥ

original: aparā brahmaṇo 'ṇḍaṃ vai vyāpya sarvaṃ vyavasthitāḥ // SvaT_10.920 //
analyzed: aparāḥ brahmaṇaḥ ṇḍam vai vyāpya sarvam vyavasthitāḥ
ebhyaḥ parataram ca api maṇḍalam karaṇa ātmakam

original: śuklaraktāsitaṃ pītaṃ haritaṃ cāpi varṇataḥ // SvaT_10.921 //
analyzed: śukla rakta asitam pītam haritam ca api varṇataḥ
pañca adhipāḥ tu tiṣṭhanti maṇḍale karaṇa ātmake
karma devāḥ pravartante tasmāt vai sarva dehinām
vāc pāṇi pāda pāyuḥ ca upasthaḥ ca iti pañcamaḥ

original: ebhyaḥ prakāśakaṃ nāma parataḥ sūryasaṃnibham // SvaT_10.923 //
analyzed: ebhyaḥ prakāśakam nāma paratas sūrya saṃnibham
tasmāt vai saṃpravartante pañca buddhīndriyāṇi tu

original: śrotraṃ tvakcakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā ca yathākramam // SvaT_10.924 //
analyzed: śrotram tvac cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā ca yathākramam
viṣaya ālocanam vṛttiḥ tejaḥ maṇḍala saṃsthitāḥ
svākya adhipatayaḥ nityam teṣu eva praticodakāḥ
ebhyaḥ parataram ca asti candra maṇḍala sannibham
vistārāt pariṇāhāt ca sarvatas raśmi maṇḍalam
tasmāt vai saṃpravartante pañca arthāḥ sarva dehinām

original: śabdaḥ sparśastathā rūpaṃ raso gandhaśca pañcamaḥ // SvaT_10.927 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ sparśaḥ tathā rūpam rasaḥ gandhaḥ ca pañcamaḥ

original: ebhyaḥ parataraṃ cāpi saumyaṃ somasya maṇḍalam /
analyzed: ebhyaḥ parataram ca api saumyam somasya maṇḍalam
tasmāt manaḥ viniṣkrāntam raśmibhiḥ darśa pañcabhiḥ
cittam cetaḥ manaḥ ca iti śabda ādi akṣa pravartakam
tasya adhipaḥ mahā tejāḥ candramāḥ saumya tejasā
tasmāt tu maṇḍalāt ūrdhvam paratas maṇḍalam mahat
japā kusuma saṃkāśam aruṇa āditya saṃnibham
pūrvavat ca samantāt parimaṇḍalam
tasmāt tu maṇḍalāt devi sandhyā aruṇa sama dyutiḥ
sa dhūmaḥ gniḥ iva asau vai ahaṃkāraḥ pravartate
antaḥkaraṇam ātma stham yena idam raṃjitam jagat
matta dvipaḥ iva andhaḥ tu dāva agniḥ upasarpati

original: tasyādhidevo rudro vai yenāyaṃ preryate sadā // SvaT_10.933 //
analyzed: tasya adhidevaḥ rudraḥ vai yena ayam preryate sadā

original: chagalāṇḍādayo devi pūrvaṃ te kathitā mayā /
analyzed: chagalāṇḍa ādayaḥ devi pūrvam te kathitāḥ mayā
ahaṃkārāt atha ūrdhvam tu buddhi āvaraṇam ucyate
sūrya koṭi sahasrāṇām tejasā tulya varcasam

original: aṣṭānāṃ devayonīnām atraiva bhuvanaṃ śṛṇu // SvaT_10.935 //
analyzed: aṣṭānām devayonīnām atra eva bhuvanam śṛṇu
kakubham nāma bhuvanam sandhyā aruṇa sama prabham
mānasībhiḥ tu tad strībhiḥ muditābhiḥ samākulam
sthitāḥ tatra piśācāḥ tu sandhyā aruṇa sama prābhāḥ
daśa koṭi sahasrāṇi teṣām tatra nivāsinām
svanandaḥ nāma vikrāntaḥ piśāceṣu īśvaraḥ mahān
kuṇḍala ābharaṇa upetaḥ hāra keyūra bhūṣitaḥ

original: kirīṭī cāṅgadī maulī hemacīnāmbaraḥ śubhaḥ // SvaT_10.939 //
analyzed: kirīṭī ca aṅgadī maulī hema cīna ambaraḥ śubhaḥ
parivṛtaḥ bhūta gaṇaiḥ prabhūtaiḥ pārśvagaiḥ tathā
nānā rūpa dharaiḥ divyaiḥ divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitaiḥ
divya mālya anulepaiḥ tu divya aiśvarya samanvitaiḥ
parivṛtaḥ mahā tejāḥ gaṇaiḥ iva mahā gaṇaḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi rākṣāsaṃ bhuvanaṃ mahat /
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi rākṣāsam bhuvanam mahat
kokilā kaṇṭha sadṛśam nīla jīmuta saṃnibham
tasmin tu bhuvane divye divya aiśvarya samanvite

original: karālo rākṣaseśo vai jātyañjananibho mahān // SvaT_10.943 //
analyzed: karālaḥ rākṣasa īśaḥ vai jāti añjana nibhaḥ mahān

original: kiriṭī kuṇḍalī dīptaḥ śobhate tu mahādyutiḥ /
analyzed: kiriṭī kuṇḍalī dīptaḥ śobhate tu mahā dyutiḥ
jāti añjana nibhaḥ śrīmān dāva agniḥ iva parvate
daśa koṭi sahasrāṇi muditāḥ nāma rākṣasāḥ
bhṛṅga jīmūta varṇa ābhāḥ vasanti atra mahā prabhāḥ

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi yākṣaṃ vai bhuvanaṃ mahat /
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi yākṣam vai bhuvanam mahat
jāmbūnada mayam sarvam divya ratna samujjvalam
bhoga aiśvarya samutpannam samantāt parimaṇḍalam

original: tasmiṃstu bhuvane bhadre subhadro nāma yakṣarāṭ // SvaT_10.947 //
analyzed: tasmin tu bhuvane bhadre subhadraḥ nāma yakṣa rāj
tapta kāñcana varṇa ābhaḥ makuṭa ādi vibhūṣitaḥ
śata koṭi sahasraiḥ tu yakṣaiḥ amita vikramaiḥ
taiḥ vṛtaḥ bhrājate sarvaiḥ śarvaḥ sarva gaṇaiḥ iva

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi gāndharvaṃ bhuvanaṃ mahat // SvaT_10.949 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi gāndharvam bhuvanam mahat
pīta kauśītakī prakhyam campakaiḥ tu sama chavi

original: tasmiṃstu bhuvane divye surūpo nāma vai priye // SvaT_10.950 //
analyzed: tasmin tu bhuvane divye surūpaḥ nāma vai priye
tapta jāmbūnada nibhaḥ taruṇa āditya saprabhaḥ
divya gandha anulipta aṅgaḥ divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
daśa koṭi sahasraiḥ tu gandharvaiḥ parivāritaḥ
manaḥ śilā bhaṅga nibhaiḥ haritāla nibhaiḥ tathā
sva kāntāḥ nāma gandharvāḥ citra mālya anulepanāḥ
citra ambara dharāḥ sarve citra ābharaṇa bhūṣitāḥ

original: tasmātparataraṃ vakṣye sthānam aindraṃ ca pārvati // SvaT_10.954 //
analyzed: tasmāt parataram vakṣye sthānam aindram ca pārvati
bṛhadbhogam iti khyātam tad ūrdhvam sarva kāma dam
śaṅkha go kṣīra dhavalam śarad kunda indu sannibham
tasmin tu bhuvane divye divya āścarya śataiḥ yute
vibhūtiḥ nāma bhagavān mahā indraḥ bhuvaneśvaraḥ
candra maṇḍala saṅkāśaḥ muktā hāra vibhūṣitaḥ
śukla ambara dharaḥ śrīmān śukla mālya anulepanaḥ
jvalat kirīṭaḥ dīptābhyām kuṇḍalābhyām alaṃkṛtaḥ
hāra keyūravān śvetaḥ śveta uṣṇīṣa vibhūṣitaḥ

original: bhūtijā nāma vai devā vibhūtyā parayā yutāḥ /
analyzed: bhūtijāḥ nāma vai devāḥ vibhūtyā parayā yutāḥ
kirīṭinaḥ kuṇḍalinaḥ divya mālya vibhūṣitāḥ
daśa koṭi sahasrāṇi devāḥ ca indrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
taiḥ āvṛtaḥ mahā tejāḥ nakṣatraiḥ iva candramāḥ
manojam nāma bhuvanam śarad candra nibham śubham
śukla abhraka nibham dīptam muktā hāra suvarcasam

original: amṛto nāma vai tatra candramāḥ paramaḥ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: amṛtaḥ nāma vai tatra candramāḥ paramaḥ sthitaḥ
kuṇḍalaiḥ dīpti saṃkāśaiḥ bhūṣitaḥ tu virājate
divya gandha anulipta aṅgaḥ divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
tatra vai raśmayaḥ nāmnā raśmi vyūha sama prabhāḥ

original: divyāḥ saumyāstu te jñeyāḥ somatejaḥ samudbhavāḥ // SvaT_10.964 //
analyzed: divyāḥ saumyāḥ tu te jñeyāḥ soma tejaḥ samudbhavāḥ
daśa koṭi sahasrāṇi teṣām vai saumya tejasām

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ tu deveśi prājeśāṃ bhuvanaṃ mahat // SvaT_10.965 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam tu deveśi prājeśām bhuvanam mahat
tasmin tu bhuvane divye prajā īśaḥ tu amita dyutiḥ
viśva rūpa paraiḥ devaiḥ viśvātmā parivāritaḥ
daśa koṭi sahasrāṇi viśvānām bhūri tejasām
parivārya mahātmānam śobhane paryupāsate
brāhmam ca evam atas jñeyam śaṅkha go kṣīra sannibham
pitāmahaḥ yatra devaḥ śukla padma stha saumya dṛś
śukla ambara dharaḥ śrīmān śukla mālya anulepanaḥ
śukla yajña upavītī ca mahā āhāra vibhūṣitaḥ
daśa koṭi sahasraiḥ tu candra bimba sama prabhaiḥ
brāhmaiḥ devaiḥ parivṛtaḥ śārada abhraiḥ iva aṃśumān

original: paiśācaṃ rākṣāsaṃ yākṣaṃ gāndharvaṃ tvaindrameva ca // SvaT_10.971 //
analyzed: paiśācam rākṣāsam yākṣam gāndharvam tu aindram eva ca

original: saumyaṃ tathaiva prājeśaṃ brāhmaṃ vai bhuvanaṃ priye /
analyzed: saumyam tathā eva prājeśam brāhmam vai bhuvanam priye

original: etāni surayonīnāṃ sthānānyeva purāṇi tu // SvaT_10.972 //
analyzed: etāni sura yonīnām sthānāni eva purāṇi tu
avatīrya ātmajanmānam dhyāyantaḥ saṃbhavanti hi
parameśa niyogāt ca codyamānāḥ ca māyayā
niyamitā niyatyā ca brahmaṇaḥ vyakta janmanaḥ

original: vyajyante te ca sargādau nāmarūpairanekadhā // SvaT_10.974 //
analyzed: vyajyante te ca sarga ādau nāma rūpaiḥ anekadhā
aṃśena eva varārohe na tyajanti niketanam
puryaṣṭaka indriyaiḥ sārdham ātmā mantraiḥ viśodhayet
pañca aṣṭakam buddhi tattvam anukramāt
viśodhya evam prayatnena krodha aṣṭakam atas param
saṃvartaḥ tu ekavīraḥ ca kṛtāntaḥ jananāśakaḥ

original: mṛtyuhantā ca raktākṣo mahākrodhaśca durjayaḥ // SvaT_10.977 //
analyzed: mṛtyu hantā ca rakta akṣaḥ mahā krodhaḥ ca durjayaḥ
nīlotpala dala ābhāni teṣām vai bhuvanāni tu
ekaikasya parīvāraḥ koṭiḥ daśa sahasrakam
krodheśvara aṣṭakāt ūrdhvam sthitam tejaḥ aṣṭakam mahat
sarvarūpaḥ ca śāntaḥ ca nimeṣa unmeṣaḥ eva ca
sahasraiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ parivāraḥ abhidhīyate
agni rudrāḥ smṛtāḥ hyate tejasā kṛṣṇa varṇakāḥ

original: kūrmākārāṇi citrāṇi teṣāṃ vai bhuvanāni tu // SvaT_10.981 //
analyzed: kūrma ākārāṇi citrāṇi teṣām vai bhuvanāni tu
atas ūrdhvam samākhyātam yoga aṣṭakam anuttamam

original: akṛtaṃ ca kṛtaṃ caiva raibhavaṃ brāhmameva ca // SvaT_10.982 //
analyzed: akṛtam ca kṛtam ca eva raibhavam brāhmam eva ca

original: vaiṣṇavaṃ tvatha kaumāram aumaṃ śraikaṇṭhameva ca /
analyzed: vaiṣṇavam tu atha kaumāram aumam śraikaṇṭham eva ca
krīḍanti yoginaḥ tatra bhuvanaiḥ sphaṭika prabhaiḥ
tatas sākṣāt bhagavatī jaganmātā vyavasthitā

original: umā tvameyā viśvasya viśvayoniḥ svayambhavā // SvaT_10.984 //
analyzed: umā tu ameyā viśvasya viśvayoniḥ svayambhavā
tapta jāmbūnada nibhā hi udaya āditya saprabhā
mahā pīṭhe maṇi maye siṃha aṣṭaka yute śubhe
śata yojana vistīrṇe divya sraj dhāma lālite
divya kuṇḍalinī devī mahā hāra vibhūṣitā
vijaya agre mahābhāgā śrīḥ iva uttama rūpiṇī
jayā ca padma garbha ābhā sarva alaṃkāra bhūṣitā
nandā ca padma patra akṣī hāra keyūra bhūṣitā
sarva ābharaṇa citra aṅgī su nandā ca manoharā
parivārya pratīhāryaḥ sarvatas samupasthitāḥ
triṃśat koṭi sahasrāṇi triṃśat koṭi śatāni ca
mānasyaḥ divya nāryaḥ tāḥ tām sadā paryupāsate
vimāna koṭiḥ ekā ca rudrāṇām bhūri tejasām

original: aumā iti samākhyātāḥ vaimānā iti te 'nyathā /
analyzed: aumāḥ iti samākhyātāḥ vaimānāḥ iti te nyathā

original: upāsate tu tāṃ devīṃ mātaraṃ tanayā iva // SvaT_10.991 //
analyzed: upāsate tu tām devīm mātaram tanayāḥ iva
sā avatīrya aṇḍa madhye tu mayā sārdham varānane
anugraha artham lokānām prādurbhūtā sanātanī
kalpe pūrve jaganmātā jagadyoniḥ dvitīyake

original: tṛtīye śāmbhavī nāma caturthe viśvarūpiṇī // SvaT_10.993 //
analyzed: tṛtīye śāmbhavī nāma caturthe viśva rūpiṇī

original: pañcame nandinī nāma ṣaṣṭhe caiva gaṇāmbikā /
analyzed: pañcame nandinī nāma ṣaṣṭhe ca eva gaṇa ambikā

original: vibhūtiḥ saptame kalpe subhūtiścāṣṭame tathā // SvaT_10.994 //
analyzed: vibhūtiḥ saptame kalpe subhūtiḥ ca aṣṭame tathā
ānandā navame kalpe daśame vāmalocanā

original: ekādaśe varārohā dvādaśe ca sumaṅgalā // SvaT_10.995 //
analyzed: ekādaśe varārohā dvādaśe ca sumaṅgalā
kalpe trayodaśe devi mahā tanuḥ udāhṛtā

original: kalpe caturdaśe caiva anantā nāma kīrtitā // SvaT_10.996 //
analyzed: kalpe caturdaśe ca eva anantā nāma kīrtitā

original: sahasradhārā saptadaśe satī cāṣṭadaśe purā // SvaT_10.997 //
analyzed: sahasradhārā saptadaśe satī ca aṣṭadaśe purā

original: cākṣuṣasya manoḥ kalpe dakṣasya duhitā śubhā /
analyzed: cākṣuṣasya manoḥ kalpe dakṣasya duhitā śubhā

original: avamānācca dakṣasya svāṃ tanuṃ tvajahāḥ purā // SvaT_10.998 //
analyzed: avamānāt ca dakṣasya svām tanum tu ajahāḥ purā

original: amāṃ kalāṃ tu candrasya punarāpūrya saṃsthitā /
analyzed: amām kalām tu candrasya punar āpūrya saṃsthitā
punar himavatā ārādhya duhitā tu ātmanaḥ kṛtā

original: tvaṃ devi sādbhutaṃ taptvā tapaḥ paramaduścaram /
analyzed: tvam devi sa adbhutam taptvā tapaḥ parama duścaram

original: māṃ bhartāraṃ punaḥ prāpya jātāsyaṅgaruhā priye // SvaT_10.1000 //
analyzed: mām bhartāram punar prāpya jātā asi aṅgaruhā priye
kailāsa nilayaḥ ca aham tvayā sārdham varānane

original: tvaṃ tanurvāmabhāgasya matto naiva viyujyase // SvaT_10.1001 //
analyzed: tvam tanuḥ vāma bhāgasya mattaḥ nā eva viyujyase
dakṣa adhvare punar jātā bhadrakālī iti nāmataḥ
eka anaṃśā aparā mūrtiḥ satī īśānāt viniḥsṛtā

original: idaṃ caturyugaṃ prāpya dvāpare viṣṇunā saha /
analyzed: idam caturyugam prāpya dvāpare viṣṇunā saha
mahiṣasya vadha arthāya utpannā kṛṣṇa piṅgalā
kātyāyanī iti durgā iti vividhaiḥ nāma paryayaiḥ

original: manuṣyāṇāṃ tu bhaktānāṃ varadā bhaktavatsalā // SvaT_10.1004 //
analyzed: manuṣyāṇām tu bhaktānām vara dā bhakta vatsalā
vindhya parvata mūrdhani

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhuvanaṃ varavarṇini // SvaT_10.1005 //
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam pravakṣyāmi bhuvanam varavarṇini
sucāru iti tu vikhyātam sahasra āditya kāntimat
kailāsa śikhara ākāram śuddha sphaṭika saprabham
mahā vimāna koṭībhiḥ āvṛtam cakravartinām
tasmin tu bhuvane divye sūrya koṭi sama dyutiḥ
bhoga sthānam samastam vai tatrastham vāma bhāgataḥ
śata yojana vistīrṇe nānā ratna vibhūṣite
divya āstaraṇa saṃchanne āditya śata sannibhe
āsane parame divye ratna padma vicitrite
upaviṣṭaḥ mahā tejāḥ vṛṣabhaiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ vṛtaḥ
hema cīna ambara dharaḥ hāra keyūra bhūṣitaḥ
dhārayan su pradīpte ca sūrya maṇḍala sannibhe
sphurat mayūkha saṃghāte kuṇḍale raśmi saṃkule
dhārayat makuṭam mūrdhni divya ratna vicitritam
dedīpyamānam ati ugram kailāsa śikhara upamam
pralambaḥ sya mahā hāraḥ prabhavat raśmi saṃkulaḥ

original: gāṅgo himavataḥ śṛṅgāt patito nirjharo yathā // SvaT_10.1014 //
analyzed: gāṅgaḥ himavataḥ śṛṅgāt patitaḥ nirjharaḥ yathā
triṃśat koṭi sahasraiḥ tu triṃśat koṭi śataiḥ tathā
śūlibhiḥ jaṭibhiḥ tri akṣaiḥ divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitaiḥ
nānā rūpa dharaiḥ rudraiḥ vṛtaḥ bhūta gaṇaiḥ tathā
divyābhiḥ mānasībhiḥ ca nārībhiḥ parivāritaḥ
vimāna śata koṭībhiḥ āvṛtaḥ sarvaḥ eva tu
mātaraḥ sapta rūpiṇyaḥ nānā alaṃkāra bhūṣitāḥ
parivārya mahātmānam samantāt paryavasthitāḥ
brāhmī kamala patra ābhā divya ābharaṇa bhūṣitā

original: āgneyyāṃ diśi deveśi sthitā vai śrīrivāparā /
analyzed: āgneyyām diśi deveśi sthitā vai śrīḥ iva aparā

original: śaṅkhagokṣīrasaṃkāśā tv aiśānyāṃ tu varānane // SvaT_10.1019 //
analyzed: śaṅkha go kṣīra saṃkāśā tu aiśānyām tu varānane
māheśvarī mahā tejāḥ tiṣṭhate sura pūjitā
kaumārī padmagarbha ābhā hāra keyūra bhūṣitā
diśi uttarasyām deveśi kāminī paryupāsitā
snigdha nīlotpala nibhā hāra kuṇḍala maṇḍā etā

original: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi tu sā upāste parameśvaram /
analyzed: dakṣiṇasyām diśi tu sā upāste parameśvaram

original: vaiṣṇavīti ca vikhyātā śivena paramātmanā // SvaT_10.1022 //
analyzed: vaiṣṇavī iti ca vikhyātā śivena paramātmanā
nīla jīmūta saṃkāśā sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitā

original: vāruṇyāṃ diśi deveśi vārāhī paryupasthitā // SvaT_10.1023 //
analyzed: vāruṇyām diśi deveśi vārāhī paryupasthitā

triṃśat rudrāḥ samākhyātāḥ dvitīyā paṅktiḥ uttamā

devaḥ ruṇaḥ dīrghabāhuḥ atibhūtiḥ ca sthāṇukaḥ

cakrapāṇiḥ ca kūrma ākhyaḥ tu ardhanārīśvaraḥ tathā

original: vauṣaṭkārastathā svāhā svadhā ca parikīrtitaḥ // SvaT_10.1060 //

su hṛṣṭaḥ su prahṛṣṭaḥ ca surūpaḥ rūpa vardhanaḥ
manonmanaḥ mahā dhīraḥ vīra īśāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: rāgatattve pravakṣyāmi ye 'nye rudrā vyavasthitāḥ // SvaT_10.1114 //
analyzed: rāgatattve pravakṣyāmi ye nye rudrāḥ vyavasthitāḥ
kalyāṇaḥ piṅgalaḥ babhruḥ vīraḥ ca prabbhavaḥ tathā
medhātithiḥ chandakaḥ ca dāhakaḥ śāstra kāriṇaḥ
pañca śiṣyāḥ tathā ācāryāḥ daśā ete saṃvyavasthitāḥ
vidyā tattvam atas ca ūrdhvam tasmin vai bhuvanam śṛṇu
vāmaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ ca raudraḥ ca kalaḥ vikaraṇaḥ tathā
bala vikaraṇaḥ ca eva bala pramathanaḥ tathā
sarvabhūtadamanaḥ ca tathā ca eva manonmanaḥ
kalā tattve mahādevi mahādeva trayam sthitam
kalā tattvam samākhyātam samāsena varānane
ete rudrāḥ mahādevi tri netrāḥ candra śekharāḥ
rudra koṭi sahasraiḥ tu samantāt parivāritāḥ
śuddha sphaṭika saṅkāśāḥ yoga aiśvarya bala anvitāḥ
rāge raktāḥ tu vijñeyāḥ jñāna yoga bala utkaṭāḥ
chatra ākārāḥ tu teṣām vai gṛhāḥ ratna vicitritāḥ
upariṣṭāt bhavet māyā kathayāmi samāsatas

original: vyāpya yā vai tvadhodhvānaṃ vaiśvarūpyeṇa saṃsthitā /
analyzed: vyāpya yā vai tu adhas dhvānam vaiśvarūpyeṇa saṃsthitā

original: tatra rudrā mahābhāgā dvādaśaiva mahābalāḥ // SvaT_10.1123 //
analyzed: tatra rudrāḥ mahābhāgāḥ dvādaśa eva mahā balāḥ
gahanaḥ ca asādhyaḥ ca tathā hariharaḥ prabhuḥ
daśeśānaḥ ca deveśi trigalaḥ gopatiḥ tathā
adhas puṭe tu vijñeyā māyā tattve varānane

original: kṣemeśo brahmaṇaḥ svāmī vidyeśānastathaiva ca // SvaT_10.1125 //
analyzed: kṣemeśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ svāmī vidyeśānaḥ tathā eva ca
vidyeśaḥ ca śaivaḥ ca eva anantaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ ucyate
ūrdhva māyā puṭa sthāḥ tu rudrāḥ ete prakīrtitāḥ

original: eṣāṃ madhye tu bhagavān ananteśo jagatpatiḥ /
analyzed: eṣām madhye tu bhagavān ananta īśaḥ jagatpatiḥ

original: udbhavaṃ bhāvayitvā tu svecchayā kurute prabhuḥ // SvaT_10.1127 //
analyzed: udbhavam bhāvayitvā tu sva icchayā kurute prabhuḥ
sarva jñaḥ sarva kartā ca nigraha anugrahe rataḥ

original: prathamena tu bhedena rudrā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ // SvaT_10.1128 //
analyzed: prathamena tu bhedena rudrāḥ dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ

original: asmiṃstu ye yathā rudrā māyātattve vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: asmin tu ye yathā rudrāḥ māyā tattve vyavasthitāḥ
tathā aham kathayiṣyāmi bheda traya vibhāgaśaḥ
gopatiḥ ca tatas devi adhas granthau vyavasthitaḥ

original: granthyūrdhve saṃsthito viśvas trikalaḥ kṣema eva ca // SvaT_10.1130 //
analyzed: granthi ūrdhve saṃsthitaḥ viśvaḥ tri kalaḥ kṣemaḥ eva ca
brahmaṇaḥ dhipatiḥ ca eva śivaḥ ca iti sa pañcamaḥ
adhas ūrdhvam anantaḥ tu pāśāḥ ca eva atra saṃsthitāḥ

original: pūrvaṃ vai kathitā devi ato ṛṣikulaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: pūrvam vai kathitā devi ṛṣi kulam bhavet

original: yonirvāgīśvarī caiva yasyāṃ jāto na jāyate // SvaT_10.1132 //
analyzed: yoniḥ vāc īśvarī ca eva yasyām jātaḥ na jāyate
oṃkāra sādhya dhātāraḥ damaneśaḥ tatas param
dhyānam bhasma īśam eva āhuḥ pramāṇāni tad ūrdhvatas
pañcārtham guhyam eva āhuḥ rudrāṅkuśam atas param

original: hṛdayaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ caiva vyuhamākarṣameva ca // SvaT_10.1134 //
analyzed: hṛdayam lakṣaṇam ca eva vyuham ākarṣam eva ca
ādarśam ca tathā evā iha aṣṭamam parikīrtitam
ete parivṛtāḥ devi rudra koṭi sahasrakaiḥ
nānā varṇa vicitrāḥ ca nānā abbharaṇa bhūṣitāḥ
nānā nārī sahasraiḥ tu ramante patyuḥ icchayā
tri netrāḥ śūlinaḥ sarve jaṭā candra kīrīṭinaḥ
alupta śakti vibhavāḥ māyā tattva adhikāriṇaḥ
bhuvaneṣu vicitreṣu yoni ākāreṣu saṃsthitāḥ
atas param bhavet māyā sarva jantu vimohinī
nirvaira paripanthinyā tayā bhramita buddhayaḥ

original: idaṃ tattvamidaṃ neti vivadantīha vādinaḥ // SvaT_10.1139 //
analyzed: idam tattvam idam na iti vivadanti iha vādinaḥ
sat patham tu parityajya nayati drutam utpatham

original: gurudevāgniśāstrasya ye na bhaktā narādhamāḥ // SvaT_10.1140 //
analyzed: guru deva agni śāstrasya ye na bhaktāḥ nara adhamāḥ
asat yukti vicāra jñāḥ śuṣka tarka avalaṃbinaḥ

original: bhramayatyeva tānmāyā hy amokṣe mokṣalipsayā // SvaT_10.1141 //
analyzed: bhramayati eva tān māyā hi amokṣe mokṣa lipsayā

original: śivadīkṣāsinā cchinnā na prarohettu sā punaḥ /
analyzed: śiva dīkṣā asinā chinnā na prarohet tu sā punar
atha upari mahāvidyā sarva vidyā bhava udbhavā
jagataḥ pralaya utpatti vibhūti nidhiḥ avyayā

original: sā eva paramā devī vāgīśīti nigadyate // SvaT_10.1143 //
analyzed: sā eva paramā devī vāgīśī iti nigadyate

original: aṣṭavargavibhinnā ca vidyā sā mātṛkaiva tu /
analyzed: aṣṭavarga vibhinnā ca vidyā sā mātṛkā eva tu
bhuvanāni pravakṣyāmi yathāvat anupūrvaśas

original: vāmā jyeṣṭhā tathā raudrī kālī vikaraṇī tathā /
analyzed: vāmā jyeṣṭhā tathā raudrī kālī vikaraṇī tathā
balavikaraṇī ca eva balapramathanī tāthā
damanī sarva bhūtānām tathā ca eva manonmanī
tapta cāmīkara ākārāḥ pañcavaktrāḥ tri locanāḥ
amogha vīryāḥ sarvajñāḥ sarvatas sarvadā sthitāḥ
sarvajña anugatāḥ sarvāḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitāḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa sampannaḥ sarva aiśvarya samanvitāḥ

original: pradhānāḥ sapta koṭyastu mantrāṇāṃ yā vyavasthitāḥ // SvaT_10.1148 //
analyzed: pradhānāḥ sapta koṭyaḥ tu mantrāṇām yāḥ vyavasthitāḥ
ekaikasya parīvāraḥ lakṣa ayuta sahasraśas

original: padmākāreṣu divyeṣu krīḍanti bhuvaneṣu te // SvaT_10.1149 //
analyzed: padma ākāreṣu divyeṣu krīḍanti bhuvaneṣu te
rūpiṇī mardinī jvālā sapta saṅkhyāḥ tad īśvarāḥ
vidyā rājñyaḥ samākhyātāḥ dīkṣā kāle viśodhayet

original: bāhye tasyaiśvaraṃ tattvaṃ bhuvanānyatra me śṛṇu // SvaT_10.1151 //
analyzed: bāhye tasya aiśvaram tattvam bhuvanāni atra me śṛṇu
aṣṭa vidyeśvaraiḥ yuktaḥ vīta māyaḥ nirañjanaḥ
tasya āsanam tu vistīrṇam sahasra dala sammitam
tisraḥ koṭyaḥ ṛdha koṭiḥ ca mantrāḥ tasya āsane sthitāḥ
tatrasthaḥ īśvaraḥ devaḥ vara daḥ sārvatomukhaḥ
pañcavaktraḥ su tejaskaḥ daśa bāhuḥ trilocanaḥ
go kṣīra dhavalaḥ saumyaḥ nāga yajña upavītavān
divya ambara dharaḥ devaḥ divya gandha anulepanaḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpūrṇaḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
varada abhaya hastaḥ ca sau īśa yogibhiḥ
tasya utsaṅga gatā vidyā sarva vidyā samāsritā
divya vastra parīdhānā divya mālya anulepanā
divya sraj dāma mālābhiḥ muktā hāraiḥ vibhūṣitā
muktāphala pratīkāśā pañcavaktrā tri locanā
ārādhitā vidhānena vedayet jñāninaḥ sadā
prahasantī iva sā bhāti maheśa vadana īkṣaṇāt
vidyeśvarān atas vakṣye pūrva ādi īśa anta gān kramāt

original: anantaścaiva sūkṣmaśca tathā caiva śivottamaḥ // SvaT_10.1161 //
analyzed: anantaḥ ca eva sūkṣmaḥ ca tathā ca eva śiva uttamaḥ

original: śrīkaṇṭhaśca śikhaṇḍī ca jñeyā vidyeśvarāḥ kramāt // SvaT_10.1162 //
analyzed: śrīkaṇṭhaḥ ca śikhaṇḍī ca jñeyāḥ vidyeśvarāḥ kramāt
atas rūpam avasthānam tatra rudrāt nibodha me

original: dharmo jñānaṃ ca vairāgyam aisvaryaṃ ca caturthakam // SvaT_10.1163 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ jñānam ca vairāgyam aisvaryam ca caturthakam

original: vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrī ca śaktayaḥ samudāhṛtāḥ // SvaT_10.1164 //
analyzed: vāmā jyeṣṭhā ca raudrī ca śaktayaḥ samudāhṛtāḥ
parivāraḥ tu tāsām vai koṭyaḥ nekāḥ tu saṅkhyayā

original: sarve sarvagatā mantrāḥ sarvajñāḥ sarvakāmadā // SvaT_10.1165 //
analyzed: sarve sarva gatāḥ mantrāḥ sarva jñāḥ sarva kāma dā
śūddha sphaṭika saṅkāśāḥ tri netrāḥ śūla pāṇayaḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannāḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitāḥ
sarva aiśvarya su sampūrṇāḥ cāru candra ardha śekharāḥ
śatapatra abja bhā ākāraiḥ śuddha hāra indu raśmibhiḥ
nānā ratna ujjvalaiḥ citraiḥ prākāraiḥ toraṇa ākulaiḥ

original: īśvarānugatāḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti bhuvaneṣu te // SvaT_10.1168 //
analyzed: īśvara anugatāḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti bhuvaneṣu te
tam ārādhayitum devam pūjyante sarva karmasu

original: vrataṃ pāśupataṃ divyaṃ ye caranti jitendriyāḥ // SvaT_10.1169 //
analyzed: vratam pāśupatam divyam ye caranti jita indriyāḥ
bhasma niṣṭhāḥ japa dhyānāḥ te vrajanti īśvaram padam
tatra īśvaraḥ tu bhagavān devadevaḥ nirañjanaḥ

original: daśa pañca ca śodhyāni bhuvanānīśvare kramāt // SvaT_10.1171 //
analyzed: daśa pañca ca śodhyāni bhuvanāni īśvare kramāt

original: jñānaṃ kriyā ca vikhyātaṃ dve vidye cāpyataḥ param /
analyzed: jñānam kriyā ca vikhyātam dve vidye ca api atas param
bhāva saṃjñā api abhāva ākhyā tasmin śakti dvaye smṛte

original: pramāṇāvaraṇe cordhve kathayāmi ca mānataḥ // SvaT_10.1174 //
analyzed: pramāṇa āvaraṇe ca ūrdhve kathayāmi ca mānataḥ

original: suśuddhāvaraṇaṃ cordhve tatra rudratrayaṃ viduḥ // SvaT_10.1175 //
analyzed: su śuddha āvaraṇam ca ūrdhve tatra rudra trayam viduḥ

original: ekākṣaḥ piṅgalo haṃsaḥ kathitaṃ tu samāsataḥ /
analyzed: ekākṣaḥ piṅgalaḥ haṃsaḥ kathitam tu samāsatas
śiva āvaraṇam ūrdhvam tu tatra ekaḥ dhruva saṃjñakaḥ
saṃsthitaḥ rudrarājasya mokṣa āvaraṇam ūrdhvatas
ekādaśa eva rudrān ca kathayāmi samāsatas
saurabhaḥ ca tathā eva ca
janma mṛtyu haraḥ ca eva praṇītaḥ sukha duḥkha daḥ
vijṛmbhitaḥ samākhyātāḥ stālu ūrdhve tu vyavasthitāḥ

original: punarūrdhve dhruvaṃ jñeyaṃ nirañjanapadaṃ śubham // SvaT_10.1179 //
analyzed: punar ūrdhve dhruvam jñeyam nirañjana padam śubham
īśa śakti trayam mūrdhni kathitam ca anupūrvaśas
prabuddha āvaraṇam ca ūrdhve kathayāmi samāsatas
prītaḥ pramuditaḥ ca eva pramodaḥ ca pralambakaḥ

original: rudrāṣṭakaṃ samākhyātaṃ vijñeyaṃ prāgdiśaḥ kramāt // SvaT_10.1182 //
analyzed: rudrāṣṭakam samākhyātam vijñeyam prāc diśaḥ kramāt

original: prabhavaḥ samayaḥ kṣudro vimalaśca śivastathā // SvaT_10.1183 //
analyzed: prabhavaḥ samayaḥ kṣudraḥ vimalaḥ ca śivaḥ tathā
tatas ghanaḥ samākhyātaḥ nirañjanaḥ tatas param

original: rudroṅkārastu pañcaite tālūrdhve tu vijānata // SvaT_10.1184 //
analyzed: rudra uṅkāraḥ tu pañca ete tālu ūrdhve tu vijānata
ekonaṣaṣṭiḥ bhuvanam jñāna śakti āditaḥ kramāt
rudra uṅkāra antam iti etat dīkṣā kāle viśodhayet
ekaikasya parīvāraḥ koṭyaḥ nekāḥ sahasraśas
tri netrāḥ vara dāḥ sarve śuddha sāmarthya vigrahāḥ
śuddha sphaṭika saṅkāśāḥ daśa bāhu indu śekharāḥ
triśūla pāṇayaḥ sarve jaṭā mukuṭa maṇḍitāḥ
sarve sarva guṇa upetāḥ sarvajñāḥ sarva da īśvarāḥ
sārvalakṣaṇa saṃpūrṇāḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitāḥ
rudra kanyā samākīrṇā divyaiḥ rūpaiḥ manoharaiḥ
saṃkriḍante puravaraiḥ śiva icchā vidhi coditāḥ
īśvarasya tathā ūrdhve tu adhas ca eva sadāśivāt
suśiva āvaraṇam ca ūrdhve tasmin jñeyaḥ sadāśivaḥ
tri pañca nayanaḥ devaḥ candra ardha kṛta śekharaḥ
vaktra pañcaka saṃyuktaḥ daśa bāhuḥ mahā balaḥ
śuddha sphaṭika saṅkāśaḥ sphuran vai dīpta tejasā
siṃhāsana upaviṣṭaḥ tu śveta padmāsana sthitaḥ
pañca brahma aṅga sahitaḥ sakala ādyaiḥ samanvitaḥ
daśabhiḥ ca śivaiḥ yuktaḥ rudra aṣṭādaśaka anvitaḥ
sakalaḥ niṣkalaḥ śūnyaḥ kalā āḍhyaḥ kham alaṅkṛtaḥ
kṣapaṇaḥ ca kṣayāntasthaḥ kaṇṭhyauṣṭhyaḥ ca aṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ
bhruvoḥ madhye tu vijñeyaḥ devadevaḥ sadāśivaḥ
sakala ādyaiḥ vṛtaḥ devaḥ oṃkāra īśa ādibhiḥ kramāt
oṃkāra īśaḥ śivaḥ dīptaḥ kāraṇa īśaḥ daśa īśakaḥ
suśivaḥ ca eva kāla īśaḥ sūkṣma rūpaḥ su tejasaḥ
śarvaḥ ca daśamaḥ proktaḥ ūrdhva antam saṃvyavasthitāḥ

original: rudrāścāṣṭādaśa bahiḥ teṣāṃ nāmāni vai śṛṇu // SvaT_10.1197 //
analyzed: rudrāḥ ca aṣṭādaśa bahis teṣām nāmāni vai śṛṇu

original: rauravo mukuṭo visaraś candro bimbaḥ pragītavān // SvaT_10.1198 //
analyzed: rauravaḥ mukuṭaḥ visaraḥ candraḥ bimbaḥ pragītavān

original: lalitaḥ siddharudraśca santānaḥ śarva eva ca /
analyzed: lalitaḥ siddharudraḥ ca santānaḥ śarvaḥ eva ca

original: paraśca kiraṇaścaiva pārameśvara eva ca // SvaT_10.1199 //
analyzed: paraḥ ca kiraṇaḥ ca eva pārameśvaraḥ eva ca

original: koṭayaḥ saptamantrāṇām āsane tasya saṃsthitāḥ // SvaT_10.1201 //
analyzed: koṭayaḥ sapta mantrāṇām āsane tasya saṃsthitāḥ

original: jñānaśaktiḥ kriyāśaktir vāme dakṣiṇataḥ sthite // SvaT_10.1203 //
analyzed: jñānaśaktiḥ kriyāśaktiḥ vāme dakṣiṇatas sthite

original: tasyotsaṅgagatā sā tu nityaṃ caivātmavartinī // SvaT_10.1205 //
analyzed: tasya utsaṅga gatā sā tu nityam ca eva ātma vartinī

original: śaktayastasya yāḥ proktāḥ tathā vai mantranāyakāḥ // SvaT_10.1207 //
analyzed: śaktayaḥ tasya yāḥ proktāḥ tathā vai mantranāyakāḥ
ekaikam paritas devi padmaiḥ arbuda koṭibhiḥ
tathā kharva nikharvaiḥ ca pratirūpaiḥ mahā balaiḥ
vidyā rūpaiḥ sva rūpa āḍhaiḥ aprameya guṇa anvitaiḥ
sarva lakṣaṇa saṃpannaiḥ sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaiḥ
hāsya lāsya vilāsa āḍhyaiḥ bhrū kṣepa unmada vibhramaiḥ

original: tābhiḥ sārdhaṃ sadā rudrāḥ prakīḍantīcchayā prabhoḥ /
analyzed: tābhiḥ sārdham sadā rudrāḥ prakīḍanti icchayā prabhoḥ
pura varaiḥ sarvatobhadraiḥ candra koṭi sama prabhaiḥ
māyā dharma vinirmuktāḥ nirmalāḥ vigata jvarāḥ
adhikāram prakurvanti sarvajña amogha śaktayaḥ
adhikāra kṣaye śāntāḥ jāyante sarva gāḥ śivāḥ

original: parapreryāḥ punarbhūyo na bhavanti kadācana // SvaT_10.1213 //
analyzed: para preryāḥ punar bhūyas na bhavanti kadācana
suśiva āvaraṇam khyātam mantra garbham varānane

original: tatra padme sthito devaḥ śāntyatīto mahādyutiḥ // SvaT_10.1215 //
analyzed: tatra padme sthitaḥ devaḥ śānti atītaḥ mahā dyutiḥ

original: nivṛttiśca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntistathaiva ca /
analyzed: nivṛttiḥ ca pratiṣṭhā ca vidyā śāntiḥ tathā eva ca

analyzed: melakam ca eva saṅghātaḥ putraḥ sa uddyotakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: duhitā hlādikā jñeyā kṣubdhaṃ vai calitaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: duhitā hlādikā jñeyā kṣubdham vai calitam viduḥ

original: dūṣako jāra ityuktaḥ pītaṃ vanditameva ca // SvaT_15.18 //
analyzed: dūṣakaḥ jāraḥ iti uktaḥ pītam vanditam eva ca
bhakṣitam prāptam iti āhuḥ charditam vikṛtīkṛtam

original: dūṣitaṃ karṣitaṃ jñeyaṃ sammataṃ samayaṃ viduḥ // SvaT_15.19 //
analyzed: dūṣitam karṣitam jñeyam sammatam samayam viduḥ
mahallaḥ rakṣakaḥ jñeyaḥ chagalaḥ tu kaniṣṭhakaḥ

original: vinayo dehakarma syāt sādhanaṃ tu japaḥ smṛtaḥ // SvaT_15.20 //
analyzed: vinayaḥ deha karma syāt sādhanam tu japaḥ smṛtaḥ
kadambam vṛndam iti āhuḥ viralaḥ śliṣṭaḥ ucyate

original: vimalaḥ śiṣya ityukta icchā cājñā prakīrtitā /
analyzed: vimalaḥ śiṣyaḥ iti uktaḥ icchā ca ājñā prakīrtitā

original: devatādarśanaṃ yattat labdhaṃ śastrahataṃ viduḥ // SvaT_15.22 //
analyzed: devatā darśanam yat tat labdham śastra hatam viduḥ
niśācaraḥ biḍālaḥ syāt nakhinaḥ ca vidārakāḥ

original: ānītaṃ sāritaṃ jñeyaṃ rakṣitaṃ pihitaṃ tathā // SvaT_15.23 //
analyzed: ānītam sāritam jñeyam rakṣitam pihitam tathā

original: śikhāṃ saṃspṛśate yā tu sā tu śaktiṃ vinirdiśet /
analyzed: śikhām saṃspṛśate yā tu sā tu śaktim vinirdiśet

original: śiraḥ pradarśayedyā tu sā ca binduṃ vinirdiśet // SvaT_15.24 //
analyzed: śiraḥ pradarśayet yā tu sā ca bindum vinirdiśet

original: lalāṭaṃ darśayedyā tu īśvaraṃ sā vinirdiśet /
analyzed: lalāṭam darśayet yā tu īśvaram sā vinirdiśet

original: tālukaṃ darśayedyā tu tayā rudraḥ prakīrtitaḥ // SvaT_15.25 //
analyzed: tālukam darśayet yā tu tayā rudraḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: jihvāṃ pradarśayedyā tu vidyāṃ sātha vinirdiśet /
analyzed: jihvām pradarśayet yā tu vidyām sā atha vinirdiśet

original: sapta koṭayastu mantrāṇāṃ tasyā jñeyāstu suvrate // SvaT_15.26 //
analyzed: sapta koṭayaḥ tu mantrāṇām tasyāḥ jñeyāḥ tu suvrate
ghaṇṭikām darśayet yā tu tasya anantaḥ pradarśitaḥ

original: kaṇṭhaṃ tu saṃspṛśeyā sā kālatattvaṃ vinirdiśet // SvaT_15.27 //
analyzed: kaṇṭham tu saṃspṛśeyā sā kāla tattvam vinirdiśet

original: hṛtpadmaṃ darśayedyā tu puruṣaṃ sā vinirdiśet /
analyzed: hṛd padmam darśayet yā tu puruṣam sā vinirdiśet

original: nābhiṃ pradarśayedyā tu prakṛtiṃ sā vinirdiśet // SvaT_15.28 //
analyzed: nābhim pradarśayet yā tu prakṛtim sā vinirdiśet
tasya adhastāt buddhi tattvam yadi syāt darśanam priye
yadā guhyam spṛśet devi ahaṃkāraḥ dhi daivatam
kaṭim sandarśayet yā tu vyoma tatra adhidhaivatam

original: ūrukau darśayeddevi pavanaṃ sā vinirdiśet // SvaT_15.30 //
analyzed: ūrukau darśayet devi pavanam sā vinirdiśet

original: jānunī darśayedyā tu tayā tejaḥ prakīrtitam /
analyzed: jānunī darśayet yā tu tayā tejaḥ prakīrtitam

original: jaṅghe pradarśayedyā tu varuṇaṃ sā vinirdiśet // SvaT_15.31 //
analyzed: jaṅghe pradarśayet yā tu varuṇam sā vinirdiśet
śarīram darśayet devi sarva veda mayam priye
pūjā agni japa yuktasya dhyāna yuktasya mantriṇaḥ
samayācāra yuktasya kāla aṃśaka vidaḥ priye
kriyā upetasya deveśi yoginyaḥ tu vara pradāḥ
darśayanti mahā dhvānam nānā bhoga samanvitam

original: girirājasya deveśi yaṃ gatvā phalamaśnute // SvaT_15.34 //
analyzed: girirājasya deveśi yam gatvā phalam aśnute
bhairaveṇa samājñaptāḥ śaktayaḥ tu varānane
anyāḥ ca siddhīḥ vividhāḥ adhamāḥ madhyama uttamāḥ
anya tantra samutthāḥ ca sādhayanti na saṃśayaḥ

original: evaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaṃ melakaṃ tu varānane // SvaT_15.36 //
analyzed: evam saṃkṣepataḥ proktam melakam tu varānane
satata abhyāsa yogena dadate carukam svakam
yasya samprāśanāt devi vīreśa sadṛśaḥ bhavet

original: tasmād dhyānārcane homaṃ japam ca varavarṇini /
analyzed: tasmāt dhyāna arcane homam japam ca varavarṇini

original: kurvanti bhāvitātmānas tataḥ siddhyanti mantriṇaḥ // SvaT_15.38 //
analyzed: kurvanti bhāvitātmānaḥ tatas siddhyanti mantriṇaḥ
iti svacchandatantre pañcadaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
